description:
This newly remodeled guest suite provides you with 2 bedrooms, a full bath, a cozy living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. The tranquil location and light, airy feel of the space make it a peaceful place to rest during a visit to the busy city. Located near public transit to downtown and a short drive or train ride to the airport, it is the perfect combination of convenient, quiet, and comfortable. Also, there is free street parking in front of the building.

The suite is on the second floor of an older Chicago home. There is no cable or TV but we do have games and books for times when you are staying in. There is high-speed WiFi available if you want to use your computer or tablet for streaming video.

There is laundry available in the basement for our guests. It is dedicated for the Airbnb. In addition to guest use, it is used to wash linens for the apartment when guests check-out. It can be made available for a guest at any time but communication with me will be needed to ensure it is available when desired.

I live on first floor and will be available as needed. Feel free to contact via text, call, or knock on the door if there is anything you need.

Jefferson Park is known as "The Gateway to Chicago." It has long been thought of as a transportation hub connecting the Northwest Suburbs to the City. People who want the convenience of suburban parking lots and availability of chain stores will be able to find what they need in the nearby suburbs. Those who want to spend their time downtown and use public transportation will also have great options. For those who want a little of both, it is ideal. The neighborhood itself is a quiet community of mostly long-term Chicago residents. Local shopping and restaurants are available within easy walking distance. 

There are also nearby forest preserves with trails for running, walking, or bike riding. If you look closely you may find a family of deer! There are also three public parks within a 2 mile radius. Two of the parks have free public pools. Please ask if you would like to see the schedules.

Located in the Jefferson Park neighborhood in North West Chicago, there is easy access to Blue Line and the Metra UP-NW trains. O'Hare Airport is a 15-20 min commute or 30 mins by public transit. There is free parking on the street.

additional_house_rules:
Smoking is not allowed in, on or within 25 feet of the property. This is out of respect to our neighbors.

You are limited to the number of guests listed in your reservation (max 5 without an additional guest charge). There is a maximum of 4 extra guests allowed with an extra fee. Only registered guests may enter the property, without prior consent of the host.

Check- in is with the host between 3:00 - 5:00PM. We can usually accommodate earlier or later check in. Please arrange this with your host after booking. If there are multiple people in your party, please note that the host will only greet the people that arrive during check-in time. After that, your first arrival will have to greet your remaining party members who arrive past the check-in time. We can accommodate previous guests who have stayed before with lock box check-in for arrivals at or after the check-in time.

There is a $200 fee for any lost key or key that is not returned prior to check out.

Each guest is provided with a set of towels for use during their stay. Towels must be left onsite upon departure. There is a replacement fee for any towels not returned prior to check out. 

Any damaged or missing items will incur a replacement fee after check out.

By booking, the guests agree to the house rules and agree to read the house manual and follow all rules therein. The guests understand that if any rules are not adhered to that they may be asked to leave immediately and will not receive a refund for any part of their booking.

Guests renting additional rooms or space in the house or gardens will be provided with documentation in the form of an agreement regarding details, pricing and additional rules for use of that space. The above rules apply for rentals of any kind.

Please text us with any needs, questions or emergencies that occur before or after arrival.

Thank you.

access:
The Guest Suite occupies the entire third floor, which includes 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, full kitchen and ballroom. There is an additional bedroom on the second floor that can be included with an extra rental fee. 

(Upon availability, bedrooms can be booked singularly, for one or two guests. In that case, the bathroom and kitchen might be shared with other guests.  If the second floor bedroom is rented singularly, there is no kitchen access.)

There is a separate entrance and guests take the back staircase to the third floor. The third floor area is totally private and the host does not use nor access this space while you are a guest.

Bicycles (two adult, one child and a Tandem) and (2) beach passes are available for your enjoyment.

Guests can use other parts of the house or garden for small events or private get togethers. For instance, enjoy high tea, cocktails or wine and cheese on the outside terrace or have a private dinner catered in the grand dining room. Gardens can be used for anything from a formal wedding to a casual barbecue. Please inquire for rates and options available.

*There is no access to the first and second floor, unless they have been rented separately for an event or added experience.
description:
Stay in the Guest Suite of this exquisitely restored Historic Landmark Manor House, one block to Lake Michigan's beaches and close to town and NU. Enjoy the entire third floor, which includes three bedrooms, a private bath with claw-foot soaking tub and shower, private kitchen with full amenities, and a ballroom, in case you feel like dancing! The ballroom can be equipped with a couch and air mattress for any extra guests. Also available is an additional second floor bedroom for a sixth guest.

The Guest Suite is situated in a beautiful historic Manor House built in 1914 and designed by famed architect Earnest Mayo. The entire house was restored to its original splendor and has since won several awards and been seen on TV and in movies. The house is both a National and Evanston landmark and is situated in the Lakeshore Historic District. The guest suite occupies the entire restored third floor (apx 2500 sq ft), which includes three bedrooms, a bathroom, full kitchen and a ballroom. 

There is also a single bedroom on the second floor that can be used for an extra guest. Please inquire regarding fees.

The house and gardens can also be rented for private parties and small gatherings. Please inquire for details and pricing. Additional documentation in the form of an agreement regarding pricing and rules for use of the space will require signature, if interested.

The Guest Suite occupies the entire third floor, which includes 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, full kitchen and ballroom. There is an additional bedroom on the second floor that can be included with an extra rental fee. 

(Upon availability, bedrooms can be booked singularly, for one or two guests. In that case, the bathroom and kitchen might be shared with other guests.  If the second floor bedroom is rented singularly, there is no kitchen access.)

There is a separate entrance and guests take the back staircase to the third floor. The third floor area is totally private and the host does not use nor access this space while you are a guest.

Bicycles (two adult, one child and a Tandem) and (2) beach passes are available for your enjoyment.

Guests can use other parts of the house or garden for small events or private get togethers. For instance, enjoy high tea, cocktails or wine and cheese on the outside terrace or have a private dinner catered in the grand dining room. Gardens can be used for anything from a formal wedding to a casual barbecue. Please inquire for rates and options available.

*There is no access to the first and second floor, unless they have been rented separately for an event or added experience.

The host respects the privacy of their guests and therefore, is fairly hands-off. However, any special requests can be made in advance or upon arrival and we are always only a text away with any questions or desires you may have 24/7.

We are located in the heart of Evanston's Lakeshore Historic district, only one block to the best beaches, with all that the lakefront has to offer; including boat and paddle board rentals, tennis, fitness trail, running/cycling paths and concessions. We are a short walk to NU and town, which includes grocery, coffee shops, restaurants, movie theatre, antique and boutique shops and other attractions.

We are in a very walkable neighborhood and bicycles are available, as well. Evanston also has public Divvy bikes to rent. If venturing to downtown Chicago for a meeting or sightseeing, you can use either the el train/CTA (like a subway but elevated) or Metra train. The stop for either is a short walk. There is also a CTA bus to the mall. Car rentals, taxi's and Uber are also readily available. If coming from the airport, the easiest method is Uber and more cost effective than a taxi. However, the most inexpensive is the el train.

License #

The ballroom can be equipped with a couch and air mattress for any extra guests. Also available is an additional second floor bedroom for a sixth guest.
transit: We are in a very walkable neighborhood and bicycles are available, as well. Evanston also has public Divvy bikes to rent. If venturing to downtown Chicago for a meeting or sightseeing, you can use either the el train/CTA (like a subway but elevated) or Metra train. The stop for either is a short walk. There is also a CTA bus to the mall. Car rentals, taxi's and Uber are also readily available. If coming from the airport, the easiest method is Uber and more cost effective than a taxi. However, the most inexpensive is the el train.

access: Living Room, Bathrooms, Kitchen, Bedrooms, Garden Unit, Yard , Deck & Parking
description:
Enjoy the Country life in this beautiful suburban home. The entire house is yours to enjoy.  Sleeps up to 14 people comfortably with 4 bedrooms,  2 bathrooms and Kitchen . No Smoking Indoors but relax out on the deck after your day of fun.     
 Midway or O'Hare approximately 30-45 min. Downtown Chicago/Lakefront 35 min. Country Club Hills outdoor music theater 5-7 min; Tinley Park Convention Center 15 min. Walmart , movie theater, eateries and more 5 min. Add'l restaurants and shopping 15 min.

This beautiful home  has 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms ( including Garden Unit) for you to enjoy with your large group of 14; Enjoy the outdoors,  barbeque and relax in the yard or on the deck when weather permits.

Living Room, Bathrooms, Kitchen, Bedrooms, Garden Unit, Yard , Deck & Parking

My Co-Host Dan is only a phone/text away.

Quiet area only a few neighbors on the street; Transportation recommended however,  everything you need is just a few minutes away. Enjoy a walk, run or bike ride in the nearby forest preserve. Or maybe the nearby Horse trails.

I-80, I-57 and 294 tollway are 3-5 minutes;  And there is a bonus,  Dan may be  available to be your private driver (fee based).

Stairs to enter first floor and stairs down to Garden unit.

access:
You will have access to the suite and its own patio exclusively.
A private entrance is located on the side of the building. A paved patio leads straight to this enclosed entrance.
description:
A modern and tastefully-decorated suite. The queen bed, quality linens and designer-curated touches make for a comfortable stay. 

The suite is perfect for business travelers or those wanting to explore all that Chicago has to offer. Conveniently located near the airport (10 minutes to O’Hare) and an easy train ride to downtown Chicago (20 – 30 minutes by CTA Blue Line). Street parking is free and plentiful.

This designer suite is bright, stylish and has been recently remodeled. Although the suite is located on the main level of our home, it is an entirely private space with a private entrance and en suite bathroom. We are respectful of our guests and keep noise to a minimum. 

Every corner of the space is well-used. Please check the floor plan to best understand the layout and dimensions.

The stylish bedroom fills with sunshine each morning. Drapes and blinds let you control how much light to let in. The queen bed’s firm mattress, fresh linens and white leather headboard combine comfort with attractive design. A luggage bench helps keep things neat and tidy. 

For entertainment, we include an Apple station, wireless keyboard and mouse in the bedroom area.

The kitchenette area includes a small folding table and two stools where you can enjoy take-out or your morning coffee. Coffee, tea, a coffee maker, mini refrigerator, wine glasses, cups, plates and flatware are also included. 

In the bathroom, we’ll provide towels, soap, shampoo, conditioner and a hair dryer.

You will have access to the suite and its own patio exclusively.
A private entrance is located on the side of the building. A paved patio leads straight to this enclosed entrance.

My husband or I will greet you for check-in. For any dog-lovers, our toy poodle Marlo can also greet you :)
 We live in the building and will be nearby ready to assist you. Let us know if you have any questions!

Our neighborhood is lively but not noisy. We love our neighbors, so please be respectful with them and us.

We are located at Oriole park, with tennis and basketball courts, a public library, public transportation, grocery stores and shopping are all within walking distance.

There is convenient public transit (CTA Blue line runs 24/7) and extremely easy street parking ( free)

Please confirm check in and check out times before booking.
We prefer no evening check ins, however we can discuss exceptions. 

Even though there is  is no kitchen, you will have the kitchenette with a table, two stools, coffee maker and minibar. This area is good not only for eating and storing some food, but also to do some work.
 Please remember : no washer and dryer either.

No smokers in the house,please!

1- Please: Do not make a reservation on behalf of someone else . 
The guest MUST be the person that has the airbnb account.

2- You  must be 21+ years old to make the reservation and or stay in our place as a guest . Sorry to disappoint you ;/

3- Never exceed the number of guests specified at the time of booking. 

4- Parties are not allowed .Our place is meant for a single person or a couple, occupancy is limited.

description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish River North furnished one-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and lovely living room with great high floor views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Chicago has to offer! (#CHI86)

Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your spacious living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this River North apartment has to offer.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:
  
- Doorman
- Pet Friendly
- Swimming Pool
- Gym
- Indoor Parking

- Bike Storage
- Elevator

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.

Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

This furnished apartment is located in River North, Chicago’s most trendy neighborhood. The bridges combined with the riverwalk offer incredible views. Nearby on Michigan Avenue is the city’s premier shopping area. One of the neighborhood’s biggest assets is the walk-to-work appeal. Young professionals, who live and work in the area, can quickly get to the office in the morning and just as easily enjoy an after-work drink, as the area is considered a premier entertainment center. Don’t miss a stroll on Kinzie and Hubbard streets. Merchandise Mart, the iconic building with showrooms, shops, and office space, is only a 5 minute walk. The Loop is just across the bridge and is about 5 minute walk.

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
house_rules:
- A passport or ID number and an address have to be provided upon confirming the booking as per building regulations. In case a guest does not provide the above, the check in will be cancelled
- Our Pet Policy outlines the weight limit and breed restrictions, along with related fees. Guests should notify us of any pets prior to check-in (failing to do so will incur a penalty)
- Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee.
- All occupants that plan to reside in the apartment may be subject to both a criminal and background check at any time. Participation is necessary to rent a property.
- Blueground has the right to enter and inspect the apartment or to show the apartment to a potential tenant any day of the week between 9am and 6pm as long as the tenant has been informed via email at least one day in advance
- Please contact us for details
interaction:
The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.

Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in River North, Chicago’s most trendy neighborhood. The bridges combined with the riverwalk offer incredible views. Nearby on Michigan Avenue is the city’s premier shopping area. One of the neighborhood’s biggest assets is the walk-to-work appeal. Young professionals, who live and work in the area, can quickly get to the office in the morning and just as easily enjoy an after-work drink, as the area is considered a premier entertainment center. Don’t miss a stroll on Kinzie and Hubbard streets. Merchandise Mart, the iconic building with showrooms, shops, and office space, is only a 5 minute walk. The Loop is just across the bridge and is about 5 minute walk.
notes: This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.
space:
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your spacious living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this River North apartment has to offer.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:
  
- Doorman
- Pet Friendly
- Swimming Pool
- Gym
- Indoor Parking

- Bike Storage
- Elevator
summary: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish River North furnished one-bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and lovely living room with great high floor views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Chicago has to offer! (#CHI86)

1. Prohibited: Video Shooting, bring people that is not in the reservation to visit you or to stay over, Small gatherings, family reunions, birthdays parties or any kind of celebrations. 
2. No smoke inside the house or building (any kind) 
3. Respect other Airbnb guests, belongings, food and other rooms.
4. Be quiet in the house and in the building anytime but specially after 9pm. You can listen music / movies with earphones, don’t talk / yell / scream / cry /laugh laud. Don’t make any sounds that could be uncomfortable to other guests.
5. Checkout from your room is by 10am and our checkout is firm because our team schedule. Checkout from your room after this time will end in extra 30$. Checkout after 11am will end in extra 60$. Checkout after 12pm will end in an open  file in airbnb plus 60$ fee (2 hours paid for management team) and your belongings would have to be removed since another guest will be checking in.
6. You can’t use stove or oven ! You can just use microwave, toaster, plates, glasses, cups, kitchen table, coffee maker, fridge, and everything you use you have to leave it clean right away. 
7. After use the shower / bathtub clean the hairs you left. Take your own amenities with you. Don’t leave it in the bathroom.
8. Booking for somebody else is not allowed unless agreed before booking.
9. Is not aloud sleep in common areas. 
10. Please don’t leave personal items in the bathroom(s). 
11. If you damage or lost any key the fee is 45$. 
12. We will send you missing items if you want but it will be 40$ plus shipping. If you or someone is going to pick up your items it must to be in less than three days. 

Ps: keys and missing items fees are: 20$ hourly rate of our manager plus 20$ Uber (go and return) plus the key 5$ , or the cost of shipping)

access: You can use the microwave and  toaster but not the Stove neither the oven. We have, plates, coffee maker, silverware, etc! You can use living room, hair dryer, iron. You will have WiFi, clean towels (1 p/person) sheets and comforter (1 per mattress)  , Shampoo (2in1), hand’s soap, body’s soap, toilet paper.
description:
If you want a place in a safe in a quiet neighborhood but very close to Downtown Chicago with great public transportation this is the spot!Chicago Blue Line is just 9min far by walk that will take you to the heart of downtown (Grant Park) and to O’hare Airport! Downtown sightings are between 10-15min by car and around 25 min by public transportation! 6-8min by car to United Center and 15min to McCormick Place! To know about amenities provided, the place and the neighborhood please keep reading!

This is a shared apartment with other Airbnb guests but if you want an entire place we may have other options that we can share! 

You will have 2 comfortable Full Size Bed in two private rooms! We want you feel very safe so your room is going to have its own lock and key and there are cameras in common areas. 

This is a private room in a shared place with other Airbnb guests and because of that we expect to keep the house very quiet all the time but specially after 9pm.

There are 4 rooms in the house and 2 bathrooms! 

There is few free parking on the street, and there is also an app that helps you to find paid parking anywhere in the city called spot hero!. 

*I only accept payments through Airbnb platform*

You can use the microwave and  toaster but not the Stove neither the oven. We have, plates, coffee maker, silverware, etc! You can use living room, hair dryer, iron. You will have WiFi, clean towels (1 p/person) sheets and comforter (1 per mattress)  , Shampoo (2in1), hand’s soap, body’s soap, toilet paper.

we are a team working to support our guests needs so just text me through airbnb app so we can follow all the details about your reservation and we can help you faster !

This place is very close to Downtown Chicago, it’s also a quiet  and nice neighborhood where you can even walk by night and feel safe (right in between West Town and West Loop Chicago) ) you can find  great restaurants, good bars and if you think there is not a better place to take a coffee and work as an Starbucks we have one just 2 blocks away! 

The style of everything inside the house is modern, cozy and minimalist but we have to say that the house is old! It’s a great place if you wan to be in a great neighborhood but our rooms are small and also common areas are.. We have full size bed in each room and we selected a kind of frame where you can put your luggage under it if you want to have more space in your room. Also our rooms has a small portable organizer, a tiny table, an stool and a table lamp.

This is a safe and night life neighborhood so you can walk around it but without forget it that you are in Chicago so don’t leave belongings at sight in your car. Parking is such a tough situation in Chicago although there are few streets where you can Free park around the house (Elizabeth street, Ada  Street) you can’t park in front of the airbnb , Parking is usually easy before 5pm, after 5pm is hard to find a free spot but not impossible. Just make sure 1) you read all signs posted in the street/ trees or fences that says information about street cleaning , reparation, disabilities parking, school days, permit parking, etc) also you are not over the crosswalk, near a hydrant, or wrong way.

Chicago Blue Line is just 9 min walk and also  bus 66, 65. Ashland Pink and Green Line are 15 min walk. United Center is 6min far by car/28min by public transportation. McCormick Place is 16min far by car/37min by public transportation. RushHospital  is 8min by car/21min by public transportation. Grant Park is 16 by car/21min by public transportation. The Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium and the Planetarium is 19 min far by car/37 min by public transportation.Navy Pier is 21 min far by car/28min by public transportation. Greyhound Bus Station is 11min far by car/21min by public transportation. O’hare is 34 min far by car/45 min by public transportation. Uber to Downtown are usually very cheap 5-12$ to specially if you choose the pool option! You can also can be there in 20-30 min my bike!

The rooms are  private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private studio in the area usually cost over 150$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being close to downtown, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! 

Each room has one full size bed. If you are a big group you can ask if we have available the other two rooms where you can accommodate until 8 people! 

We have cameras ON in common areas. We don’t have any camera / devices in private spaces as bedrooms or bathrooms. 

Is forbidden in this place: parties, small gatherings, to bring people who are not in the reservation neither as a visitor nor to stay over, family reunions, birthdays celebration, video shooting,  being noisy anytime but specially after 9pm, smoke and bring pets. 

We work based in all airbnb policies, terms and conditions including cancelation policy, so makes sure before you book to read carefully houses rules, cancelation policy and what is offered and what is not offered for us!

additional_house_rules:
Smoking allowed outside only.

Well behaved dogs and cats are allowed without additional fee if disclosed during booking. Booking guest responsible for any pet related damages, if incurred.

No illegal activity including drug use allowed on property (in or immediately outside house).

No unregistered guests allowed in house or overnight without host permission (ask first!).

House-key must be returned at end of stay ($5 lost key fee).

No removal of host or other guest property from the house without explicit permission.

Guests must be respectful and mindful of other guests staying in the house:
Guests must immediately clean-up common areas after personal use (bathroom, dining room, kitchen, living room, etc).
*Do not leave hair in the shower.
*Do not use others' personal products/items without explicit permission.

Failure to abide by house rules may be grounds for a  no-refund cancellation of booking or additional fee.

access:
Guests can access the first floor kitchen, bathroom, and living-room, as well as the clothing washer and dryer in the basement.

In the backyard patio, accessible via the back door that is few steps down from the kitchen, is a grill and shaded table.
description:
MUST BE DOG-FRIENDLY! The host and his canine companion reside on the first floor of the house.

The room available is actually the entire second floor of a house, best for groups or those who require a large space for themselves! The first floor has a living room, kitchen, and bathroom. The basement has a clothing washer/dryer.

Located in a nice neighborhood not far from downtown Chicago and airports. This is NOT a hotel. The experience you will have here reflects my suburban Chicago home!

MUST BE DOG-FRIENDLY! The host and his canine companion reside on the first floor of the house.

The space available is on the second floor of the house. Included is access to a personal heater, air conditioner, and pedestal fan for keeping your space comfortable and climate controlled to your liking. The first floor has a common living room with couch and TV, a bathroom, a kitchen, and a private bedroom that the host uses. There are newly finished hardwood floors throughout all the rooms, with tile in the bathroom and kitchen. The basement has a clothing washer and dryer, but there is also a very nice laundromat across the street! Out in the backyard is a patio and grill.

A smaller second bedroom on the first floor of the house is also listed on AirBnB, therefore there may be another group of guests in the house at the same time.

Guests can access the first floor kitchen, bathroom, and living-room, as well as the clothing washer and dryer in the basement.

In the backyard patio, accessible via the back door that is few steps down from the kitchen, is a grill and shaded table.

The host resides on the first floor of the house, but physical availability will depend on the day. Socialization, questions, or concerns will be best through text messaging.

Berwyn is a quiet family suburb right outside of Chicago. The infamous historic route 66 that connects Chicago to California runs through (known as Ogden avenue). It's located between O'Hare and Midway international airport, making both relatively easy to access!

Common near-by attractions include the "Galloping Ghost" arcade in Brookfield, the top-ranking Brookfield zoo, Freedom and Proksa parks in Berwyn. Tours through the Frank Lloyd Wright home and studio, as well as one of homes of writer Ernest Hemmingway are available in Oak Park.

Close proximity to lots of classic Chicago pizzerias like Lou Malgnati's makes getting a taste of Chicago's finest easy! Other good restaurant include Paisans for pizza/bar food and Lalo's for Mexican.

For those looking to drink, there is a bar down the street, but the best bars in town are "Cigars and Stripes", and "James Joyce", both on Ogden, and "Fitzgerald's" on Roosevelt if you're in the mood for music.

Located a little more than 2 miles away from the Stevenson expressway, travel downtown or to further-away suburbs is made easy!

Available on location is shared drive-way parking.

There's also a Metra BNSF station located only 1.0 mile north that can take you to Union Station, downtown. The pink line is 3.6 miles northeast and goes to the loop, downtown. The blue line is 4.3 miles north and goes through downtown before heading to O'Hare airport.

Parking of guest vehicles will usually be done in the driveway on the right side of the house. If there are multiples vehicles from multiple guests, an optimal parking situation will be determined by the host through communication with both parties.
house_rules:
Smoking allowed outside only.

Well behaved dogs and cats are allowed without additional fee if disclosed during booking. Booking guest responsible for any pet related damages, if incurred.

No illegal activity including drug use allowed on property (in or immediately outside house).

No unregistered guests allowed in house or overnight without host permission (ask first!).

House-key must be returned at end of stay ($5 lost key fee).

No removal of host or other guest property from the house without explicit permission.

Guests must be respectful and mindful of other guests staying in the house:
Guests must immediately clean-up common areas after personal use (bathroom, dining room, kitchen, living room, etc).
*Do not leave hair in the shower.
*Do not use others' personal products/items without explicit permission.

Failure to abide by house rules may be grounds for a  no-refund cancellation of booking or additional fee.
interaction: The host resides on the first floor of the house, but physical availability will depend on the day. Socialization, questions, or concerns will be best through text messaging.

access: Guests have Access to boat, dock, grill, pool ( Memorial Day to Labor Day),picnic area & playground and members only restrooms/showers which include washers and dryers. Party/meeting room available for a additional charge. Perfect for McCormick place location.
description:
Overnight Cruiser on Lake Michigan in new harbor
Cruise Packages offered for additional charge. (weather permitting)
5 minutes to McCormick Place 
Jet Ski & Paddle Board rental available in harbor (Memorial Day thru Labor Day)
Next door is beach w/deck & live music
Short walk to bike rental and lakefront trail
LODGING ONLY.

Live the marina life style and spend some time on the water this summer...literally. Cozy 33 foot express cruiser (Emerald Isle) located on Lake Michigan. A great view of the city and Chicago's newest harbor right next to 31st street beach awaits you. Great Location within 5 minutes of Museum Campus, Soldier Field, and McCormick Pace convention center. Guaranteed Rate Field is 10 minutes away. Near By Bike rental or Water taxi takes you right to Navy Pier.

Guests have Access to boat, dock, grill, pool ( Memorial Day to Labor Day),picnic area & playground and members only restrooms/showers which include washers and dryers. Party/meeting room available for a additional charge. Perfect for McCormick place location.

Upon request we would be happy to offer information on local restaurants and attractions. We are available 24 hours for any questions you make have.

Brand new marina located on the Lake front at 31st Street beach. Museum Campus less than 2 miles away which you can easily bike via the beautiful Lake Front Trail Bike path that spans the entire Chicago lake front. Hop on the  Water Taxi located next to the Shedd Aquarium on the museum campus that will take you straight to Navy Pier. Take Taxi/UBER or rent a bike to McCormick Place or Navy Pier in minutes. Visit the Neighborhood of Bridgeport and Catch A Chicago White Sox game (15 min bike ride) then have a burger and beer at the Cork & Kerry next to US Cellular field. Or my favorite, Flo & Santos's Polish/Italian restaurant in the South Loop, and get the Polish Pizza and Buffalo Pork Wings... to die for.

Bike rental located at entrance of marina and Uber picks up right in front. Short walk to Bus stop at the beach that will take you into the heart of the city. The Green line train is 1 mile bike ride or walk west on 31st street.

Daily week day rate is for lodging only. Captained cruise packages are available. Check out our web site for CHICAGO SCENIC CHARTERS  
Access code also gains entry to laundry facilities.

description:
Beautiful & classic Lincoln Park apartment. Top floor of a three flat. Spacious 3 bedroom with a living room and dining room with 7 seats (additional chairs available).  Amazing restaurants Alinea, Galit, North Pond, Blue Door Farm Stand, Summer House Santa Monica and Stella Barra are within walking distance. Oz Park is one block away. Within the shoreline park are North Avenue Beach, the Chicago History Museum, LP Conservatory and the free-admission Lincoln Park Zoo.

This space is perfect for a family to zen out with bunk beds, separate living room (with pocket doors) to watch a movie, two showers and a bath tub. Right around the corner from OZ park, the lakefront beach, many restaurants, coffee shops, museums and the zoo. We utilize a lockbox entry to provide keys for later arrivals.

We are a 7 minute walk from the Fullerton L stop. You can get anywhere in the city in 20 minutes and the airport in 45 minutes via L train or 30 minutes via uber.

Amazing restaurants Alinea, Galit, North Pond, Blue Door Farm Stand, Summer House Santa Monica and Stella Barra are within walking distance. Oz Park is one block away. Within the shoreline park are North Avenue Beach, the Chicago History Museum, LP Conservatory and the free-admission Lincoln Park Zoo.
transit: We are a 7 minute walk from the Fullerton L stop. You can get anywhere in the city in 20 minutes and the airport in 45 minutes via L train or 30 minutes via uber.

description:
Meticulously, and functionally, designed with guests in mind. Come and enjoy the comforts, and luxury, that this cozy space has to offer. Rest on a king-sized Sleep Number bed, shower in a marbled bathroom under a rain shower, or sip on a cup of coffee from your farmhouse-inspired chef's kitchen. Bright, airy, and inviting, this space will surely provide the escape that one would need after a long day in this great city of Chicago!

High end and unique, rear apartment, in a ranch style two unit home. No one living above, or below, you means you have the freedom, and peace and quiet, that you crave!

*Separate Private Entrance and Luggage Space (Drop off prior to arrival can be arranged if needed)

*Free Laundry Usage (on Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, and Sundays ONLY)

*Space is 520 square feet (48 m²)

*Free Wifi (Includes Netflix)

*Apple TV (iTunes is available for your convenience in case you'd like to order a movie in) 

*KING sized SLEEP NUMBER Bed (What's Your Number?)

*Queen sized plush top Serta Air Mattress 

*Phillips Light Therapy Wake Up Light/Alarm Clock 

*Nest Thermostat with built-in humidifier

*Samsung Add-Wash Stackable washer and dryer. Just found that random dirty sock in your luggage, yet the wash has already started? No problem, just throw it in the add-wash compartment and continue on with your day. 

*Alexa Assistant 

*Free Street Parking (first come, first served)

*Semi-Private Outdoor Space (pergola and patio seating set aside specifically for our Airbnb guests!)

- Semi Private Outdoor Space 

-Private Laundry Use (Sundays, Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays ONLY)

-Entire Private Unit

- Free Street Parking (there are no parking restrictions or permits needed for this block)

It is our ultimate goal at Dreams9 Airbnb that your stay is as welcoming and pleasant as possible. For that reason I, Eva, your host, in addition to my co-hosts Wanda and Hector (who live 2 blocks away from the property) are available, and at your service. We are a fun, travel loving, family. We will always strive to make your stay a great one!

You have the option to access the property independently with a lockbox, or if you'd prefer, an in person check in/call we can arrange for that as well.

Located in Dunning, a quiet northwest side neighborhood of Chicago. Live like a local by sampling great food and drink options within a 5-minute walk. Great for those looking to explore the sights in surrounding areas such as Rosemont, Park Ridge, O'Hare, and Elmwood Park.

Uber, Lyft, Convenient Public Transit, and use of the ample street parking.

(PLEASE NOTE OUR HOME IS LOCATED ON THE EDGE OF CHICAGO AND ELMWOOD PARK). This neighborhood is very safe at night. 

* 7 miles from O'Hare Airport, and 15 miles from Midway Airport

* 5 miles from the Rosemont Convention Center and MB Financial Park.

* 15 miles to downtown Chicago. If you plan to get around via bus and train please note that it is approximately an hour commute to downtown from my place. There is a blue line bus stop about a block away from the apartment for your convenience. 

*1/2 block walk to Belmont Ave. Bus Stop with transfer to Belmont Blue Line train station at Belmont and Kimball Ave. (Blue Line station goes directly into downtown and also transfers over to other CTA train lines).

Please review the house rules prior to booking!

*Host has multiple outdoor/exterior cameras on the premises in order to provide an extra layer of safety for guests and tenants. 

*Unit entrance is located behind a privacy gate at the rear of the home.

* Guests are only allowed to utilize the laundry services on set days of the week per the agreement with our other tenants. Please be courteous of all people who live  on the property. (Airbnb guest usage is limited to Tuesday, Thursday, Friday, and Sunday of every week)

* We have wonderful tenants who live in the front unit. We ask that all parties who consider booking this AirBnb be respectful of the fact that this is their home 24/7. Noise levels should be kept at a respectful level. ABSOLUTELY NO PARTIES ALLOWED WHATSOEVER.

access: You have total privacy in the penthouse and upper roof deck, and access to the kitchen on the floor below. If you're here for more than 3 days you can use the laundry facilities. The bed is real queen size.
description:
• In the heart of Lincoln Park
• Roof deck with city skyline view
• 2 blocks from EL, 8 minutes to Michigan Avenue
• Near the beach, zoo & parks
• 2 blocks from DePaul University
• Famous blues bars, restaurants and theaters in walking distance
• Refrigerator & microwave

I designed the penthouse with my architect father as my summer cottage in the city (12 months a year, treetop level). After a busy day, guests love the escape of sitting on the roof deck, away from it all, and yet in the middle of it all. Then you can retreat inside for quiet and comfort.

You have total privacy in the penthouse and upper roof deck, and access to the kitchen on the floor below. If you're here for more than 3 days you can use the laundry facilities. The bed is real queen size.

I respect my guest's wishes. Some people are very social, and we have become fantastic friends. Others are here for business or have busy schedules or just want their privacy. Either way is ok with me.

The El is 2 blocks away. Most bus routes are within 3 blocks.

access: You'll have your own bedroom with a ceiling fan, big window, and closet. All other space is shared with the kitty and me.
description:
Come stay in a comfortable, spacious 3rd-floor apartment with vintage decor, modern amenities and tons of natural light in the amazing Lincoln Square/Ravenswood neighborhoods. 
Friendly bars, restaurants, grocery stores, coffee shops, parks all around. Easy access to the lakefront, downtown, or Wrigleyville field—just a super convenient 3-minute walk to the brown line Western "L" stop. Bus lines also pick up right in front of apartment. Divvy bikeshare and free street parking are also available.

Beautiful hardwood floors. Vintage finishes and furniture mixed with tropical plants and modern art. Natural light on both the southern and western sides. Dishwasher and gas stove in full kitchen. Laundry on-site in basement. Large closets. Fast wifi. Ceiling fans in bedrooms and living room. Central AC and heat. Bathtub/shower with great hot water and pressure. LGBTQ friendly. 

Lou Malnati's (best deep dish in Chi!) down the street! 5 min walk to beautiful Welles Park and Lincoln Square downtown. 7 min walk to Aldi grocery store. 3 min walk to Western Brown Line stop (30 min ride to downtown Chi)! Minutes to bus connections via 49, 78, and 50. 

**Enjoy pour-over coffee and eggs or cereals for breakfast in the morning. Tea is also provided. 

**A full range of cookware and spices are available for your use. 

**As a break from touristing, take a nap on the couch or chill watching Netflix, Hulu, Prime, or local shows/movies on large Samsung TV.

**All-natural household- wool carpets underfoot, sleep on a CertiPUR queen bed in organic cotton sheets and down coverings, and in the kitchen, eco-friendly dishwashing soap and detergents.

**A friendly and beautiful cat lives here so folks with allergies please be aware.

You'll have your own bedroom with a ceiling fan, big window, and closet. All other space is shared with the kitty and me.

I love providing travel tips! I'll be coming and going to work M-F from about 8:45a to 6:30p and some evenings I have improv class. Saturday mornings I have comedy writing class, too. I'm happy to chat with you or leave you alone. My cat is also very friendly but can be shut out of your room.

Please reach out if you need anything :) Texting me directly will be the fastest way to reach me.

The neighborhood is super artsy and fun, great for foodies. Fantastic dive bar on corner with a Michelob Light sign hanging out front and partial walls- they have karaoke on the weekends. 

Delicious Kyrgyz restaurant called Jibek Jolu on Lincoln. Amazing food, BYOB. Pho’s Spicier Thai Cuisine is fantastic. 

Grind is a great coffee shop around the corner on Lincoln. 

Davis Theater (movies) around corner on Lincoln. 

A block south is Welles Park, which is beautiful grounds for hanging out, picnicking and bocce ball. Also a super cool restored wildflower prairie land corner. 

Check out the actual Lincoln Square, too- it has bookstores, restaurants, ice cream, a European grocery store, acupuncture, and festivals and farmers markets at different times.

Super easy to get around via public transportation! 3 min walk to Western Brown Line stop (30 min ride to downtown Chi)! Minutes to bus connections via 49, 78, and 50. Divvy/Lyft bikeshare stations also nearby. Street parking available.

Make yourself comfortable! 

My cat is furry so you may want to bring a lint brush in your bag.
house_rules:
**quiet hours from 10p-7:30a weekdays- it’s fine to come and go in the night but please try to be quiet for the neighbors and me :)
**no shoes in house
**no drugs

Please reach out if you need anything :) Texting me directly will be the fastest way to reach me.

Our 2 bedroom apartment is newly remodeled with sense of privacy and city living. It fits comfortably 4 max 6 and it is located on a quiet street few blocks from trail 606, nightlife, 
Private entrance

Comfortable, cozy, homey feelings.

Guess acccess to the unit is private and only staying guess can use it.

I live in the building and available for my guest if they need anything.

Neighborhood is very family oriented and quiet.

Easy access to blue line subway to airport.
From ohare airport exit western ave stop and walk 3 blocks to the unit.
Also #72 bus will take you to downtown, bars and shopping.

From the ohare airport you can take the train  to western stop and walk 4 blocks to the unit.  If you need assistance with anything you can call or text me. 773-968-4966

description:
Love art? Music? Food!? Then you'll definitely want to stay here and be close to the action! Minutes away from every major festival, Michigan Ave, the convention center in the city via the El, uber, or a nice walk.

Pilsen, ranked by Forbes magazine as one of the 12 coolest neighborhoods in the world!

Featuring streets lined with hip galleries and walls decorated with colorful murals dating from the 1970s, the Pilsen neighborhood is the heart of Chicago’s cutting-edge culture and art.

My apartment is a mid-century modern designed apartment that centers on the principle, “less is more.” Located in the heart of Pilsen, you’ll be across the street from the 18th street train station and staying on the same block as The National Museum of Mexican Art!

Bonus: just built a garden in the backyard! Feel free to visit the garden or bbq out back during your stay!

PS- natural light illuminates every corner of the apartment.

Work during the day, but available via text, whatsApp, or phone call.

Culture thrives in Pilsen and invites you to explore the treasures that wait around every corner. Here bold murals have blossomed in the most unexpected places — on the fronts of homes, along railway overpasses, and wrapped around train platforms. The artful vibe continues within storefront galleries and studios, as well as in the colorful collections of the National Museum of Mexican Art, a highly-regarded cultural institution.

If you're a foodie, say no more -- Pilsen's food offerings are some of the best in North America! Folks from around the city come to Pilsen to eat and drink. The food will literally melt in your mouth!

18th Street Pink Line, however, Chicago is totally walkable and Uber/Lyft is just minutes away.

access: Aside from my private bedroom and bathroom, you can have access to the kitchen (keurig available to use), living room (with Netflix/Hulu/DVDs), free in-unit laundry, and wifi.
description:
Fully furnished guest room with a private bathroom available for up to 6 months starting 1/1/20. All utiilities included: central heat/ac, dishwasher, in-unit laundry, cable internet, Apple TV. Room has a closet with built in drawers and shelves.

Two bedroom in a lovely and bright top floor condo with a big living room, a furnished kitchen and full bathroom in a safe and quiet neighborhood just a short walk from one of the most lively and alternative areas of Chicago.

The room is equipped with a standard full size bed, and there is a closet with space available if you need it. The room is about 10x11.

You will be sharing the condo with me - a mid-30s female working through a professional course at Northwestern University. I go out with friends but when I’m home, I enjoy binging Netflix shows and generally keeping a quiet, cozy place. 

My dog Bitsy is a 15-year-old Boston Terrier. At her age, she’s more like a cat than a dog and would prefer to cuddle and sleep rather than anything active. Unfortunately, she does not like other dogs, so no pets. While I keep her out of the guest room, a few random grey hairs may be inevitable on your belongings if you hang out in the living room.

Aside from my private bedroom and bathroom, you can have access to the kitchen (keurig available to use), living room (with Netflix/Hulu/DVDs), free in-unit laundry, and wifi.

I have my own room and back office so I'll be around,  but can definitely stay out of your hair.

The condo is located on the border of the Ukrainian Village and Humboldt Park neighborhoods, with tons of great restaurants, bars, shopping, and live music venues. It's a great and safe neighborhood with many bars and restaurants- quiet but very close to the 'scene'.

Just 2 minutes walking from Division Street or Western Avenue bus, which you can use to take downtown or transfer to the train- otherwise the blue line train is about a 15-20 minute walk. 

There is a Divvy (bike share) Kiosk located right near the apartment. 

Parking is free street parking, which is not difficult to obtain. Ubers are plentiful!

- The unit is a 3rd floor walk up with no elevators. I can help with your bags if I'm available, but there is no way around the stairs
- As noted above, there is a dog who lives here. She's very friendly and doesn't get in the way too much.

Two bedroom in a lovely and bright top floor condo with a big living room, a furnished kitchen and full bathroom in a safe and quiet neighborhood just a short walk from one of the most lively and alternative areas of Chicago.

The room is equipped with a standard full size bed, and there is a closet with space available if you need it. The room is about 10x11.

You will be sharing the condo with me - a mid-30s female working through a professional course at Northwestern University. I go out with friends but when I’m home, I enjoy binging Netflix shows and generally keeping a quiet, cozy place. 

My dog Bitsy is a 15-year-old Boston Terrier. At her age, she’s more like a cat than a dog and would prefer to cuddle and sleep rather than anything active. Unfortunately, she does not like other dogs, so no pets. While I keep her out of the guest room, a few random grey hairs may be inevitable on your belongings if you hang out in the living room.
summary: Fully furnished guest room with a private bathroom available for up to 6 months starting 1/1/20. All utiilities included: central heat/ac, dishwasher, in-unit laundry, cable internet, Apple TV. Room has a closet with built in drawers and shelves.
transit:
Just 2 minutes walking from Division Street or Western Avenue bus, which you can use to take downtown or transfer to the train- otherwise the blue line train is about a 15-20 minute walk. 

There is a Divvy (bike share) Kiosk located right near the apartment. 

Parking is free street parking, which is not difficult to obtain. Ubers are plentiful!

additional_house_rules:
RENTAL AGREEMENT

Please read this before reserving our property:

Be very clear about your intentions when booking our home. There are to be absolutely no parties or outside guests other than those stated clearly in your reservation. Be very clear about the number of guests you are hosting in our property. If this rule is violated, we will have your entire reservation cancelled and your group removed from the property immediately without refund. Do not let this happen to you. We do not like surprises, and want to ensure all expectations are clear so everyone can enjoy their stay! By booking our property, you are agreeing to the contract below in its entirety:

Guest agrees to comply with all Terms and Conditions stated below, which are an essential part of this Agreement; Guest acknowledges he/she has read, understands, and is familiar with all Terms and Conditions. Guest understands that as Manager, host is acting on behalf of the Unit Owner as a facilitator to provide accommodation services only. Guest acknowledges that he/she and his/her guests will not be staying at a hotel, but at a private residence with no staff and that any problem that may arise at the Unit that is not reported timely (during regular office hours on business days between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM) may not be addressed until the following business day, unless it is an emergency. Guest entering this Agreement represents himself/herself as agent for all parties occupying the Unit during the period of occupancy by Guest. Guest booking this unit must be at least 25 years of age and will be responsible for all other persons occupying the Unit and/or any other person(s) from time to time present in the Unit, for compliance with this Agreement, listed policies, ordinances, rules and regulations, and for any losses incurred by Owner and/or Manager or to the Unit due to the activities of any such persons, whether intentional, negligent, or otherwise.

ADDITIONAL OCCUPANTS: This unit can accommodate a maximum of the number of 6 guests; provided, however, that the overnight occupants of the Unit will be limited to those persons listed as occupants in the reservation. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in the event that more than the agreed number of occupants spend the night at the Unit, or more than the agreed number occupants are at any given time inside the Unit, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Rental Fees and Security Deposit provided by Guest will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary.

PARTIES AND NOISE: Quite hours must be respected (10PM-8AM.) Parties and/or events of any kind are strictly prohibited at the Unit. For the purposes of this Agreement, Owner and/or Manager will consider that there is a party inside the Unit whenever the number of daytime occupants in the Unit exceeds the number of guests outlined in the reservation. Notwithstanding the former provision, even if the number of guests is not exceeded, all other common definitions of a party will be accepted, whenever the noise level inside the Unit is beyond what is reasonably accepted as normal. Any violation of this rule will result in an immediate termination of the reservations and this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited, in addition to any costs associated with legal remedies that may be necessary. Guest agrees to keep the noise level inside the Unit under respectable levels, so as to not interfere with the peace and quiet of any person outside the boundaries of the Unit. Failure of Guest to adhere to this clause will be considered a breach of this Agreement. Any police enforcement actions will be at the sole risk and expense of the Guest.


SMOKING INSIDE THE UNIT OR WITHIN 25-FEET OF THE UNIT IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED: Guest agrees that smoking is prohibited in the Unit, including any patios or balconies, as well as any other common area in the building. Guest acknowledges and agrees that in case of any violation of this provision, this Agreement will be immediately terminated, the Unit must be vacated and the entire amount of the Fees and Security Deposit will be forfeited. A minimum charge of $250 will apply per reported incident.

LAWFUL PURPOSE: Guest agrees to use the Unit for legal and lawful purposes only. Any use of the premises that violates any international, federal, state, or local laws is grounds for immediate termination of this Agreement and eviction of Guest and all other occupants of the Unit. No firearms, explosives, or any other dangerous items or materials may be brought into the Unit.

PETS: Pets are not allowed in the property at anytime. If Guest brings a pet to the property, Guest risks forfeiting the Security Deposit. 

WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING: Plan on packing your personal toiletry items. Since we provide a limited supply of toilet paper, paper towels, and other dispensable items to get you started on your first day of vacation, you should plan on making a trip to the grocery store to replenish these items as you need them.

PARKING: Parking is available at the property for no more than 1 vehicle, and availability may vary, please consult manager for availability prior to completing the reservation.  

GUEST'S LIABILITY: Guest agrees to accept liability for any damages caused to the real and personal property (other than normal wear and tear) by Guest, other authorized occupants or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit during the period of Guest's occupancy, including, but not limited to, landscaping, misuse of appliances, and/or equipment furnished. 

FALSIFIED RESERVATIONS: Any reservations obtained under false pretenses will be subject to forfeiture of all monies paid to date of discovery of falsified information, including all Fees and the Security Deposit, and individuals providing false information will not be permitted to check in or occupy the Unit and will be required to vacate the premises immediately upon discovery of any such falsified information.

RIGHT TO ENTER: Owner and Manager have the right to inspect the Unit at any time for any purpose, including but not limited to repairs, maintenance, inspection, verification of Guest status, monitoring of proper use of the Unit, improvements to the Unit, enforcing the terms of this Agreement, showing the Unit to prospective buyers and/or prospective future guests, attending to an emergency, or for any other reason whatsoever. Owner and/or Manager will provide 1-hour notice to Guest by phone or email, except in case of an emergency when no notice is required.

NO INSURANCE: Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for the safety of Guest, any other occupants of the Unit, or any other persons from time to time present in the Unit. Guest, all occupants of the Unit, and all other persons from time to time present in the Unit, are responsible for their own safety and should maintain a safe environment while in the Unit by locking doors, windows, garage doors, setting alarms if provided, etc., when appropriate to do so. Guest acknowledges and agrees that Owner and Manager are not responsible for any items of personal property that may be lost, stolen or left behind in the Unit. Furthermore, Guest acknowledges and agrees that any homeowner's, renter's, or any other type of insurance that may be carried by Owner and/or Manager in connection with the Unit, does not cover the personal property of Guest or any other occupants of the Unit. Guest is encouraged to secure the appropriate travelers or vacation insurance and/or renters insurance, if such coverage is desired.

OWNER AND MANAGER NOT LIABLE: Owner and Manager do not assume any liability for loss, damage or injury to persons or their personal property while at or near the Unit. Neither do Owner and Manager accept liability for any inconvenience arising from any temporary defects or stoppage in supply of water, gas, electricity or plumbing. Nor will Owner and Manager accept liability for any loss or damage caused by weather conditions, natural disasters, acts of God, or other reasons beyond their control.

CHECK IN: Unless agreed differently by the Manager in writing, check-in is any time after 3:00 PM. Manager will send Tenant the instructions for a self check-in in advance, or keys or and entry-code will be provided at property location upon check-in. Keys will not be issued with a balance owing or without a signed rental agreement in the owners, or owner's representatives, possession. Once Tenant has checked into the unit or he/she has been granted access, Tenant accepts the condition, size and configuration of the Rental Premises in as/is where/is condition and accepts full financial responsibility per this agreement.

CHECK OUT: By 11:00 am. Charges for a late check-out not timely requested will be made against your security deposit for a minimum of the nightly rental fee. Please leave all keys, garage openers and such at the location. A $75 per item fee will be charged for each lost key, $120 for lost key fob and a $150 per parking transponder fee will be charged for each item not returned.

CLEANING: Each property will be inspected and cleaned after your departure. The cleaning fee you have paid will cover this. You are required to leave the property in the same general condition that you received it by making sure, dishes are done and put away, and the trash is generally picked up and ready to be vacuumed, dusted and sanitized. If additional cleaning is required, appropriate charges will be deducted from your security deposit at the rate of $50 per hour

WALKWAYS AND BALCONIES (SELECTED UNITS): The undersigned is fully aware that these can be dangerous, that the walkways/balcony and areas around can be slippery when wet, and that injury is likely to occur to anyone who is not careful. Tenants should observe and adhere to all rules and policies as posted at the property. With full knowledge of the above facts and warnings, the undersigned accepts and assumes all risks involved in or related to the use of the walkways/balcony.

PERSONAL PROPERTY LEFT BEHIND: If found, any items left behind will be mailed back upon request via USPS. The cost of shipping, shipping container and any packing materials will be deducted from the security deposit along with a handling fee.

access: Guest have full access to the unit, building amenities, and parking garage.
description:
First Airbnb experience, or a pro? We've got you covered with a promise to provide the best experience in Chicago. Our professional team & premium selection of high-end homes makes us the perfect solution for your business travels, temporary housing, vacation, and stay-cation needs. 

With us, you can expect the cleanest homes on Airbnb, with our professional housekeeping team cleaning & preparing the home for your arrival along with high quality premium bedding and soft towels for your comfort.

So, you wish to visit Chicago, the 3rd largest City in the country? Then why not see it from the sky, looking down. Upon entering our home you will be totally AWESTRUCK. The floor to ceiling glass panoramic view will leave you astonished. YOU WILL BE AMAZED! Our luxury 3 bedroom, 2 bath home so tastefully furnished will certainly cause you to be the envy of your family and friends with all the selfies you post on social media. THEY WILL FEEL YOUR EXPERIENCE. Now, as night falls on the City, enjoy the fireworks  show from Navy Pier, every Wednesday & Saturday from your own private outdoor balcony. Have you ever encountered an experience that you wished had never ended.?This is what many guests have expressed to us personally at the end of their stay. We have been honored to host guests from all over the world and our reviews speak for themselves. Question...when is the best time to reserve our home for your visit to Chicago? Answer... before someone else does.

Guest have full access to the unit, building amenities, and parking garage.

We are here as much and as little as you'd like. Were always a call/message away.

This downtown location offers shops, dining and attractions within walking distance. Check out Michigan Avenue or Navy Pier, then stroll through Millennium Park to Buckingham Fountain –it’s all just steps away!

Private chauffeur - Tesla Model S / Mercedes S550 (Contact for details & rates) 
Private Luxury Car rentals (Bentley Bentayga, Ferrari 458 Italia, Ferrari F430,  Lamborghini Huracan, Rolls Royce, MB S63 AMG, Range Rover Autobiography - Contact for details & rates) 
2 blocks from trains
Buses around the corner
Ample taxi and private cars
Door staff can call cab for you at request.

Please note that this is a private apartment building with a 24/7 concierge & security team. This is NOT a hotel. The other people that live in the building are full-time residents, so please be considerate and respect the fact that you are guests in a place others call home. The concierge team, while extremely friendly and helpful, is not a bellhop.

*Promotional Rate subject to change without notice.
*Some services listed are optional at the expense of the leasee 
*Please feel free to ask any questions or contact ue with any concerns.  
*All charges will be discussed before booking
*If you require a parking space, please mention this in your inquiry BEFORE confirming reservation - Limited Availability

PERSONAL PROPERTY LEFT BEHIND: If found, any items left behind will be mailed back upon request via USPS. The cost of shipping, shipping container and any packing materials will be deducted from the security deposit along with a handling fee.
interaction: We are here as much and as little as you'd like. Were always a call/message away.
neighborhood_overview: This downtown location offers shops, dining and attractions within walking distance. Check out Michigan Avenue or Navy Pier, then stroll through Millennium Park to Buckingham Fountain –it’s all just steps away!
notes:
Please note that this is a private apartment building with a 24/7 concierge & security team. This is NOT a hotel. The other people that live in the building are full-time residents, so please be considerate and respect the fact that you are guests in a place others call home. The concierge team, while extremely friendly and helpful, is not a bellhop.

*Promotional Rate subject to change without notice.
*Some services listed are optional at the expense of the leasee 
*Please feel free to ask any questions or contact ue with any concerns.  
*All charges will be discussed before booking
*If you require a parking space, please mention this in your inquiry BEFORE confirming reservation - Limited Availability
space: So, you wish to visit Chicago, the 3rd largest City in the country? Then why not see it from the sky, looking down. Upon entering our home you will be totally AWESTRUCK. The floor to ceiling glass panoramic view will leave you astonished. YOU WILL BE AMAZED! Our luxury 3 bedroom, 2 bath home so tastefully furnished will certainly cause you to be the envy of your family and friends with all the selfies you post on social media. THEY WILL FEEL YOUR EXPERIENCE. Now, as night falls on the City, enjoy the fireworks  show from Navy Pier, every Wednesday & Saturday from your own private outdoor balcony. Have you ever encountered an experience that you wished had never ended.?This is what many guests have expressed to us personally at the end of their stay. We have been honored to host guests from all over the world and our reviews speak for themselves. Question...when is the best time to reserve our home for your visit to Chicago? Answer... before someone else does.
summary:
First Airbnb experience, or a pro? We've got you covered with a promise to provide the best experience in Chicago. Our professional team & premium selection of high-end homes makes us the perfect solution for your business travels, temporary housing, vacation, and stay-cation needs. 

With us, you can expect the cleanest homes on Airbnb, with our professional housekeeping team cleaning & preparing the home for your arrival along with high quality premium bedding and soft towels for your comfort.

2 blocks from trains
Buses around the corner
Ample taxi and private cars
Door staff can call cab for you at request.

additional_house_rules:
- Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.  

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check out/lost key penalty  
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises unless you are in a designated smoking area.  Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance.  
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily.  
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property unless previously approved and pet fee paid. 
6.) Please do not use the fireplace. 
7.) Any garbage or items left in the back yard or on the back deck will result in $250 being withheld from the security deposit.  
8.) The house cannot be entered from the rear if nobody is home, you must enter through the front using the keypad locks.
9.) Please respect your downstairs neighbors by being considerate of noise, especially during quiet hours.

access: You'll have full access to my 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo, as well as the private patio and shared backyard.
description:
*SPECIAL* Jan-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Our second-floor 4 bedroom condo in Wrigleyville / Lakeview is newly renovated and stylishly decorated - it sleeps 12, and features semi-private covered deck that overlooks the shared backyard. From here, you can get to the Loop in under a half hour, and walk to Wrigley Field in under five minutes. You'll love to call this home while in Chicago for a few days - book today!

You enter our home into an open living room and dining room; a - non-functional but very charming - fire place is in the dining room. Just off the living room is one bedroom, with a queen bed, and down the hallway there are three additional bedrooms, one with a king bed and two with queens, and two bathrooms - finally, at the rear of the house is our newly renovated kitchen with a door out to the covered deck.

You'll have full access to my 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo, as well as the private patio and shared backyard.

My concierge is standing by to help with whatever you may need.

Wrigleyville is a lively part of the Lakeview neighborhood that sits in the shadows of historic Wrigley Field, the second oldest stadium in baseball, and home to the Chicago Cubs. There are great bars along Clark, Addison, and Sheffield Avenues.

We're steps to the Sheridan red line station, and near multiple bus lines.

As an extra benefit, my home is very close to one of Chicago's iconic 'L' lines. While extremely convenient for getting around the City, you may hear the trains come by on occasion. The noise is minimal when the windows are closed, and I have provided earplugs in the unit for those sensitive to noise.

- Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.  

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check out/lost key penalty  
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises unless you are in a designated smoking area.  Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance.  
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily.  
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property unless previously approved and pet fee paid. 
6.) Please do not use the fireplace. 
7.) Any garbage or items left in the back yard or on the back deck will result in $250 being withheld from the security deposit.  
8.) The house cannot be entered from the rear if nobody is home, you must enter through the front using the keypad locks.
9.) Please respect your downstairs neighbors by being considerate of noise, especially during quiet hours.
interaction: My concierge is standing by to help with whatever you may need.
neighborhood_overview: Wrigleyville is a lively part of the Lakeview neighborhood that sits in the shadows of historic Wrigley Field, the second oldest stadium in baseball, and home to the Chicago Cubs. There are great bars along Clark, Addison, and Sheffield Avenues.
notes: As an extra benefit, my home is very close to one of Chicago's iconic 'L' lines. While extremely convenient for getting around the City, you may hear the trains come by on occasion. The noise is minimal when the windows are closed, and I have provided earplugs in the unit for those sensitive to noise.
space: You enter our home into an open living room and dining room; a - non-functional but very charming - fire place is in the dining room. Just off the living room is one bedroom, with a queen bed, and down the hallway there are three additional bedrooms, one with a king bed and two with queens, and two bathrooms - finally, at the rear of the house is our newly renovated kitchen with a door out to the covered deck.
summary:
*SPECIAL* Jan-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Our second-floor 4 bedroom condo in Wrigleyville / Lakeview is newly renovated and stylishly decorated - it sleeps 12, and features semi-private covered deck that overlooks the shared backyard. From here, you can get to the Loop in under a half hour, and walk to Wrigley Field in under five minutes. You'll love to call this home while in Chicago for a few days - book today!
transit: We're steps to the Sheridan red line station, and near multiple bus lines.
