• Check-in is anytime after 3PM
• No parties or events
• No pets
• No smoking

All shoes must be taken off at the door. Feel free to bring house slippers. No pets. Please be energy conscious and turn off lights and electronics when leaving. Please also clean up after use the common areas such as the kitchen (especially dishes and appliances), hallway bathroom, living and dining rooms.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules:
Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to the designated location by the agreed upon check-out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out penalty.
3.) Absolutely no smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property unless previously approved and pet fee paid.
6.) Please remove your shoes once inside.

Please note the location of our home to ensure it is a good fit. Our proximity to the United Center means that there will be foot traffic on the adjacent streets during concerts, Bulls & Blackhawk games, and other events.

access: You'll have full access to my 3BR/2BA apartment, and shared access to the basement laundry room.
description:
*SPECIAL* Dec-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Our light-filled 3 bedroom apartment was thoughtfully decorated, & makes for a perfectly comfortable space for your group - best of all, it's walkable to the United Center! With 2 full bathrooms, it's ideal for groups traveling together, & since we recently rehabbed the building, it's practically brand new! We're just a half-mile west of the West Loop, too, so it's an easy walk to some of the city's best restaurants, bars, & shops!

This a spacious unit that has been completely remodeled. It has 3 beds and 2 bathrooms, updated kitchen, free street parking, and access to a common laundry room. Extremely close to the United Center and a Blue Line stop. Be downtown in less than 10 min.

You'll have full access to my 3BR/2BA apartment, and shared access to the basement laundry room.

I am always available for any questions or issues that arise.

The condo is located in the Near West Side, steps away from the United Center and just minutes from Chicago’s hottest neighborhood - the West Loop. Other West Side neighborhoods, such as Wicker Park, Logan Square, Ukrainian Village and West Town are also just minutes away and well worth a visit during your visit in Chicago!

Approximately 5 min walk to the Illinois Medical District Blue Line station which goes straight to downtown and O'Hare Airport. Also located next to the 126/Jackson bus route which takes you right to Michigan Ave., and the 50/Damen bus, which takes you right into Wicker Park. It's easy to get around town without a car from here!

In addition to our proximity to the United Center, we also enjoy easy access to and from O'Hare Airport, and conveniently located near Malcolm X Community College, Rush, and UIC. It's a 15 minute walk to Union Park and Randolph Street Market, and a 10 minute drive to Google's Chicago Office, as well as McDonald's HQ. And, since we're so close to downtown, all of Chicago's sights - the Art Institute, the Bean, Maggie Daley Park - are just a quick bus ride away!
house_rules:
House Rules:
Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to the designated location by the agreed upon check-out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out penalty.
3.) Absolutely no smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property unless previously approved and pet fee paid.
6.) Please remove your shoes once inside.

Please note the location of our home to ensure it is a good fit. Our proximity to the United Center means that there will be foot traffic on the adjacent streets during concerts, Bulls & Blackhawk games, and other events.

access: The guest has access to the entire apartment as well as the washer and drying located in the basement of the apartment.
description:
Newly renovated and furnished apartment unit one block away from the oak park art district.  Comes with a full kitchen to fulfill any and all of your cooking needs.  As well as one bedroom with a queen size bed capable of sleeping 2.  0.6 miles to Chicago public transportation's Blue Line train taking you to the heart of downtown chicago in only 30 minutes.  Also if you have a vehicle the apartment is only 0.6 miles from the 290 highway that can be taken to any neighborhood in chicago.

The apartment has a enough space to live 2 adults very comfortably.  If you are staying for a longer period of time the apartment also has a full 4'x8' closet for storage of luggage, extra cloths, ect. The living room has one couch that seats 2 comfortable and a chair for individual seating.

The guest has access to the entire apartment as well as the washer and drying located in the basement of the apartment.

I live in oak park about 5 minutes away from the apartment and am available to assist the guests in any way at all hours.  I can be reached via phone call, text message, or messaging through the Air bnb app.

the apartment is about 0.6 miles away from the blue line train which takes you straight downtown and can also take you to and from Ohare airport.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $500 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

description:
Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive

- In-suite laundry
- Fully-equipped kitchen 
- Private terrace

Building amenities
- Rooftop lounge 
- Communal grilling space

Lakeview highlights
- Walkability score: 96
- 4 minute walk to Lowcountry Lakeview (southern seafood boils)
- 10 minute walk to DMK Burger Bar (creative burgers and craft cocktails)

Getting around
- 1 block to Belmont train station 
- 30 minute drive to downtown
- 50 minute drive to ORD Airport

Booming with art and culture, Lakeview offers endless entertainment and food options, and some of the city's best Lake Michigan views. Cubs fans can catch a game at Wrigley field, outdoor-enthusiasts can take a stroll along Lakefront Trail, and food-lovers can enjoy everything from global-inspired dishes to Chicago-style pizza. With a perfect mix of old and new, locals and travelers alike flock to this neighborhood to soak up all that Chicago has to offer.

There’s no cable. We’ve provided an HDMI cord for streaming.

This apartment is available for stays of 30 nights or more. If this Sonder isn't open for your dates, please contact us to see what else we have available.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.
neighborhood_overview: Booming with art and culture, Lakeview offers endless entertainment and food options, and some of the city's best Lake Michigan views. Cubs fans can catch a game at Wrigley field, outdoor-enthusiasts can take a stroll along Lakefront Trail, and food-lovers can enjoy everything from global-inspired dishes to Chicago-style pizza. With a perfect mix of old and new, locals and travelers alike flock to this neighborhood to soak up all that Chicago has to offer.
notes:
There’s no cable. We’ve provided an HDMI cord for streaming.

This apartment is available for stays of 30 nights or more. If this Sonder isn't open for your dates, please contact us to see what else we have available.
space:
- In-suite laundry
- Fully-equipped kitchen 
- Private terrace

Building amenities
- Rooftop lounge 
- Communal grilling space

Lakeview highlights
- Walkability score: 96
- 4 minute walk to Lowcountry Lakeview (southern seafood boils)
- 10 minute walk to DMK Burger Bar (creative burgers and craft cocktails)

Getting around
- 1 block to Belmont train station 
- 30 minute drive to downtown
- 50 minute drive to ORD Airport
summary:
Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive

access: The Den is the perfect space to relax and hang out or to get some work done. A guest kitchen is available for food storage and meal preparation. Fitness Center and Coin-operated laundry facilities are on-site.
description:
Join us at Freehand Chicago Hotel for your travels in Chicago. Perfect for travelers here too long for a traditional hotel or for just 1 night; make us your home away from home.

This listing is for one bunk for one person in a shared female only room with 4 bunks (up to 3 roommates). We have many options such as private standard rooms and private quad rooms. Please send us a message with any questions.

$2 nightly resort fee

Somewhere between a hostel and hotel, you'll find the amenities you need to get through anywhere from a week to a few months. This listing is for one twin bunk in a shared room with four total bunks, so you would have up to 3 roommates. The room has a private bathroom and lockers for storing valuables. Each bunk features a curtain for privacy, reading lamp, and power outlet. Linens and towels are included, as is regular housekeeping service. One piece of luggage, one personal item (such as a book bag), and 3-4 hanging item of clothing permitted.

Please ask the front desk if you need complimentary extra towels, blankets, or toiletries (shampoo, soap, lotion, etc).

The Den is the perfect space to relax and hang out or to get some work done. A guest kitchen is available for food storage and meal preparation. Fitness Center and Coin-operated laundry facilities are on-site.

Our front desk is staffed 24-hours per day for check-in, check-out, and to assist you with other requests.

The Freehand Chicago is near the corner of Ohio and State st. It is downtown in the heart of River North, 1 block from the Magnificent Mile, 1 block across the River from The Loop, and a quick walk, bus, train, or taxi to anywhere you need to go.  Check out Cafe Integral and Broken Shaker for your breakfast, lunch, dinner, and drink needs - we are also conveniently located across the street from Jewel, a major grocery store chain.

We are 1 block North of the Grand Red Line train stop (CTA) and accessible to several bus routes. Additionally, there are always taxis and ride shares in the area.

Your room and tax will be prepaid through Airbnb, but the hotel requires a $50 deposit for incidentals on a card at check in per room, per stay. We do not accept gift cards, prepaid cards, or cash for incidentals. The deposit will be released back to your card at checkout provided you do not charge anything to your room. It takes most banks 3-7 business days to process the release.

$2 nightly resort fee

additional_house_rules:
BANGTEL Welcomes You and Your Group
 
EARLY CHECK-IN / LATE CHECK-OUT
May be possible pending availability. Rates are as follows:
1-3 hours of standard check-in/check-out time $50
3+ hours subject to a half day rate or standard $125
 
CHECK-OUT TIME
Check-out time is prompt at 11 AM.  We would love to let you stay forever, but the issue is we have someone checking in right after you.  If you have not been approved for a late check-out, you will be subject to a $50 fine each 15 minute interval that you delay the Cleaning Team.  We value our Cleaner's Team time and work and hope you do as well.  A delayed checkout only causes stress and extra work for them.   We hope you understand, so please make sure to check out on time in order to avoid any fine.  If a late checkout time is mandatory, please make sure to make arrangements upon booking.  We will do our best to accommodate your request pending availability.  

SECURITY 
Must provide copy of photo ID upon booking via the message center or via email to stay@bangtel.com 
 
PHOTOSHOOTS/FILMS
If you are booking for a Photoshoot or Production, we have special rates for you and all shoots must be approved prior to booking. 
 
PARTIES / EVENTS
Additional refundable security deposit will be taken for parties and events.  

Additional fees apply for any guests over the maximum allowed number of guests on the listing.  Parties and event fees are based on a case by case basis, number of guests, and duration of the event. 

NOISE
Please respect your neighbors with late night noise after 10 PM.  
The building is a shared apartment building.  Therefore, please be respectful with noise in the hallways and closing doors quietly.
 
PARTY GLITTER & CONFETTI FEE
Those small little shiny fun circles are not fun at all for our cleaning team to pick up.  They are actually a nightmare for the clean-up team and we politely warn you that there will be an additional fee for sprinkling glitter or confetti.  Please note, you are more than welcome to wear that lovely sequined jumpsuit, by all means bring it to the party. ;-)
 
SHOES
No matter how fabulous your shoes are we do ask that you PLEASE remove them when in the house.
 
NO SMOKING PLEASE
There is absolutely no smoking allowed in the unit.  You are welcome to smoke outside, but please dispose in the provided ashtrays. There is a $500 fine for smoking in the unit.
 
PETS
Can be allowed with approval prior to your stay and costs $125 pet fee per pet.  A portion of the pet fee goes to support The Hit Living Foundation, a charity that supports animal and human welfare.  
 
CHECKOUT INSTRUCTIONS / CLEANUP
Please clean up and discard all your trash prior to your departure.  
 
Please also shut and lock all doors and windows. 

Make sure the each front door/elevator key fob is returned to the dining table in each unit.  There will be a $150 lost key fee per key fob, if not returned. If someone from your group leaves with the key fob(s) upon checkout, we need to receive the key back within one week of checkout or you will be charged.  Please provide a tracking # if shipped. 
 
EVERYDAY IS EARTH DAY 
We kindly ask that you turn the lights out daily when you leave for the day during your stay, turn the air con up or heat down, and recycle.  If you are cranking the air con, by all means enjoy, but please make sure the windows are closed.  
 
We have large recycle bins for your use and directives on the refrigerators, so you can see what is recyclable.

access: You have access to the entire two apartments, their two patios, and large rooftop.
description:
Right in the mix (literally) of all the fun Wicker Park has to offer.  This 5 bedroom space with 2 kitchens and 2 living areas PLUS 3 bathrooms will have everyone feeling like they have all the room.  Take the elevator up to the palatial roof deck that has city views just as good as The Robey Hotel bar's across the street.  Grill on the double wide propane Weber or chill at night around the lux roof firepit.

Gorgeous side by side apartments with a giant rooftop for chillin and grillin!

You have access to the entire two apartments, their two patios, and large rooftop.

We encourage you to call, text, or message us on the Airbnb app with any issues or questions.

Wicker Park has everything including the best restaurants, parks, shopping, and bar crawls.  We are even right next to the Blue line so you won't have to walk far to hit downtown or get to and from O'Hare airport.

The Blue Line L stop is 1 block away and it is the North/Damen/Milwaukee Blue Line and a half hour from O’Hare Airport. There are 6 parking spots in the back alley of the property that can be reserved via the Spot Hero app.  We recommend Uber or Lyft for taxi service right from your doorstop.

.Ask us about our Concierge Service or Party Planner for dinners and Bachelorette Parties.

transit: The Blue Line L stop is 1 block away and it is the North/Damen/Milwaukee Blue Line and a half hour from O’Hare Airport. There are 6 parking spots in the back alley of the property that can be reserved via the Spot Hero app.  We recommend Uber or Lyft for taxi service right from your doorstop.

additional_house_rules:
PETS
No pets allowed. If there is pet hair to be cleaned, there will be a $20/fee. 

SMOKING 
Only outside the house. If there is evidence of indoor smoking, there will be a $20/fee.

BEDROOM USE
We offer the lowest cleaning fee in the city at only $40. Most places charge up to $120. To keep our low rates we ask the following:

Single guests and couples can only use 1 bedroom, otherwise there will be a fee of $10/night when the second bedroom is used due to additional cleaning time and laundry. 

This is also why there is an additional charge of $10/night/guest when more than 2 guests book. Again it helps cover the additional cleaning cost for the second bedroom.

SCHEDULE 
Check-out 11 AM 
Check-in 3PM

access: The entire unit is for guests only.
description:
5-star rated new listing. Limited time offer! Get 50% OFF on 2+ nights. Single nights get last minute discounts. Best $ for the size [ ]

Bohemian attic with 2 beds 1 bath in a classic Chicago home that is located on a quiet tree-lined street, near many food spots. 

Comfy beds, Roku Smart TV, 60 mbps internet, free beverages & snacks. 

Ideal location between 2 train lines that take you to all must-see neighborhoods:
• Brown line: Lincoln Park, Old Town. 
• Blue line: Logan Square, Bucktown.

The attic is a completely separate unit with private back entrance, self check-in, and free street parking. You do not share the living space with others. 

HOME —This is a classic Chicago home built over 100 years ago that features wooden floors, a claw foot bathtub, and separate kitchen and living areas. 

KITCHEN —The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking and a high-grade filtered water tank. All of our guests get free beverages and snacks. Small dining table fits 2 people. 

BEDROOMS—The bedrooms have queen size beds and dressers. There is a portable heater unit in each room. We store extra linens, towels, and blankets to make sure you are comfortable. 

BATHROOM—The bathroom is a traditional claw foot bath that is raised higher than a regular bathtub and you have to take a bigger step to get in. There is a shampoo and shower gel dispenser attached to the wall in front of the shower head, and we have extra shower items behind the sink mirror. 

FURNITURE—The furniture is curated from around the world featuring pieces from South and Central America, Europe, South Korea, Thailand, Egypt, Turkey, and Israel. 

DISCLAIMER: some of our guests have reported seeing bugs in the apartment likely due to being an attic unit and a 100+ year old home. We have taken several measures to minimize the number of bugs including hiring an exterminator, scheduling bug maintenance cleans, placing insect traps, and ultrasound devices that are safe for humans and pets. We also provide insect sprays in the common spaces and the rooms in case you want to use one. In spite of this, we cannot promise we can get rid of all the insects but we will continue to do our best to keep the premises as insect free as possible.

The entire unit is for guests only.

Everything is automated to make your stay seamless however you can text me at any time for questions or advice.

Irving Park is a residential and peaceful neighborhood in the Northwest side of Chicago. It's very multicultural with Latino, Asian & American cuisines & grocery stores.

DRIVING
∞ Free (no permit) street parking with lots of spaces
∞ 20 min ride to O'Hare airport without traffic
∞ 5 min ride to Express Way (I-90/95) 

PUBLIC TRANSPORT 

“If you are relying on public transport to get downtown or to the airport, the home is about 15-20 minute walk to the brown to blue CTA lines. It’s a 15 minute ride to O’Hare & a 20-35 minute ride to downtown depending on where you’re going.” — Emily.

Chicago Public Transit (CTA) takes you to must-see neighborhoods in Chicago like Logan Square, Wrigleville, Boystown, Lincoln Park, and many more. Our guidebook tells you all the stops and what neighborhoods and spots you can check out as if you were a local  :)

Trains
∞ Brown Line (15 min walking, 5 min bus ride) 
∞ Blue Line (5 min bus ride) 

Bus 
∞ Irving Park #80
∞ Kimball #82

A CTA ride includes 2 transfers within 2 hours, so you can take the bus by our home and then transfer to the train—and viceversa—to get everywhere. Alternatively you can buy a 1, 3, 7 day CTA pass for unlimited rides including the airport.

additional_house_rules:
We get many inquiries about the "No Parties and Events Allowed" rule which is intended to apply to the typical loud, alcohol-fueled type of blow out party where several dozen people show up and annoy the neighbors and invite the cops to pay you a visit. Of course we invite our guests to celebrate a birthday, wedding, anniversary, etc so long as it is kept to a respectful level and doesn't get out of hand (as described above). Also strongly discouraged are groups of guests going outside to smoke and making a lot of racket outside. We have a strict no smoking in the house policy, so please be respectful of the neighborhood if you must go outside to smoke.

Also, when booking your trip, please be fair and honest about the number of guests actually staying overnight at the house. We've had several bookings that list 4, 2, or even 1 adult, but show up with 12. If it becomes apparent that this is the case, you will be asked to update your reservation on the AirBnB website to reflect the actual number of guests staying in the house, which may affect the cost of your stay. If you haven't yet made a reservation and you are unsure of how many people will be staying, you can always update the reservation later with the correct number of guests when you know.

description:
Bob's House is a lovely 3 story home located in historic Norwood Park, one of the safest and best neighborhoods in Chicago. It’s perfect for large groups, families, reunions, or weddings and is just a short 8 minute walk from the CTA Blue Line train which gets you to O’hare airport in 10 minutes and downtown Chicago in 30 minutes. This classic Chicago themed house features photo walls of famous landmarks and people and includes a Mason & Hamlin grand piano for serenading and sing-a-longs.

Bob’s House…
- Includes complimentary beverages and soft drinks upon your arrival

- Includes complimentary breakfast makings for the morning, coffee, tea, toast, eggs, bacon, cereal, juice, all included

- Classy & chic 3 level house with loads of modern appointments and cool Roman columns in the living room

- Six bedrooms with nine beds, sleeps 14 comfortably, 3 baths

- Large 10' X 16' deck with double French doors that open up off the rear sun room

- Chicago themed house with photo murals of famous Chicago landmarks and people throughout

- There's a long 150' driveway on the property where you and your guests can all park. In addition there's a 2 car parking apron in front of the garage.

- 8 minute walk to blue line train downtown or O’hare airport. 8 minute walk to Metra train downtown or NW suburbs

- Huge 8 person dining room table with 4 additional bars stools at the granite counter eat-in kitchen

- Mason & Hamlin 1913 AA 6’ grand piano tuned and ready to play with plenty of music books

- Giant 65” 4K Chromecast smart TV and Sonos wireless music system in living room

- Super cool retro record player with 8-track tape deck and lots of vinyl & 8 track tapes to explore

- Bedroom 5 doubles as an entertainment /game room & office with PlayStation3 game system on a giant 60” Panasonic plasma TV. Play Blu-ray, DVD's, Netflix, Amazon, and regular HD network TV.

- Business ready with office desk, EPSON usb printer, and office supplies

- Lots of books and games to keep you entertained

- Stuff for Kids, too...toys, games, books, ride on toys, Pac-N-Play, 1 high chair & 1 booster chair

- Airy bright sun room back porch with double French doors for coffee and the morning paper

- Great for large families, groups, retreats, reunions, weddings, funerals

- Free Electric Vehicle charge station

- Open and airy, sunny and bright, situated on a wide tree-lined street

- All beds feature brand new super comfy Zinus memory foam mattresses and Beckham Hotel Collection Gel Pillows with brushed micro fiber 1800 sheet sets and pillow cases.

- Well stocked with spices, oils, condiments, tupperware, and all kitchen utensils

- Laundry room with washer/dryer, iron & ironing board, detergents, softeners, starch, folding table, laundry sink

I am on hand for anything you may need or any issues you may encounter. But odds are you probably won't see me at all and I will respect your privacy.

Norwood Park is one of the safest neighborhoods in Chicago and is very family oriented with many police and firefighters living here. There is an up and coming “downtown” area featuring excellent restaurants such as Mo Daley’s Pub & Grille, Bangkok Belly, Iron Horse Ale House, Nonna Silvia’s, and Lucky Grill. For grocery, there's Whole Foods, Costco, Target, and Mariano's all 2 miles away. We recently got our first high end liquor store at Norwood Wine & Spirits. Nearby, the adjacent neighborhoods of Edison Park and Park Ridge have loads of excellent restaurants and night life. Rosemont Entertainment District is a short ride toward O’Hare on the CTA Blue Line train and features a sort of Disney-like fake city with an Irish/DJ club (Five Roses), a billiards-gaming-bowling alley (Kings), Brazilian Steak House (Fogo De Chao), premium movie theater (AMC Muvico), comedy club (Zanies), indoor skydiving (iFly), and of course the Donald E. Stephens Convention Center.

The nearby CTA Blue Line train is a super convenient and cheap ($2.25) way to get around Chicago and inter-connects with other CTA train lines including the Red, Brown, Green, Orange, Yellow, Pink, and Purple lines. In addition, many CTA bus lines connect with the trains…You won’t need a car at Bob’s House to get anywhere you want to go in Chicago, but of course Uber and Lyft are also excellent and inexpensive ways to get around. You can get an Uber or Lyft driver to pick you up here within 5 minutes of ordering.

Who’s Bob, anyway ?
Bob grew up in this very house when it was brand new in 1922 at the start of the roaring 20’s. I made friends with Bob and he was an endless wealth of knowledge and entertainment about the people who had lived on the block over the decades. He knew a lot about Chicago as well, being a retired professional cab driver. He was a spry 86 years old, still mowing the grass on this enormous property when he decided to downsize and move to a retirement village down the street. I bought the house from him and decided to re-envision it into a vacation rental, adding all the modern appointments while maintaining that Chicago class and charm that was built into the original design. Bob can still be spotted around the neighborhood cruising in his huge Buick LeSabre old man car.

Update Feb 2018: Bob sold his LeSabre and has been spotted driving a white Chevy Malibu around the neighborhood.
house_rules:
We get many inquiries about the "No Parties and Events Allowed" rule which is intended to apply to the typical loud, alcohol-fueled type of blow out party where several dozen people show up and annoy the neighbors and invite the cops to pay you a visit. Of course we invite our guests to celebrate a birthday, wedding, anniversary, etc so long as it is kept to a respectful level and doesn't get out of hand (as described above). Also strongly discouraged are groups of guests going outside to smoke and making a lot of racket outside. We have a strict no smoking in the house policy, so please be respectful of the neighborhood if you must go outside to smoke.

Also, when booking your trip, please be fair and honest about the number of guests actually staying overnight at the house. We've had several bookings that list 4, 2, or even 1 adult, but show up with 12. If it becomes apparent that this is the case, you will be asked to update your reservation on the AirBnB website to reflect the actual number of guests staying in the house, which may affect the cost of your stay. If you haven't yet made a reservation and you are unsure of how many people will be staying, you can always update the reservation later with the correct number of guests when you know.

space:
Bob’s House…
- Includes complimentary beverages and soft drinks upon your arrival

- Includes complimentary breakfast makings for the morning, coffee, tea, toast, eggs, bacon, cereal, juice, all included

- Classy & chic 3 level house with loads of modern appointments and cool Roman columns in the living room

- Six bedrooms with nine beds, sleeps 14 comfortably, 3 baths

- Large 10' X 16' deck with double French doors that open up off the rear sun room

- Chicago themed house with photo murals of famous Chicago landmarks and people throughout

- There's a long 150' driveway on the property where you and your guests can all park. In addition there's a 2 car parking apron in front of the garage.

- 8 minute walk to blue line train downtown or O’hare airport. 8 minute walk to Metra train downtown or NW suburbs

- Huge 8 person dining room table with 4 additional bars stools at the granite counter eat-in kitchen

- Mason & Hamlin 1913 AA 6’ grand piano tuned and ready to play with plenty of music books

- Giant 65” 4K Chromecast smart TV and Sonos wireless music system in living room

summary: Bob's House is a lovely 3 story home located in historic Norwood Park, one of the safest and best neighborhoods in Chicago. It’s perfect for large groups, families, reunions, or weddings and is just a short 8 minute walk from the CTA Blue Line train which gets you to O’hare airport in 10 minutes and downtown Chicago in 30 minutes. This classic Chicago themed house features photo walls of famous landmarks and people and includes a Mason & Hamlin grand piano for serenading and sing-a-longs.

description:
Beautiful vintage renovated Chicagoan brown-stone home. Original millwork, beautiful moldings, 12ft ceilings, hardwood flrs. A true mix of high-end & classic finishes. Light flooded guest bedroom offers Queen size bed, walk-in closet, private en-suite with double sinks, large shower and toilet.

We will be here to assist with directions and recommendations.

Prime East Lincoln Park location with beautiful old tree lined streets. Steps to shops, restaurants, parks, cultural entertainment and the Lincoln Park Zoo.  Very safe and ideal for long strolls or jogs through Lincoln Park and along the lake. 5 minutes from public tennis courts, a baseball field and a basketball court. Close to the city and Wrigley Field.

Lincoln Park is a very walkable and safe neighborhood. Home is located close to bus stops and train lines.

additional_house_rules:
1) The entire property is smoke and vapor free. We have marijuana and tobacco chemical sensors on the property. They know it's not cooking smoke, and they react to airborne particulate, not the smell on your clothes. The PolySens® technology works, so exit the building if you want to smoke/vape or you'll be fined $500 and asked to leave.

2) Your reservation has paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number, whether visiting or sleeping, you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first.

3) Quiet hours are 10PM-8AM. Noise should not be heard coming from your apartment. This is a quiet residential building. 95% of our guests have no issues, and never hear from us. We will be sure to send you at least 2 warnings prior to asking anyone to leave, but one way or another, the apartment must be quiet.

4) Parties, events, and commercial activity are not allowed. 

5) All gathering spaces except the lobby are strictly reserved for residents only.

6) Shoes and shirt or other upper body clothing must be worn in the lobby, hallways, and elevator. Undergarments should not be visible.

7) We reserve the right to ask you to leave without a refund if any of the above rules are broken.

8) We do not accept instant bookings from residents of the Chicago metropolitan area as identified by profile city or phone number area code. If you live near Chicago and would like to book a stay, please send us a message with a little more information about your plans

8) Our favorite restaurant in Chicago is La Scarola.

access:
The entire apartment is yours during your stay! 
Book for one person or four, it doesn't matter - you WILL NOT share this apartment with anyone outside of your own group!

Guests may drop off their bags as early as 12PM (noon), and the cleaners may still be in the apartment until 4PM.

Guests may park their vehicle as early as 12PM, and must move their vehicle by 11AM on the day of check-out, but not before or after.

The unit may be accessed by maintenance for repairs during stays.
description:
Exclusive luxury loft with beautiful Wrigley Field view - plus free parking in a heated, attached garage! Stay on Halsted Street: where Wrigleyville's year-round sports obsession meets Boystown's LGBTQ haven. Enjoy an overabundance of restaurants, bars, boutiques, and coffee shops on every corner. Street festivals, theatres, concert halls, and nightclubs are never far. Just a short walk from the CTA Red Line L train, this is the mythical neighborhood experience everyone on Airbnb talks about.

Combining an upscale setting with the high-end amenities you need for the most comfortable stay. This is a brand-new, high rise building.
*******************************
Want advice? Looking for that local knowledge? We've got a guidebook telling you all the secrets! We're from Chicago. We live here. We know the place, and we have an opinion!

TWO BEDROOMS
-  Total of three king beds and one twin rollaway bed
- Master bedroom offers the coolest adult bunk bed you’ve ever seen! Two king pillowtop mattresses supporting 2,000 pounds, plenty of don't-bang-your-head-clearance and an oversized ladder. It cost five grand, and it's worth every penny! Everything about it was built for comfort. Read the reviews. Look at the pictures. People love our bunks!
- Second bedroom offers additional pillowtop king bed and twin memory foam rollaway bed
- Linens provided for every guest

TWO FULL BATHROOMS
- En-suite master bathroom with shower/bathtub combo
- Guest bathroom with glass walled shower 
- High-pressure detachable showerheads
- Tile flooring 
- Towels, body wash, shampoo, and conditioner provided for every guest

FULL KITCHEN
- Stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, oven and range
- Oversized island with quartz countertop
- Custom cabinetry
- Salt, pepper, and oil stocked
- Pots and pans, tableware, glassware and silverware provided

PLENTY OF SEATING
- Island barstool seating for four
- Kitchen table seating for four
- Couch and two superbly comfortable chairs

SMOKING FAST WIFI
- Two dedicated signals per apartment
- 250MBPS service
- No more wimpy hotel WiFi!

A WEALTH OF COFFEE OPTIONS
- French press and drip machine
- Ground AND whole bean coffee
- Sweeteners and half/half provided

TELEVISION IN EVERY BEDROOM
- Living room has 55-inch Roku TV with TiVo and expanded cable channels
- Master bedroom has 32-inch Roku TV with local channels affixed to lower bunk with swivel - watch from bed and let friends and family join sitting next to the bed
- Guest bedroom offers 32-inch Fire TV with local channels

AND EVERYTHING ELSE YOU EXPECT FROM A LUXURY APARTMENT
- In-unit stacked washer dryer - detergent provided
- Bedstand in every bedroom incorporating wireless charging pad, USB port, and traditional power plug
- Floor to ceiling windows
- Central heating and AC with independent controls
- High-end lighting fixtures
- Wood panel flooring
- Tons of closet space
- Gym
- 24 hour staffed building desk

-----------
PARKING
One parking spot is included per reservation for one mid-size vehicle (or smaller).
Need more than one spot? For additional parking, there are spots in the same garage available via the Spot Hero app!

Please let me know - what rental category vehicle are you parking? Size restrictions apply, and I need to know the rental category you’ve chosen, even if you aren’t sure of the exact model. (Examples include compact car, full-size SUV, and minivan.)

Parking is not included for vehicles larger than mid-size, such as full-size SUVs and trucks, minivans, vans, RVs and trailers. 
----------
CHECK-IN TIME 
Typically, guests may receive apartment access and drop their bags in the apartment as early as 12PM (noon). The cleaners do need until 4PM to do their work, and the apartment may be dirty anytime until 4.  
If you'd like to drop your bags early and head out until the cleaners finish, we can usually accommodate you! If you'd like to take a nap or shower right away, and the night before your stay isn't booked yet, let's discuss booking that night before! Then you could arrive as early as you'd like that day! 
----------
CHECK-OUT TIME
11AM is check-out. If you'll need a check-out after 11AM, and the night after your stay isn't booked yet, let's chat about booking that next night! Then you could leave as late as you'd like that day!
----------
OCCUPANCY 
Upon booking, your reservation will have paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number whether visiting or sleeping,  you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first. 
We consider the maximum capacity of the apartment to be its sleeping capacity - FOUR individuals. Anyone past four would not be permitted. 
Enjoy the city! Please don’t bring a party back.
----------
RATES
Rates and minimum stays change constantly - every night is different! 
The nightly rate changes based on number of guests, which is verified upon arrival. Please do your best to let me know how many guests will be staying in advance.

The entire apartment is yours during your stay! 
Book for one person or four, it doesn't matter - you WILL NOT share this apartment with anyone outside of your own group!

Guests may drop off their bags as early as 12PM (noon), and the cleaners may still be in the apartment until 4PM.

Guests may park their vehicle as early as 12PM, and must move their vehicle by 11AM on the day of check-out, but not before or after.

The unit may be accessed by maintenance for repairs during stays.

Immediately after booking, we will send you a few questions about your arrival time, contact info, number of guests/visitors, and to name our favorite restaurant, which is listed at the bottom of the house rules. Guests will not be allowed to check in without providing complete answers.

Stay at the very top of Halsted Street, where two of Chicago's most exciting neighborhoods meet: Wrigleyville and Boystown!

Wrigleyville:  the Chicago Cubs play in the heart of this residential neighborhood. The building is just 3 blocks from Wrigley FIeld and the Chicago Cubs - so avoid game-day traffic and walk it! With sports bars and casual eateries galore, there's always something happening. 

Boystown: the Midwest's largest LGBTQ+ neighborhood! You'll stay at the top of the main drag, right on the Pride Parade route! You're moments from dance clubs and dive bars, local restaurants and quirky meals, and the most welcoming vibe anywhere in the city. Ask us for suggestions, don't be shy!

And while the combined neighborhood has it's share of excitement, ultimately, you'll enjoy an upscale, convenient, and relaxed residential setting. Easy grocery runs - less than one block from Whole Foods, and a 2-minute Uber from Jewel Osco, one of Chicago's large grocery chains. Just 4 blocks from the Addison Red Line L train station, downtown in 20 minutes!

Chicago’s North Side is the most prosperous with the most things to do, bringing a vibrancy far beyond the tourist/business district downtown. Wrigleyville and Boystown, both part of the Lakeview community, make up it's beating heart. The area might look like it’s off center from downtown, but it’s really in the middle of everything. 


And with so many bars, restaurants, and shops, you'll have no idea where to start - until you check out our curated guidebook! 

We’ve got tips about the best bars, coffee shops and grab-and-go breakfast, high-end can't miss dinners, quick meals, late nights and boozy brunch, plus extensive day trips all throughout the city - plus what we consider the best Cubs game day experience. One word: bleachers - and you can see them from your windows! We put our heart into the guidebook, and you’ll find advice on other can’t-miss places worth a train or Uber ride, including FIVE distinct nightlife districts throughout the city! 

We've heard from guest after guest that they loved the guidebook, so please, take a look during your stay!

house_rules:
1) The entire property is smoke and vapor free. We have marijuana and tobacco chemical sensors on the property. They know it's not cooking smoke, and they react to airborne particulate, not the smell on your clothes. The PolySens® technology works, so exit the building if you want to smoke/vape or you'll be fined $500 and asked to leave.

2) Your reservation has paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number, whether visiting or sleeping, you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first.

3) Quiet hours are 10PM-8AM. Noise should not be heard coming from your apartment. This is a quiet residential building. 95% of our guests have no issues, and never hear from us. We will be sure to send you at least 2 warnings prior to asking anyone to leave, but one way or another, the apartment must be quiet.

4) Parties, events, and commercial activity are not allowed. 

5) All gathering spaces except the lobby are strictly reserved for residents only.

6) Shoes and shirt or other upper body clothing must be worn in the lobby, hallways, and elevator. Undergarments should not be visible.

7) We reserve the right to ask you to leave without a refund if any of the above rules are broken.

8) We do not accept instant bookings from residents of the Chicago metropolitan area as identified by profile city or phone number area code. If you live near Chicago and would like to book a stay, please send us a message with a little more information about your plans

8) Our favorite restaurant in Chicago is La Scarola.

space:
Combining an upscale setting with the high-end amenities you need for the most comfortable stay. This is a brand-new, high rise building.
*******************************
Want advice? Looking for that local knowledge? We've got a guidebook telling you all the secrets! We're from Chicago. We live here. We know the place, and we have an opinion!

TWO BEDROOMS
-  Total of three king beds and one twin rollaway bed
- Master bedroom offers the coolest adult bunk bed you’ve ever seen! Two king pillowtop mattresses supporting 2,000 pounds, plenty of don't-bang-your-head-clearance and an oversized ladder. It cost five grand, and it's worth every penny! Everything about it was built for comfort. Read the reviews. Look at the pictures. People love our bunks!
- Second bedroom offers additional pillowtop king bed and twin memory foam rollaway bed
- Linens provided for every guest

TWO FULL BATHROOMS
- En-suite master bathroom with shower/bathtub combo
- Guest bathroom with glass walled shower 
- High-pressure detachable showerheads
- Tile flooring 
- Towels, body wash, shampoo, and conditioner provided for every guest

FULL KITCHEN
- Stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, oven and range
- Oversized island with quartz countertop
- Custom cabinetry
- Salt, pepper, and oil stocked
- Pots and pans, tableware, glassware and silverware provided

PLENTY OF SEATING
- Island barstool seating for four
- Kitchen table seating for four
- Couch and two superbly comfortable chairs

SMOKING FAST WIFI
- Two dedicated signals per apartment
- 250MBPS service
- No more wimpy hotel WiFi!

A WEALTH OF COFFEE OPTIONS
- French press and drip machine
- Ground AND whole bean coffee
- Sweeteners and half/half provided

TELEVISION IN EVERY BEDROOM
- Living room has 55-inch Roku TV with TiVo and expanded cable channels
- Master bedroom has 32-inch Roku TV with local channels affixed to lower bunk with swivel - watch from bed and let friends and family join sitting next to the bed
- Guest bedroom offers 32-inch Fire TV with local channels

AND EVERYTHING ELSE YOU EXPECT FROM A LUXURY APARTMENT
- In-unit stacked washer dryer - detergent provided
- Bedstand in every bedroom incorporating wireless charging pad, USB port, and traditional power plug
- Floor to ceiling windows
- Central heating and AC with independent controls
- High-end lighting fixtures
- Wood panel flooring
- Tons of closet space
- Gym
- 24 hour staffed building desk

-----------
PARKING
One parking spot is included per reservation for one mid-size vehicle (or smaller).
Need more than one spot? For additional parking, there are spots in the same garage available via the Spot Hero app!

Please let me know - what rental category vehicle are you parking? Size restrictions apply, and I need to know the rental category you’ve chosen, even if you aren’t sure of the exact model. (Examples include compact car, full-size SUV, and minivan.)

Parking is not included for vehicles larger than mid-size, such as full-size SUVs and trucks, minivans, vans, RVs and trailers. 
----------
CHECK-IN TIME 
Typically, guests may receive apartment access and drop their bags in the apartment as early as 12PM (noon). The cleaners do need until 4PM to do their work, and the apartment may be dirty anytime until 4.  
If you'd like to drop your bags early and head out until the cleaners finish, we can usually accommodate you! If you'd like to take a nap or shower right away, and the night before your stay isn't booked yet, let's discuss booking that night before! Then you could arrive as early as you'd like that day! 
----------
CHECK-OUT TIME
11AM is check-out. If you'll need a check-out after 11AM, and the night after your stay isn't booked yet, let's chat about booking that next night! Then you could leave as late as you'd like that day!
----------
OCCUPANCY 
Upon booking, your reservation will have paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number whether visiting or sleeping,  you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first. 
We consider the maximum capacity of the apartment to be its sleeping capacity - FOUR individuals. Anyone past four would not be permitted. 
Enjoy the city! Please don’t bring a party back.
----------
RATES
Rates and minimum stays change constantly - every night is different! 
The nightly rate changes based on number of guests, which is verified upon arrival. Please do your best to let me know how many guests will be staying in advance.
summary: Exclusive luxury loft with beautiful Wrigley Field view - plus free parking in a heated, attached garage! Stay on Halsted Street: where Wrigleyville's year-round sports obsession meets Boystown's LGBTQ haven. Enjoy an overabundance of restaurants, bars, boutiques, and coffee shops on every corner. Street festivals, theatres, concert halls, and nightclubs are never far. Just a short walk from the CTA Red Line L train, this is the mythical neighborhood experience everyone on Airbnb talks about.

access: You will have access to the full unit, including a small patio space out the back.  The kitchen is fully stocked with your essentials and the bedrooms are large, private and comfortable.
description:
This is an ideal location for someone attending a conference at McCormick or looking to enjoy Chicago. We are 2.5 miles from McCormick or about  a 10 min Uber ride. We have private gated parking with one spot included, we may have other spots upon request. This spacious condo has been recently renovated and newly furnished.

This is a trendy and large open space in an up and coming neighborhood. There isn't anything to walk to, you are a short Uber ride to McCormick, most major Chicago attractions and downtown.

You will have access to the full unit, including a small patio space out the back.  The kitchen is fully stocked with your essentials and the bedrooms are large, private and comfortable.

Our goal is to answer questions quickly and provide a wonderful stay. 
Please let me know any questions you have before your stay. I will send out simple check in instructions a couple days before you arrive. I assure you the process is easy and nothing to worry about. If you need in person assistance please call our onsite manager Christy: (312) 731-2545

The neighborhood is not walkable, Uber is the way to go. This is a very urban area, if you have any questions about Bronzeville please ask or take a minute to look it up. 
The area is gentrfying, you may see a guy in a tie on a bike or some people with brown bags.  If you haven't been in an urban environment before you may want to check out the area, we love it but understand it may not be for everyone.

Uber

access: Guests are able to access the apartment with keyless entry through a keypad lock.
description:
This 1st floor newly renovated apartment is part of a 2-flat building in Bridgeport. Close to Downtown and great for traveling families and guests. Conveniently located by grocery and convenience stores, local restaurants. 3min walk from the 8 bus takes you to the Halsted Orange train line and to Downtown.

3 bedrooms each with queen size bed. Spacious living room, dining room, bathroom and kitchen. High-Speed WiFi included. Free street parking.

We look forward to hosting you!

Please beware that this apartment building is old. The property has been newly renovated. There are surveillance cameras monitoring front and back door/entrances for safety and security for the guests and host. 

Transportation
3min walk to 8 bus which takes you to Halsted Orange line to downtown. 20min drive to McCormick Place. 10min drive to Chinatown.

Apartment Essentials
There is a spacious comfy living room with a large 55" smart ROKU TV with high-speed WiFi. The ROKU TV has Netflix, Amazon Prime Videos, Hulu, and more. Next to it, there is a large multi purpose table for dining or work space. There is a smart thermostat for central a/c and heat. 

Kitchen
The kitchen comes included with basic cookware, silverware, knife set, utensils, plates, bowls, cups for those that like to cook. Stainless steel appliances and refrigerator. There is also a Keurig coffee maker with K-pods included. Small dining table in the kitchen for smaller groups.

Sleep
3 bedrooms each with queen size bed with closest space. Nightstand has a lamp and small charging station for your smartphones and electronic devices. 

Bathroom
There is a spacious well-lit bathroom with all basic amenities. There are bath towels, hand towels, makeup towels, body wash, shampoo, and conditioner.

Neighborhood
This neighborhood is friendly and welcoming of travelers and guests. There is a good mix of local restaurants for those that like trying different foods and eating out. There is a floor under your apartment so be respectful of the people living there. 

Parking
There is free street parking on a first come first serve basis.

Other Things to Note
No Partying
No Locals
No Smoking
No Pets

This apartment is on the first floor. There are security cameras monitoring all front and back doors/entrances for the safety and surveillance of everyone.
Please take off shoes/sneakers when in the apartment.
Extra towels will be in your closet along with hangers.
This is located near a main street so reasonable street noise is to be expected.

Guests are able to access the apartment with keyless entry through a keypad lock.

I am available for any questions and/or concerns during your stay. if something comes up, feel free to let me know about it and we can work something out. I am also a current university student but I'll reply asap

There are many local restaurants from diverse cultures. Feel free to explore the neighborhood. Several parks are close by. Some of them include Henry C. Palmisano Nature Park, McGuane Park, and Humbert Park. Bridgeport Coffeehouse is just an 8min walk/2min drive away. Jackalope Coffee & Tea House is also another sweet spot on Halsted. Nana's is a great restaurant that is a 3min walk away from my place. Ace Bakery is also on Halsted along with Taqueria San Jose and Buffalo Wings & Rings. If you like to cook at home, there is Cermak Fresh Market for all your grocery needs. There is also Bridgeport Express Landromat and Xxpress Cleaners for laundry and dry cleaning.

There is the 8 bus stop 3min walk away. That bus will also take you straight into the Halsted Orange Line train station if you need to transfer lines to go downtown. Chinatown is 20min away by bus/train and 10min drive if you want to try out some good Chinese food.

description:
I have been an Airb&b host for 5 years and within the past two a Super-host! I love having guests and strive to make each stay memorable and relaxing. The season usually goes into high gear starting in April so book promptly! I am highly responsive and look forward to hosting.

Priceless views,  spacious, modern and perfectly appointed.  Comfortable & quiet yet easily accessible to all of Chicago's hot spots, cultural destinations, walk to Michigan Avenue and so, so much more. 


River North oasis with loft feel, every convenience and amenity -- including Summer cafe area on the balcony and Urban Garden. Safe doorman building within easy walking, public transit, Divvy bike kiosk (across the street) and cabs outside front door.

Private workout room, Washer/Dryer in unit, Balcony,  Modern & Fully equipped kitchen and large bathroom. 

You will have the ultimate privacy.

River North is not far from Michigan Avenue and the Lake Front, Loop & Wicker Park.  Its walkable to all destinations above -- certainly a lovely bike ride or easy for for cabbing too.  Slightly west from the main attractions. River North is a more mature section (less loud bars, more galleries).  You will have access to everything. Restaurants, coffee spots, galleries, art museums and of course shopping.

Buses & Brown/Purple line DIVVY commuter bike rack immediately outside, cab stand below, buses and walk to major downtown happenings. 

24 Hr. Doorperson. Very safe.
house_rules: With the utmost of respect for the space and its contents. No smoking or pets please.

additional_house_rules:
Before you book, please be aware of the following:

We strive to maintain the absolute highest standard of service on Airbnb. However, we are not a 5-star hotel and are therefore unable to provide everything that you would expect from a hotel. If you have specific things that you are very picky about, please discuss with us before booking.

Due to changing regulations on Airbnb in Chicago, we must ask that you maintain discretion with building staff. Please do not approach them with any requests. Definitely do not approach them to collect keys or to “check-in.”

Once you arrive, we will ask you to follow our house rules. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously. Failure to comply can result in forfeiture of your deposit and termination of your reservation without a refund.

- This building is 100% non-smoking. No smoking or vaping of anything inside the unit or on building premises. Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance.
- This a quiet and upscale residential building. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM - 8:00 AM daily. Our neighbors are very sensitive and they will report loud noise. Any noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police will result in forfeiture of partial or full deposit.
- Absolutely no guests not in the reservation are allowed in the apartment or the building common areas.
- No pets allowed unless approved. Bringing in a pet without notice or approval will result in a forfeiture of partial or full deposit.
- Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed-upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check out fee.
- Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence. Additionally, lost keys will incur a $250 per key fee.

Please note: there is a glitch in the map settings, and the actual location is 250 feet to the North. Please contact us before making the booking to discuss if you are targeting a very specific location.

description:
Treat yourself to luxury with this 3b/2b apartment with an outstanding view of Chicago from your every room. This king sized 1600 sq ft modern condo features wood floors, granite, leather and Egyptian cotton finishes.  Luxury bedding,  fresh towels and a fully stocked gourmet kitchen. Indoor/Outdoor pool open year round, outdoor lounge, cabanas, grills, and fire pit, and it's located in the heart of Streeterville just steps from Magnificent Mile shopping, Navy Pier and Triangle dining. Parking is available at this building for ENVITAE members, and is subject to availability on a first come first serve basis.

This 3 bedroom/2 bath is the perfect location for exploring Chicago and sets the standard for Chicago luxury.

•Master Bedroom - King Bed
•Second Bedroom - Queen Bed
•Third Bedroom - Queen Bed
•An additional Queen Air Mattress

•Microwave
•Refrigerator
•Fully Equipped Kitchen
•Washer & Dryer
•Flat Screen TV/Cable
•High-speed internet
•Ample square footage
•Energy Star GE appliances
•Spacious, walk-in closets
•Individually controlled heat and air

The beds have fresh, clean and crisp linens and the bathrooms are stocked with fresh towels, shampoo, conditioner, and body wash. We will also include 1 hair dryer. The kitchen is fully loaded with luxury appliances and high-end cooking utensils. An iron/ironing board are also in the unit for your convenience.

Other Amenities
•Fitness Center
•Indoor/Outdoor Pool
•Sun Deck & Gardened Patio/BBQ

You will have access to everything in the apartment and superb amenities in the building.

Building Amenities:

•Indoor/Outdoor Pool
•Full gym
•Locker rooms
•Outdoor patio with BBQ, lounges
•Additional patio seating with gas fire pits
•Residents lounge
•Library
•Computer center

You will be greeted by a personal Guest Relations Manager upon arrival, who will also take care of you during your stay. As an ENVITAE guest, you will also have access to round the clock concierge services.

Everything you need is right outside your doorstep! Downtown Chicago is a city with an appetite—for food, of course, but also for design, history, and culture. Come here to marvel at the cutting-edge architecture or take in the gorgeous views of Lake Michigan; to spend a day cheering with baseball fans and a night laughing at a comedy show; to shop, to visit renowned institutions like the Field Museum, The Art Institute and the Adler Planetarium, and to experience the legendary blues scene. To do all this, you'll need nourishment: taste deep-dish pizza, piled-high hot dogs, Italian beef sandwiches, and more.

You are minutes away from bus and train stops.  

We find our guests prefer to use Uber, which is a very convenient and cheap way to get around the city.

There is no parking available in the building, however there are several garages and lots within a block of the building.  We recommend the apps SpotHero or ParkWhiz to find and book parking.

We are able to provide no more than 2 key/fobs for access to the building and apartment.

Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of your stay.  For the protection of all parties, the booking party will also be required to provide a copy of a valid government issued ID and matching credit card prior to check in. This information is collected for verification purposes only and is not stored or otherwise used for any other purpose
By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
    - I agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions.
    - I acknowledge that I will be required to provide a copy of a valid government issued ID and matching credit card prior to check in.
    - I acknowledge that I may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company or the building, as stated in accordance by my rental agreement and condition of the booking.
house_rules:
Before you book, please be aware of the following:

We strive to maintain the absolute highest standard of service on Airbnb. However, we are not a 5-star hotel and are therefore unable to provide everything that you would expect from a hotel. If you have specific things that you are very picky about, please discuss with us before booking.

Due to changing regulations on Airbnb in Chicago, we must ask that you maintain discretion with building staff. Please do not approach them with any requests. Definitely do not approach them to collect keys or to “check-in.”

Once you arrive, we will ask you to follow our house rules. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously. Failure to comply can result in forfeiture of your deposit and termination of your reservation without a refund.

- This building is 100% non-smoking. No smoking or vaping of anything inside the unit or on building premises. Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance.
- This a quiet and upscale residential building. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM - 8:00 AM daily. Our neighbors are very sensitive and they will report loud noise. Any noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police will result in forfeiture of partial or full deposit.
- Absolutely no guests not in the reservation are allowed in the apartment or the building common areas.
- No pets allowed unless approved. Bringing in a pet without notice or approval will result in a forfeiture of partial or full deposit.
- Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed-upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check out fee.
- Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence. Additionally, lost keys will incur a $250 per key fee.

Please note: there is a glitch in the map settings, and the actual location is 250 feet to the North. Please contact us before making the booking to discuss if you are targeting a very specific location.

space:
This 3 bedroom/2 bath is the perfect location for exploring Chicago and sets the standard for Chicago luxury.

•Master Bedroom - King Bed
•Second Bedroom - Queen Bed
•Third Bedroom - Queen Bed
•An additional Queen Air Mattress

•Microwave
•Refrigerator
•Fully Equipped Kitchen
•Washer & Dryer
•Flat Screen TV/Cable
•High-speed internet
•Ample square footage
•Energy Star GE appliances
•Spacious, walk-in closets

summary: Treat yourself to luxury with this 3b/2b apartment with an outstanding view of Chicago from your every room. This king sized 1600 sq ft modern condo features wood floors, granite, leather and Egyptian cotton finishes.  Luxury bedding,  fresh towels and a fully stocked gourmet kitchen. Indoor/Outdoor pool open year round, outdoor lounge, cabanas, grills, and fire pit, and it's located in the heart of Streeterville just steps from Magnificent Mile shopping, Navy Pier and Triangle dining. Parking is available at this building for ENVITAE members, and is subject to availability on a first come first serve basis.

additional_house_rules:
Must like dogs! If you don't, this is not the place for you.  We like things to be kept somewhat neat, but are not crazy fastidious. Just rinse your dishes and put them in the sink.  The closet in the main guest room is quite large, so we ask that guest's coats be kept upstairs as our coat closet is already too full. 
     Our house is not child-proofed, so we expect parents to monitor their children at all times while here. 
     We provide basic breakfast foods - muffins, butter, juice, coffee, tea, cereal, milk. If you want additional food or have dietary restrictions, there is a shelf in the fridge where you can keep it. We have many grocery stores nearby, and will happily direct you. 
     Please, absolutely no food in the bedrooms, things get spilled, it attracts ants and the dogs, which in one case resulted in a trip to the emergency vet.  No glass glasses in the bathroom - we provide unbreakable ones for you to use. And please hang towels on hooks, not over the curtain shower rail, and don't use our towels to remove makeup. It doesn't come out. (Also, please remove makeup before lying on the bed linens - we have had several pillow cases ruined.) 
     We do not allow smoking either inside the house or on the deck. Thank you for remembering this is our home and not a hotel. 
     Our cleaning lady comes every other Tuesday - if you are here when she comes, she will clean the bathroom but will not go in the guest bedrooms unless you request it.
     Please ask us if there is anything you need help with - we want you to have a safe and comfortable stay.

access: 2 guest bedrooms, guest bathroom, use of kitchen for breakfast, dining room, downstairs family room with large screen TV, laundry facilities for people staying a week or more. Large back deck in lovely garden.  If you have bikes, you can keep them in the garage at night. We are happy to provide plates and silverware for prepared food you bring in for lunch or dinner, and you're welcome to use the microwave. Cooking of meals other than breakfast is not possible. We have had too many unfortunate experiences.
description:
Lovely Tudor art-filled home near Old Orchard, NU, Evanston Hosp., public trans., Pres. Homes & 3 Crowns senior living.  Free parking. Private guest bath & shelf in fridge. Suits 1 - 3 guests in main room, or up to 5 in one party if you book both bedrooms. This listing is for ONE ROOM ONLY - to book 2 rooms, go to our other listing, "2 ROOMS FOR UP TO 5, CLOSE TO NU & OLD ORCHARD MALL.
Must like dogs. Archie is a friendly lab mix and gets the best reviews of anyone.

Beautiful, comfortable, art-filled home. Owners are international travelers who have stayed in B&B accommodations around the world. Main bedroom is spacious with walk-in closet, bathroom is newly renovated. 2nd bedroom is smaller, ideal for 2nd couple traveling with friends, well behaved children, business colleagues who don't want to share a room. 2nd bedroom is only rented in conjunction with main bedroom to one group, as the two rooms share a bathroom.  If you only need one room, we will not rent the second bedroom to anyone else. 
     Convenient to NU, public transport, Evanston parks and beaches, very close to Old Orchard Mall, Presbyterian Homes, 3 Crowns Park, Evanston Hospital, plus Baha'i Temple, Centennial Park in Wilmette. 15 minute drive to Chicago Botanic Gardens, easy access to trains into Chicago. 
    The larger room is spacious and contains an extra very comfortable IKEA chair/bed that is suitable for an extra adult who is not over 6' tall or a child over 2 years. Our house is not toddler proofed.
    We provide a front door key for guests that is kept by the door - we ask that guests take a key with them when they go out and put it back when they come in. A lost key will cost you $35 for us to get the lock re-keyed, so please be careful with your key.

2 guest bedrooms, guest bathroom, use of kitchen for breakfast, dining room, downstairs family room with large screen TV, laundry facilities for people staying a week or more. Large back deck in lovely garden.  If you have bikes, you can keep them in the garage at night. We are happy to provide plates and silverware for prepared food you bring in for lunch or dinner, and you're welcome to use the microwave. Cooking of meals other than breakfast is not possible. We have had too many unfortunate experiences.

Happy to help with directions, willing to share coffee or tea and hear about your day!  Will help with restaurant recommendations and reservations. We will help with public transport schedules and information.
We are bird watchers, and can recommend good local birding spots, and when time allows, will take guests birding.  Husband retired, wife works from home office.

Evanston is a great community, with wonderful restaurants, a vibrant downtown and lake front, plus the amenities of Northwestern University.  Our home is on a tree-lined street near multiple parks, with jogging paths, free tennis courts and a fishing/duck pond. We are also very close to Old Orchard Shopping Mall, with many major and specialty retailers and a large cinema. The Chicago Botanic Garden is about a 15 minute drive away, Evanston Hospital and Light House Beach are a 15 minute bus ride down Central St. 
     Ryan Field (Dyche Stadium) is straight down Central St., where NU plays football, and also where the NU Welsh-Ryan basketball arena is located. 
     We are also very close to the Presbyterian Homes (2 blocks) and 3 Crowns Park (6 blocks) retirement communities.
     Every Saturday during the summer and fall, there's a wonderful farmer's market in downtown Evanston, with over 50 vendors and free parking. In the winter, a smaller market opens in the Ecology Center and at a local church.

Public transport - bus a 2 minute walk; trains to Chicago accessible from the bus.  Walk to the train is about 30 minutes. CTA cards available at nearby CVS. There are good local cab services, including Uber. Free and cheap metered parking is available near the nearest Metra station, the train into downtown Chicago. Paid parking for the CTA trains is in the Evanston Hospital parking garage, or in the downtown Maple Ave. or Davis St. garages, where you can access both Metra and CTA stations on Davis St.

There is alternate side of the street parking on street cleaning days - please read the posted sign or ask us which side of the street to park on to avoid getting a ticket. Street cleaning is on Thursdays and Fridays the first week of the month, April - Sept.

The closet in the main guest room is quite large, so we ask that guest's coats be kept upstairs as our coat closet is already too full. 
     Our house is not child-proofed, so we expect parents to monitor their children at all times while here. 
     We provide basic breakfast foods - muffins, butter, juice, coffee, tea, cereal, milk. If you want additional food or have dietary restrictions, there is a shelf in the fridge where you can keep it. We have many grocery stores nearby, and will happily direct you.

description:
New! Located by Pilsen, the unit is fully equipped with everything you need for a short-term stay. Snuggle into a comfy bed with high end linens looking into a beautifully landscaped courtyard that makes you feel like you've discovered a private oasis in the middle of the city. Have questions? Send me a message!

Rich in Latino culture, Pilsen is a neighborhood that overflows with music, art, culinary tradition, and nightlife. It’s home to award-winning restaurants, iconic music venues, and sensational murals as far as the eye can see. Maybe that’s why it was named one of the “12 Coolest Neighborhoods Around the World” by Forbes.

The 8 Halsted Bus stops a few steps away and can take you directly to the loop. Uber/lyft is also very affordable to take from this location to anywhere you would like in the city.
house_rules: Please try not to wear shoes in the apartment. The floor constructions transmits a lot of noise to the neighbors below.

description:
Beautiful modern unit. Friends call it "the perfect Airbnb!!" Perfect for a professional on business (workspaces and printers!) as well as people on holiday looking to explore all the food and fun of Chicago! Walk to the best scene in Chicago in 2019: West Loop and Fulton Market. With this perfect central location, you can also walk to River North, Magnificient Mile, the Loop, even Lincoln Park! The location couldn't be more convenient while also being quiet! Enjoy the full gym and outdoor pool!

Modern, fresh, gorgeous studio in the best of Chicago! A wall separates the sleeping area from the common area. Full kitchen with modern appliances, washer and dryer in unit, large bathroom with great shower and bath. The apartment complex has a gym (including 3 Peleton bikes!), outdoor pool and grills, common areas and printer!

You have the whole unit to yourself and can access the apartment complex amenities: stocked gym, outdoor pool, grills, common areas with wifi, workspaces, and printers.

Available whenever you need me!

Best neighborhood in Chicago. Walk to River North, West Loop, and even Lincoln Park.

Right by blue line and many busses! Walk to pink, green, and red lines! And more if you like walking! So easy for ride share. Bike share dock right outside!

For this quality of apartment and location,  you can't beat this (for this price)!!

- Please contact us for details
