access: The entire unit is yours and there is a small back porch if you would like to smoke outside. The back stairwell is off limits as is the backyard. There are two dogs on the first floor who use the back stairs to get to the back yard.
description:
Beautiful, newly renovated three bedroom with one bathroom in the heart of Logan Square. Located on the Kimball bus line with laundry service (see description) available.  There is a neighborhood mini mart one door down and a Divvy bike rental stand three blocks away.  Come stay in Chicago's hottest neighborhood with some of the best dining and bars the city has to offer.

The unit is on the second floor of a two story walk up greystone. Very sunny with large windows. Newly remodeled 3 bedroom/ 1 bath ENTIRE apartment (not sharing) in the convenient neighborhood of Logan Square. Minutes to downtown and many sites. Plenty of FREE street parking and ON the Kimball bus line. TWO flat screen TVs with Hulu, Netflix and HBOgo and PREMIUM cable. The second tv is in one of the bedrooms. Free internet. Samsung soundbar with Bluetooth. Well equipped kitchen with full size appliances and coffee maker. Queen size high quality memory foam mattresses in each bedroom. Couch also has a trundle pull out and an air mattress can be provided by request. High quality, high thread count sheets and duvets on each bed with luxurious memory foam pillows. I will have two laundry baskets for you (one for dark clothes- cold water wash, the other for white clothes- hot water wash) and I will wash any items you need. I won't fold but will return them by the next morning freshly laundered.  The reason being is our laundry room  is located in an unfinished portion of the building and I would rather offer the service for you than have you have to deal with the scary basement. There is also a large dining room for family gatherings. In addition to all that, we have cameras on the EXTERIOR of the building. With that being said please be honest with how many guests are staying over.  If this unit is booked please check out my other places!

The entire unit is yours and there is a small back porch if you would like to smoke outside. The back stairwell is off limits as is the backyard. There are two dogs on the first floor who use the back stairs to get to the back yard.

I can be as available as you like. I work in the nightlife industry and I love my food so I am always happy to give recommendations.

The vibrant neighborhood of Logan Square was recently named one of the hottest neighborhoods in the COUNTRY. There are many bars and restaurants while still being a stone's throw to downtown. Uber/Lyft are very convenient and inexpensive and the Logan Square and California blue line stops aren't too far away.

We are three blocks from a divy bike rental and right on the Kimball bus line which will take you a few blocks from the Logan Square blue line stop. I prefer to drive my own car or use Uber because it's so affordable and parking is relatively easy.

description:
Private, CLEAN, professionally designed room in the heart of Chicago with FREE PARKING & GREEN TEA/ALOE memory foam mattress. You will have your own door code and may arrive at ANY time and as late as you wish, EASY self check-in guaranteed!

I allow LUGGAGE DROP OFF! You can store your luggage in the closet before check-in and after check-out times, you can drop it off and pick it up as early and as late as you would like.

The neighborhood is very QUIET & SAFE, even at night :)

Restaurants and bars are right round the corner, both upscale and casual. This room is 6 minutes away by car or uber to Chicago's famous Willis (Sears) tower. Uber costs about $7. If you are arriving by car, I am providing free resident parking passes for anywhere in the area. (Yes, that means you can drive a few blocks and still park anywhere you want!)
The room will be ONLY yours for the time you'll stay in my Windy City. You will have a key to lock the door.

> Free parking provided: park BEFORE your check-in and stay parked AFTER your check-out if you would like

> Apartment is NEWLY renovated and PROFESSIONALLY designed by an interior designer

> GREEN TEA & ALOE memory foam mattress

> Full-sized mirror in your room

> 5 MIN to DOWNTOWN

> Restaurants and bars are 5 MIN away walking distance

> 5 MIN walk to PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION/METRO

> 3 MIN walk to UIC (University of Illinois at Chicago)

> 15 MIN walk to Rush University & Hospital

> No security deposit

> Cancel up to 24 hours in advance to get a full refund

> Last minute reservations are welcome!

You will be given a door code to access the apartment and a key to lock your private room. You may arrive as late as you would like with my code entry. You may store your luggage in the closet BEFORE and AFTER check in so you don't have to haul your bags around the city. You will be able to view your check-in instructions under "House Manual" as soon as you confirm the booking. The door code will be sent to you 1 night prior to your arrival, or immediately if you have a last-minute booking. I will also be providing a binder full of recommendations to eat and go out from the local perspective, it will be on your bed upon arrival :)

100% of guests love my location- it is the best of both worlds: 5 minutes from the very center of downtown, yet quiet enough to not hear the noise at night. If you are still not convinced, please read my reviews.

"Racine" is the closest blue line train (metro) station, only 5 minutes away (walking). 
-Downtown/Loop: TO - take blue line towards O'Hare and get off at "LaSalle, Jackson, or Monroe," depending on where you are going :) FROM - take blue line towards Forest Park and get off at "Racine" About 5 minutes to downtown.
-O’Hare Airport: TO - take blue line towards O'Hare. O'Hare is the final stop. FROM - take blue line towards Forest Park and get off at "Racine" About 40 minutes to O’Hare.
-Midway Airport: TO - take blue line towards O'Hare and transfer to orange line at "Clark/Lake," then take orange line to towards Midway airport. Midway is the final stop! FROM - take orange line towards Adams/Wabash; then, transfer to blue line at "Clark/Lake." Take blue line towards Forest Park and get off at "Racine" About 45 minutes to Midway.
-Union Station/Amtrak: Only 20 minutes away (walking), taxi or uber will take you to the apartment in less than 5 minutes for about $6 :)

additional_house_rules:
- Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.   

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check out/lost key penalty  
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises unless you are in a designated smoking area.  Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance.  
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily.  
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property unless previously approved and pet fee paid. 
6.) Please do not use the fireplace.  
7.) Any garbage or items left in the back yard or on the back deck will result in $250 being withheld from the security deposit.  
8.) The house cannot be entered from the rear if nobody is home, you must enter through the front using the keypad locks.
9.) Please respect your upstairs neighbors by being considerate of noise, especially during quiet hours.

description:
*SPECIAL* Jan-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Our 5 bedroom duplex in Wrigleyville / Lakeview is newly renovated and stylishly decorated - it sleeps 16, and features semi-private covered deck that overlooks the shared backyard. From here, you can get to the Loop in under a half hour, and walk to Wrigley Field in under five minutes. You'll love to call this home while in Chicago for a few days - book today!

You enter our home into an open living room and dining room; a - non-functional but very charming - fire place is in the dining room. At the rear of the house is our newly renovated kitchen with a door out to the covered deck. Downstairs is another family room with an additional TV. There are bedrooms on both floors.

You'll have full access to my 5-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo, as well as the private patio and shared backyard. Need More Space...check out my listing "Wrigleyville Greystone with Parking - Sleeps 28!" to rent both condos in my building and have the entire building for your large group up to 28 guests!

Wrigleyville / Boystown is the lively little pocket in the Lakeview neighborhood that sits in the shadows of historic Wrigley Field, the second oldest stadium in baseball and home to the beloved Chicago Cubs. It has become a magnet for sports fans and young professionals alike, and particularly singles who hop from bar to bar along Clark, Addison and Sheffield Avenues.

We're steps to the Sheridan red line station, and near multiple bus lines.

As an extra benefit, my home is very close to one of Chicago's iconic 'L' lines. While extremely convenient for getting around the City, you may hear the trains come by on occasion. The noise is minimal when the windows are closed, and I have provided earplugs in the unit for those sensitive to noise.

No parties. No smoking. No drugs (not even marijuana). I wish I didn't have to say it... but a few bad guests can cause major problems.

No glitter. I know this sounds like a really weird rule... but anyone who has had to clean up glitter would understand. It gets everywhere and takes forever to clean up. If there is glitter I will have to charge for extra clean up time.

No guests under 21 unless accompanied by someone well over 21.

access: Guests have access to the entire unit and roof deck.
description:
Convenient location and comfortable accommodations. River West is a gem of a neighborhood just one "L" stop from the loop and easy access to many other areas. Walking distance to great Randolph Street restaurants and bars/nightlife. Located conveniently off blue line to/from O'Hare.

This is a 4th floor walk up unit. It's a bit of a hike but worth it. Great views from the roof deck!

Cable TV in the living room and second bedroom. Wifi access.

Guests have access to the entire unit and roof deck.

I am available to help out if needed but leave guests to themselves to enjoy their stay.

Conveniently located near the Grand/Milwaukee/Halsted Blue Line "L" stop. If you don't feel like taking public transportation, you can get almost anywhere you'd want to go for around $10-$15 in an taxi/uber/lyft.
house_rules:
No parties. No smoking. No drugs (not even marijuana). I wish I didn't have to say it... but a few bad guests can cause major problems.

No glitter. I know this sounds like a really weird rule... but anyone who has had to clean up glitter would understand. It gets everywhere and takes forever to clean up. If there is glitter I will have to charge for extra clean up time.

No guests under 21 unless accompanied by someone well over 21.
interaction: I am available to help out if needed but leave guests to themselves to enjoy their stay.

access:
You have access to the entire unit! 

As I occupy the space part time I do have a lot of personal items in the space. These items are video inventoried at the start of the reservation then re-inventoried afterward. Also, one coat closet will be locked away.
description:
A bright and trendy studio in Chicago's coveted and historical gold coast neighborhood.  Feel at ease and cozy with all the comforts of home while being a stone's throw away from all that Chicago has to offer such as the water tower (American Girl store), the mag mile, and the Hancock. 

Horse drawn carriage rides and world class restaurants right outside the door.  The building is equipped with keycard entry and a doorman for added security.

This space is a city studio but unique in that it has doors to separate spacing for guests to get dressed independently of one another. There is a lot of light throughout the unit, Alexa at your call, wifi, Direct TV, Netflix and Amazon TV. 

There is also a dishwasher for your convenience.

You have access to the entire unit! 

As I occupy the space part time I do have a lot of personal items in the space. These items are video inventoried at the start of the reservation then re-inventoried afterward. Also, one coat closet will be locked away.

I will likely be in the city or suburbs, but I may be out of town on vacation. If so, I'll always be available via phone if you need me!

Gold Coast is the posh neighborhood of the city. Enjoy easy access to many popular sites, clubs and restaurants. Ubers and Lyfts are available within a minute's notice and public transit is easily accessible. Let the convenience of this location make your stay as stress free as it should be.

Two blocks to Michigan Ave Buses 3, 147, 156, 157

Eight minute walk to Red Line from Chicago and State

access: Deck and yard: feel free to use the deck with morning coffee or afternoon happy hour. Just be mindful of the neighbors please.
description:
Great getaway on a budget! Stay in this vintage charmer, built in 1893. This Victorian era workers cottage is not your standard vanilla box! Separate entrance to private one bedroom apartment. Sometimes called an "in-law" apartment,  it's attached to the house, but definitely its own unit. Great place for rest and relaxation, yet in the heart of the vibrant Wicker Park neighborhood.

This is a one bedroom apartment with living room and kitchenette, featuring Kuerig and French press coffee makers, water heater for hot tea, microwave and mini fridge.  Queen sized bed in bedroom. Queen sized sofa sleeper in living room. Roll-a-way twin size bed also can be added to living room. Netflix and Amazon in living room Tv and Bedroom tv. We offer complimentary water, ice tray with ice, coffee, creamer/half &half, breakfast bars, variety teas with fresh lemon, sugar and honey,room darkening curtains in both rooms, shower with bathtub. Good wi-fi throughout!

Deck and yard: feel free to use the deck with morning coffee or afternoon happy hour. Just be mindful of the neighbors please.

We are available as much as guests would like and will always respect their privacy.

Super transportation options, good bakeries, bars and restaurants in easy walking distance to our home. Try Janik's on Division Street for breakfast!  Tree lined streets and nice homes in our area make this a desirable and walkable neighborhood. (You are in the East Village of Wicker Park!) We are located between two grocery stores: Jewel's and Mariano's with ready cooked meals if you want to save $. You are in walking distance to the actual Wicker Park with great eateries and bars nearby, if you prefer to eat out .You can easily get to the 606 walking/biking trail or take transit/taxi to Ukrainian Village, Logan Square, Bucktown, Lincoln Park, Wrigleyville, the Loop, Water Tower/Michigan Avenue, Chinatown, and many great areas in our city. So much to see and do here, with our world class museums, sports teams, high end shopping and cuisine.

Again - so much choice!Great transit starting with the Division station on the Blue line and therefore 3 stops away from downtown (at Washington). 66 Chicago Ave bus takes you to Navy Pier. 56 Milwaukee and 70 Division street buses are also options,a bit on the slow side, but scenic rides. There's a Divvy bike station very close by on Augusta. Uber and Lyft are easy options for door to door service. Regular taxis are still operating very frequently in our area. You can try hailing them on Division or you can call one. There's a taxi stand at the corner of Milwaukee, Ashland and Division so after your Alliance Bakery or Starbucks excursion, you can walk east about 5-10 minutes to find a cab or the Blue Line station or any of those buses previously mentioned.

Parking: driveway fits two cars off street. $10 per car per night. Payment due at check in via PayPal or Venmo

additional_house_rules: - - Quiet Hours begin at 10 pm - Check-in Anytime After 4 pm - If you have any needs or issues, please message me FIRST (preferable through Airbnb) - If you open it, close it; if you borrow it, return it; if you turn it on, turn it off; if you break it, fix it; if you use it, take care of it; if you make a mess, clean it up; if you move it, put it back - No parties, events, birthdays, bachelor or bachelorette stays - Do not have more guest than stated in your reservation - No Loud music - No disturbance, especially noise past 10pm  - Mail services are not available. We suggests guests set up a temporary mailbox at the UPS Store or USPS - We are not responsible or liable for any accidents, injuries or illness that occur while on the premises or in or around the pool.  - We are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables during your stay. We cannot be responsible for any items left behind. There will be a minimum $100 handling fee for returning requested items to you. Lock box fee: Do not tamper with the security equipment. If you tamper with the equipment there will be a $250 fee and your reservation will be cancelled. There will be a $100 fee if all house keys are not returned to the lockbox after checkout. If any keys are missing there will be a $35 fee per missing key.

description:
• 86 Walk Score (most errands accomplished on foot)
• 74 Transit Score (Transit is convenient for most trips.)
• 83 Bike Score (Very Bikeable )
• Super Fast Business wi-fi
• Fully equipped kitchen
• Extremely safe neighborhood
• Work desk, leather chair, printer
• free street parking
• Washer and Dyer in unit

Note: Stroller, Pack-N-Play, + High Chair, Cable TV complimentary

》4k HD Smart TVs w Netflix, Hulu, Roku,  in every room
》Easy access to freeways
》Minutes To & From the beach
》 Queen Size Bed
》King Size Bed
》Queen size sleeper sofa
》Central Air

house_rules: - - Quiet Hours begin at 10 pm - Check-in Anytime After 4 pm - If you have any needs or issues, please message me FIRST (preferable through Airbnb) - If you open it, close it; if you borrow it, return it; if you turn it on, turn it off; if you break it, fix it; if you use it, take care of it; if you make a mess, clean it up; if you move it, put it back - No parties, events, birthdays, bachelor or bachelorette stays - Do not have more guest than stated in your reservation - No Loud music - No disturbance, especially noise past 10pm  - Mail services are not available. We suggests guests set up a temporary mailbox at the UPS Store or USPS - We are not responsible or liable for any accidents, injuries or illness that occur while on the premises or in or around the pool.  - We are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables during your stay. We cannot be responsible for any items left behind. There will be a minimum $100 handling fee for returning requested items to you. Lock box fee: Do not tamper with the security equipment. If you tamper with the equipment there will be a $250 fee and your reservation will be cancelled. There will be a $100 fee if all house keys are not returned to the lockbox after checkout. If any keys are missing there will be a $35 fee per missing key.

description:
Perfectly located between Midway Airport and Downtown Chicago, Brighton Park is a quiet neighborhood in the city of Chicago.  My place sits across from an elementary school, no front neighbors .Public transportation is easily accessible for either the bus or train, as well as Lyft and Uber. You can go the Downtown, White Sox park, McCormick pl, Chinatown which is just 10 minutes drive,  You'll find Many Restaurants, grocery stores as well as a health club along archer ave.

My home has a welcoming feel  to it due to the front garden being  surrounded by pine trees year round green and inviting.

Guests will be able to access the unit including the front garden.

I’m available as needed

access: Guests will have their own private room with a bathroom close by upstairs.   There is plenty of closet space and you have a mini fridge/freezer and microwave in your room with you if needed.  Also feel free to enjoy sitting out on our front porch/deck in our nice, quiet neighborhood.
description:
Comfortable private bedroom with private bathroom on 2nd floor of a spacious home on a quiet street 2 blocks from CTA Blue line Train (which runs directly downtown and to O'Hare Airport) and the expressway! 7 minute walk to CTA blue line train, 20 min to downtown by train.  Owners live on the 1st floor.  Catch the bus on Addison a block away to head straight to Wrigley Field to see the Cubs game!  Refrigerator and microwave in your room. My wife "Tatiana" and myself "James" will be your hosts.

Your room would be located on the 2nd floor with an upstairs bathroom available.  Microwave, refrigerator and french press are in your room.  My wife Tatiana and I occasionally use our office upstairs but for the most part you will have the 2nd floor to yourself.  We have a queen mattress bed in the room.  It is clean and spacious and can accommodate up to 2 guests (adults only).

Guests will have their own private room with a bathroom close by upstairs.   There is plenty of closet space and you have a mini fridge/freezer and microwave in your room with you if needed.  Also feel free to enjoy sitting out on our front porch/deck in our nice, quiet neighborhood.

It would depend on the guest.  You pretty much have the 2nd floor to yourself which has a bathroom.  My wife Tatiana and I would still use the 2nd floor to use the office but our bedroom is on the first floor.  Our cat roams the house but is very laid back and generally keeps to herself.  You may see us quite a bit in the afternoon/evening hours but it depends on the day of the week . If you are the type of guest who just wants privacy you will certainly have it and if you feel like being more social that's fine too.  We can also work out earlier check in times if needed.

The great thing about our house is that it is in a quiet,  safe neighborhood that is 2 blocks from the CTA Blue Line Train which can take you directly to downtown Chicago or to O'Hare International Airport when you leave for easy travel (20 minutes to downtown, 29 minutes to O'Hare).   It is also close (2 blocks) to the expressway in case you are driving with extremely easy parking in front of the house  (a daily pass is required or you will receive a ticket as it is zoned parking - please let us know and we can provide a daily pass if needed).  Take a bus, Uber or drive yourself straight east on Addison (1 block away) to go watch the Cubs game.  What we love is that it is a quiet home minutes away from the CTA train, bus stops and expressway which can take us either right downtown or to the airport.

The CTA Blue Line train station is located 2 blocks east of my home on Addison and it will take you directly downtown or to O'Hare Airport.   7 minute walk to the CTA blue line train, 20 minutes to downtown by train 29 minute train ride to O'Hare International Airport.  To get to my house walking from the CTA station go west on Addison to Hamlin and take a left (south) to Eddy Street and go right (west) on Eddy.   My house is on the right.  
The CTA 152 Bus for east/west Addison is located 1 block north of Eddy Street on Addison.   This will take you directly to Wrigley Field if you are a Cubs fan or to the lake and shopping in neighborhoods just north of the city.
The I-90/94 Expressway entrances/exits are located 2 blocks east of my home.

Please know that we have a cat in the house in case you have allergies and also so that you will be mindful when going in and out the front foor.  She's an indoor cat and we'd like to keep her secure in her home :)

Also, please let us know if you are driving.  It is permit required parking directly in front of my house.  There is free parking on adjacent streets (Springfield, Hamlin and Addison) but if we know in advance that you'lI be driving we may be able to get you a temporary pass to park in front of the house and avoid a ticket.

Windows can stay cracked open upstairs but not left fully open when you are not home in case it rains.   First floor windows and doors should always be fully closed and locked when no one is home.  I would prefer guests with verified identifications.

 You’ll love my place because of the large windows, comfy beds, large kitchen island, coffee bar,  high ceilings, Wi-Fi/Roku and seating coziness.

access: Laundry facility located on the basement of the main house. The digital door code to the back door of the main house will be provided before check in.
description:
Fantastic location! Steps to restaurants, shops, Lincoln park Zoo, Lake Michigan, Brown line

This is a budget-friendly option for someone who needs to be in the perfect location of town but prefers not to spend a lot of money on rent.

A cozy 1st floor Guest House apartment located in the heart of Historic Old town triangle.

Fantastic location! Steps to restaurants, shops, Lincoln park Zoo, Lake Michigan, Brown line

This is a budget friendly option for someone who needs to be in the perfect location of town but prefers not to spend a lot of money on a rental.

The space is a studio apartment with a comfortable queen size bed, large TV, a kitchenette and a small bathroom.

The kitchenette features a full size refrigerator, stove, microwave, coffee pot, tea pot, pots and pens and utensils. 

Laundry facility (2 sets of LG washer& dryer) is available on the property.

Two bicycles with locks located on the property for the guests to explore the city. 

Guest parking permits are provided upon request.

This home is perfect for business and pleasure, short and long term living. Couples or all ages, business travelers, students, interns or anyone considering a stroll to many great shops, restaurants, neighborhood bars and Lincoln Park

Enjoy many great things Chicago has to offer and return to your cozy city spot.

Video Link:

https://vimeo.com/312638893/2f96310180

Laundry facility located on the basement of the main house. The digital door code to the back door of the main house will be provided before check in.

I am always available via message or phone. The property manager is available in person on a short notice.

The home is situated on a quiet, tree-lined, and secluded street on Old Town Historic District of Lincoln Park. The location is truly ideal - a very private block but just steps (1 block) walking distance from Wells St. where many restaurants, and fun things like the Second City comedy club, coffee shops, fine dining, workout facilities, and grocery stores are located. Just 2 blocks from the Brown Line! Two blocks to Lincoln Park, the Zoo and Lake Michigan running/biking path. A quick uber ride or a 30 min pleasant walk through the park and Gold Coast to Downtown.

Walkable to many attractions in the city. Public transportation (brown line and buses) are within 2 block walk. Uber/Lyft are plentiful and quick. If you are driving your own car, we provide complimentary guest parking permits upon request. Bikes are a great option as well to explore the city.
interaction: I am always available via message or phone. The property manager is available in person on a short notice.

access: Keyless entries
description:
Our lovely 2nd floor 3 bedroom apartment in an historic 2 flat brick home is ready for you.   Beautiful stained glass windows with original wood details.   Hardwood flooring throughout with two porches to enjoy the Oak Park, Illinois lifestyle.   Convenient to Chicago.

Vintage home in a lovely quiet residential community.  Nice indoor porch and quaint outdoor private porches.   Fully equipped kitchen with high end appliances.

Keyless entries

Minimal to none.

Oak Park is famous for Friendly families and neighbors.   Oak Park is essentially a Walking community.  Oak Park, Illinois is also famous for being the location of Frank Loyd Wright's Homes and Studios.   It is also famous for being the Birthplace and Home of Earnest Hemingway.   There are tourist activities including a walking tour, tours of the Frank Loyd Wright Studio's and homes and a Museum at the Earnest Hemingway Home.   There are also local tours offered at the Oak Park Visitors Center.  Overall Oak Park is a wonderful small city near Chicago.

Train line 9/10 of a mile to downtown Chicago.   Bus line two blocks away.

Close to the Frank Loyd Wright Historic District and near downtown Oak Park, Illinois.

description: Safest area downtown, a quiet street next to Michigan Ave. Check out Great location for this apartment home next to Hancock Tower. Unwind after a long day in your very own relaxing soaking tubs, and take in beautiful and breathtaking city views from rooftop deck (summer). A three-minute walk from Lake Michigan and two blocks from Michigan Avenue. Enjoy premium shopping, dining at your doorstep. You can enjoy all that the greater Chicago area has to offer. Gym, Laundry Room in the building.

additional_house_rules:
~ No loud music after 8 pm on weekdays, 10 pm on weekends
~ NO PARTIES or EVENTS * a fee of $350 will be charged  
~ Please book for the exact number of guests who are staying in the unit.  
    The person making the reservation must also be staying in the unit, and must be 
     present at the time of check-in; unless prior written agreement has been made with 
     the host through the Airbnb portal. (NO EXCEPTIONS)
~  Any extra guests will be charged $50 per day per person if not on the original  
    reservation before checking into the unit.
~ All extra fees will be billed through Airbnb resolution center
~ No overnight guests not listed in the reservations
~ Place trash in the black garbage bins outside the yard
~ Please close and lock all doors when leaving the property as we can not be 
    responsible for your personal items
~ Please don’t change or swap pillows (Website hidden by Airbnb) $25 fee will be charged if the pillows are changed out
~ Please turn off lights when you exit the unit, 
    except for the light in the living room next to the recliner rocker near the front window.
~ Free street parking
~ DO NOT PARK ON PARKING PAD OR VEHICLE MAY BE TOWED AT OWNERS EXPENSE -  
   *Private parking directly behind the building is available for a $35 fee.  Inquire with Host
~ NO SMOKING PERMITTED IN THE UNIT or HALLWAYS (OF ANY KIND).  
    This includes cigarettes, vaping, e-cigs, pipes, cigars, marijuana, cigarellos, 
     hookas, etc… $350 charge if discovered smoking.  
     You are free to smoke at the back fence near the parking pad.  
     Discard butts and/or packaging in the black trash bin located in the parking pad area
~ Please do not clean make-up with towels. Will be charged for replacement $20
~ Please do not order movies, if you do, they will be charged to you
~ Please do not take maps, menus, towels, and things that are in the apartment 
    meant for guests use while occupying the unit
~ Do not flush anything other than toilet paper in the toilet
~ DO NOT rearrange furniture
~ Shower curtain must be inside the tub while the shower is in use to prevent 
    water damage
~ Please place dishes in the dishwasher on the day of check-out. 
~ Any Chicagoland (includes surrounding suburbs) request must be by inquiry. If you 
     instant book, it will be canceled as a house rule violation and forfeiture 
     of entire reservation cost
~ DO NOT PARK ON PARKING PAD OR VEHICLE MAYBE TOWED AT OWNERS EXPENSE
~ We are not responsible or liable for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occur while on 
     the premises
~ We are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables during your stay
~ We cannot be responsible for any items left
~ Surveillance cameras are located at the entrances/exits. No cameras are located in the 
     private areas
~ Please sure all doors are locked when checking out. 
~ Please remove any full trash bags, placing them in the black trash bins behind the 
    building.  
~ Any dirty linens can be left on the beds or placed on the bathroom floor. 
~ Please be respectful of the neighbors by not causing loud noises in the residential 
    community.
~ Upon booking you automatically agree with using the internet wisely and further agree 
    to not use the internet and/or WiFi for any illicit or illegal purposes
~ Place keys back in the lock box and lock the box upon check out
~ Any package delivery will cancel the stay and will be reported to Airbnb
~ Ages 25 and below are NOT allowed unless accompanied or supervised by a parent
~  Early Check-In Fees: 
     Early check-in fee: $20 per hour
     Early check-in hours: 8:00 a.m. – 2:00 p.m.
~  Early Check-Out Fees: The entire cost of the reservation
     Late check out Fees: 
     Late Check out Fee: $ 25 per hour (Fees include late checkout 
     and luggage storage)
     Late check out hours 12:00 p.m. – 3:00 p.m.
There is 1 other very important rule: PLEASE READ THE HOUSE RULES AND YOUR CHECK-IN INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY, this is mandatory! Thank you

description:
FREE parking on premises
English garden unit with 9 foot ceilings

~ 5-6 Guests ~ 1 bedroom ~ 2 plush pillow-top Qn beds, with 40” LED SMART TV
~ second bedroom 1 plush pillow-top Queen bed with 32” TV
~ sofa
~ 1 bath w/tub
50” 4K LED TV in LVNG RM w/ cable in LVNG Rm & BDRM, 40" LED SMART TV in bedroom, 32" TV in second bedroom

*** 1 NGHT available***
Please inquire with the host

Fully equipped kitchen w/service for 6 people

* Guest access the entire unit
 2 bedrooms ~ 3 Queen beds ~ 1 bath

Unit is a spacious English garden apartment with 9 foot ceilings.
50” 4K LED TV, Cable in LVNG RM & BDRM, Fully Equipped Kitchen
* Central Air/Heat * Coin OP Washer/Dryer *Coffee/Tea * Toiletries *

I will only be a phone call away if needed as the guest will have use of the entire unit.  It is not a shared space.

This a family-friendly neighborhood where children still ride their bicycles and play outside.  It has one of the lowest crime rates in the city of Chicago.  We are minutes from/to Midway Airport.  Starbucks and a 24 hour Dunkin Donuts and McDonalds are only steps from the unit.  Walgreens is only 5 blocks away, open until midnight for those important items you realize you need.

City Chicago transit authority to and from Midway airport is directly across the street.  This bus also takes passengers to the Orange Line train which goes back and forth  into downtown Chicago.

CHICAGOLAND (including surrounding suburbs) you must inquiry with the host before booking; otherwise any reservations made will be canceled and can possibly result in a loss of all monies paid towards the reservation.

description:
Great area in portage park located in the city awesome location close to everything bars parks trains malls express ways and Plenty of FREE parking right out in front and only 20min to the beach / Lake Michigan and 25min to downtown Chicago. Blue line trains to O’Hare within walking distance O’Hare airport only 9 miles away as well.

It's very quiet,quaint and cozy you will sleep like a baby.
This space also has its own private entrance so you can come and go as you please without bother. There is a washer and dryer that is available to use with your own detergent and there is a sink as well for washing plates and dishes.

Guests can access the space through a private entrance without bother and would have the whole space to themselves as long as the other room is not being rented please ask if this is of importance.

As often as they would like.

Very Close to parks public transportation restaurants bank bars grocery store and drug stores as well.

access to public transportation is very convenient and available 24hr. Buses trains stops are with in walking distance.

Extended stays after The noon checkout time without a request to do so  will be charged 50.00

description: Amazing large studio apartment with views of the city and Lake Michigan. Extremely cozy, feel-at-home apartment for your perfect weekend getaway. Short walking distance from Navy Pier, Lakeshore Drive, Lake Michigan, and the iconic Michigan Avenue. Immediate access to Lakeshore Drive allows for quick commutes to other parts of the city easily. Building has a gym, pool, hot-tub, (great) complimentary coffee, roof deck with the best views in the city, grills, and great space for entertaining.

description:
This was a single-family listing, but now is just one bedroom in the home. Lots of natural light, open floorplan.  Perfect kitchen for preparing meals and entertaining.

Welcome to my private oasis in Chicago! 

This house was renovated  and everything is new! Your bedroom has a full-size bed, desk, large closet,  vaulted ceiling's, and ceiling fan.  There is a private bathroom for you to use just outside of the bedroom door.  A washing machine and dryer is also available next to the bedroom for your use. 

I live in the home with my 3 year old so there are plenty of toys, games, and baby items if you need them. There is a pack and play, highchair, stroller if needed.

There are hardwood floors throughout the house, and everything is decorated very neutral.  There is a large flat screen TV in the living room with Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu, Sling TV, HBO now, STARZ and Showtime. Also a blueray player, and there are built in surround sound speakers in the ceiling of the first floor.  There is a great gas fireplace that just requires the flip of the switch. The kitchen is large, perfect for entertaining and there are all the pots/pans/blender etc needed to cook a great meal.  There is a built in booth with a flat screen tv for use, and a gas Weber grill and a small charcoal grill on the back patio. 

No need to look for Chicago street parking here.  The home has a driveway that can accomodate 3 cars. Have a glass of wine on the front porch or a beer on the back patio with firepit for your enjoyment.  A tree was recently cut down so there is plenty of firewood to use. The home sits on a double lot, which gives you and your group plenty of space for activies in the yard.

The home features sling TV, Netflix, and Roku or Chromecast.  The Wi-Fi is quite fast, and very reliable. All sheets and towels are provided for you so there is no need to bring your own. This would be a pefect place for someone who needs temporary housing while relocating, or a perfect place for a short vacation to come and explore the city. 

Home features the famous "Moustache Mirror", try it out, take photo, and send to your friends! 

The  blue line train is the nearest stop and it'll take you straight downtown or to ohare airport.  If you are driving, this is a good location because it is near 90/94 to get in or out of the city very easily.   If you're planning on going to a Cubs game or spending time in Wrigleyville, the house is a two minute walk from Addison ave, you can hop on a bus there and go straight down the road to the bars, stadium, restaurants, etc.  Chicago is a very easy city to drive, and can get to the magnificant mile in 20 minutes.

Staying in our home, we will try to incorporate you as much as you wish into our family activities.  Some of our guests like to cook and dine with us, while others prefer to eat alone.  We respect whichever you choose, but always want you to know you are welcome to hang out with our little family.

We occasionally will watch a small to medium size dog.  The dog would not ever be in your personal bedroom or space, but in the common areas.
house_rules: The Rules of the house are simple.  Treat it with respect and treat it like its your own.  No smoking in the house, no illegal drugs, and please clean up after yourself. :)  If you break something please replace it or let me know.

We respect whichever you choose, but always want you to know you are welcome to hang out with our little family.
notes: We occasionally will watch a small to medium size dog.  The dog would not ever be in your personal bedroom or space, but in the common areas.

access:
You will be able to use laundry at the building and all apartment area, which includes:
King size bed with bed linens, pillows and blankets and closet for your clothes. 
Bathtub shower, hair dryer, large towels, body soap, shampoo and conditioner.
TV flat screen with Netflix available, Wi-Fi high-speed, air conditioning & heating.
Full kitchen: refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, toaster, coffee machine, electric kettle and all kitchen utensils.
description:
Enjoy a stunning city view from this well located high-rise apartment steps away from the Skydeck, Millennium Park, Cloud Gate and Magnificent Mile. Located in Chicago downtown, giving you the luxury of premiere shopping, dining-outs, and cosmopolitan attractions at your doorstep, you will feel like a native! This unit offers all amenities that you will need to have the best stay possible.

This lovely space offers you an oasis of privacy in a unique and convenient location. It is also a very short walk to the center of Chicago and to easy transportation to everywhere! 
This studio has its own eat-in kitchen, a private bath and a comfortable king size bed. There is a flat screen cable tv in the living room with Netflix and Wi-Fi high-speed internet in all unit. 
The amenities will guarantee the comfort needed for the best stay that we want you to have in our space.

You will be able to use laundry at the building and all apartment area, which includes:
King size bed with bed linens, pillows and blankets and closet for your clothes. 
Bathtub shower, hair dryer, large towels, body soap, shampoo and conditioner.
TV flat screen with Netflix available, Wi-Fi high-speed, air conditioning & heating.
Full kitchen: refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, toaster, coffee machine, electric kettle and all kitchen utensils.

We will be happy to answer any questions you might have and provide information both ahead of time and during your stay.

Please plan your initial arrival and check in to be before 10 pm if at all possible. We like to welcome and orient our guests in person. 
If there is a last minute situation, please check with us first. 
Check in time is from 3 pm and check out is 11 am but if schedule permits, we are happy to be flexible.

access: Living room with 55 in tv, HBO and extra sports channels, full kitchen, patio and grill, library hall and laundry.
description:
Recently featured on Houzz, this large private room in a shared house has a Queen bed, desk, two windows, TV & a place to hang your clothes. Enjoy your own private marbled bathroom with double shower head, & vanity stocked with all the essentials you need. We supply towels, sheets  & parking permits.

We love art and design and hope our home reflects that. This newly remodeled modern space is perfect for hanging out in the living room (55in TV with Netflix etc) enjoying a book or game in our library, and cooking in the fully stocked kitchen or BBQ ing on our patio.  The home has central air throughout- so heat in the winter and A/C in the summer. All the rooms have ceiling fans for the in between seasons.

This beautiful, sunny,  private Master bedroom is in a shared house. This room has a queen sized bed, marble vanity and shower, a sitting chair by a tree-view window, small desk, ceiling fan, flat screen TV, wifi. We provide parking permits, towels and sheets. In the rest of the shared house, you will also have access to our library, laundry, living room, kitchen, and patio with grill.  Our home has central air, so heat in the winter and AC in the summer.  You will hear the train as it passes (three lots over), but the sound will hopefully woosh you to sleep :)

See our recent feature in Houzz!
(website hidden)(phone number hidden)/list/my-houzz-eclectic-industrial-style-in-a-charming-chicago-home


Want to be out? You're a 5-10 minute walk to many great shops, restaurants and bars. We are 20 minutes to downtown via the Red line EL train, 5 minute walk to Wrigley Baseball Stadium, 7 minute walk to Southport Street where all the family restaurants and great shops are, and a 10 minute walk to Boys Town.  The Roscoe House is the perfect place for your stay in Chicago! 

Remember though, with all this great access to city fun- you will be in the city, which means you will hear the train pass behind the house (3 lots over) and if the windows are open, you might hear the neighbors. Most say that the train sounds like a nice woosh to lull you to sleep :)
Permit street parking is available (we can give you a permit), and of course we have wifi. 
Recent feature on Houzz!
(website hidden)(phone number hidden)/list/my-houzz-eclectic-industrial-style-in-a-charming-chicago-home

Living room with 55 in tv, HBO and extra sports channels, full kitchen, patio and grill, library hall and laundry.

We can be available to you often as you need. There will most likely be other guests staying in the two other guest rooms, but there's a chance you'll have the whole house to yourself!

Easy access to everything!

7 minute walk to the Belmont stop on the EL redline train. 20 minute ride to downtown Loop.

We are close to the train so you will hear the woosh as it passes a few houses behind ours.

description:
This reservation is custom built to host LARGE reservations for 20-44 people.  The entire building can be rented out and you would have access to the entire building which consists of 4 individual suites.  The listing is a mini-hotel which has been custom built for intimate housing for large groups.  

Perfect for weddings, bachelor/bachelorette parties, corporate retreats, student groups.  You will get 4 Suites, access to 2 parking garages and exclusive access to 2 party decks on the roof.

This building is undergoing a 100% transformation!  It will be opening it's doors to travelers 5/1/18 with BRAND NEW EVERYTHING!  Unfortunately we don't have any pictures to show yet but rest assured it will be AMAZING!

There are a total of 4, 2 bedroom apartments each with it's own kitchen.  There are 2 Queen size beds in every bedroom.  Total of 16 beds along with a pullout queen size sleeper sofa in each unit adding 4 additional beds.  20 Queen size beds total!

We also rent out the 4 individual suites based on availability.  Please contact us for a quote.

This is located downtown, in the bustling and growing neighborhood of River North.

description:
3 levels of luxurious living. You and your companions have unlimited access to the front deck, as well as, private rear deck. Very spacious sleeping areas for 8+. Large kitchen w/stainless appliances. More than enough room to relax and enjoy your stay. Walking distance to beach. Less than 10 min drive to McCormick Place, Soldier Field, Wintrust Arena, University of Chicago, Hyde Park as well as future home of Obama Pres Museum. Less than a 15 min drive to Navy Pier, Millennium Park and Mag Mile.

If you're looking for something that's perfect for groups or a family stay this culturally diverse community is just that. Grab a divvy bike and hit the bike path to Buckingham fountain to start the day. You’ll be literally 2 minutes from Lakeshore Dr or I90, which puts you on the path to all Chicago has to offer. The hardwood floors and granite will make your stay a bliss. Enjoy board games, darts or just kick back and enjoy premium cable television on one of the five flat screens. Mariano’s, Whole Foods and Tons of local restaurants.

L A fitness just couple minutes drive or enjoy the lakefront running track or bike path.

Your host or an agent will be available 24hours a day by phone or in person if requested.

Historic Bronzeville, Hyde Park
2 mins Lake Shore Dr
6 mins University of Chicago Hosp & campus 
8 mins Wintrust Arena & McCormick Place
9 mins White Sox & Bears Stadium
15 mins Navy Pier, Millennium Park
In this safe diverse urban community you will be minutes from all the city has to offer.
There is always plenty of free parking on the street,  and public transportation or divvy bike rental short walk away.

Primarily car, bike, or taxi.

There is plenty of free parking on street. There is no access to garage on property. I ask that guest please respect the no smoking policy inside. There is plenty of space where you are welcome to smoke in back. Also parties are prohibited. Loud amplified music/dj, traffic prohibited. Absolutely NO loud music after 10pm. Parties, traffic of guest, loud outdoor activity, smoking inside will terminate your stay on the spot. No refunds.

description:
Our place is your home away from home! Our neighborhood is great, conveniently located and we pride ourselves in being the best hosts possible by providing you with all the information you need to make your stay in Chicago great. See full description

Quaint neighborhood right outside of busy downtown close to the United center, with lounges and bars within walking distance. Directly down the street from Navy Pier on Grand Ave. A few blocks from Harpo studios Bottom Lounge music venue. Free wifi, and a rare find in Chicago - free street parking!(when available, which is usually often.)

More about the space and the area:
A converted storefront, Blush Lounge is located in the west loop area, in one of the most entertaining neighborhoods in Chicago, close to all the sights, where there is always something to do.
This private bedroom has a big, comfy queen size bed and a 32" LCD monitor and a DVD player, sorry no cable. I have a few DVDs but I would suggest stopping by a Redbox before you come.

Entertainment
Within walking distance of Mahoney's Irish Pub, Grandbar which is a great lounge, Output, Beauty bar, and Union park which is host to many different music festivals and events including Pitchfork and North Coast, shows at the bottom lounge. the United Center is just down the street.

Food
The pubs around here are known for their great food specials but for more family oriented environments there is the Breakfast Club is located directly behind us. They are said to have chicago's #1 rated french toast. There is Coalfire, Chicago's best flatbread pizza. Oggi's trattoria, Kai Sushi, Bella Notte and Burger Baron are all next door. If you must they just opened a new Mcdonalds down the street. We also have D'amatos Bakery, the best fresh baked bread for a great sandwich. If you plan to stay in for the night we have a great wine store across the street with select liquor and beer. There is also Green Grocer across the street for all your grocery needs.
For the coffee lovers: starbucks, dunkin donuts and a local shop called Sip are all within a block or two.

Transportation
The grand bus stop is directly in front of our place as well as cabs, Close to the expressway, 2 blue line subway stops, making it easy to get from/to the airport, EL lines, and other public transportation connections. Metra Station a half mile up the road, for north and south bound suburban trains so you can easily explore this amazing city.

*Kitchen availability and Bedding arrangements subject to change. Please inquire before booking.
*We also rent out the storefront of our building for events, or for a bed in shared space, see other posts to book!
*bathroom(s) shared with other guests if there are an

If you have any questions or concerns about anything please give me a call /text 630.742.9934

Neighborhood is beautiful, everything is close by!

Transportation~
The Grand bus stop is directly in front of our place as well as cabs, Close to the expressway, 2 blue line subway stops, making it easy to get from/to the airport, EL lines, and other public transportation connections. Metra Station a half mile up the road, for north and south bound suburban trains so you can easily explore this amazing city.

More about the space and the area:
A converted storefront, Blush Lounge is located in the west loop area, in one of the most entertaining neighborhoods in Chicago, close to all the sights, where there is always something to do.
This private bedroom has a big, comfy queen size bed and a 32" LCD monitor and a DVD player, sorry no cable. I have a few DVDs but I would suggest stopping by a Redbox before you come.

Entertainment
Within walking distance of Mahoney's Irish Pub, Grandbar which is a great lounge, Output, Beauty bar, and Union park which is host to many different music festivals and events including Pitchfork and North Coast, shows at the bottom lounge. the United Center is just down the street.

Food
The pubs around here are known for their great food specials but for more family oriented environments there is the Breakfast Club is located directly behind us. They are said to have chicago's #1 rated french toast. There is Coalfire, Chicago's best flatbread pizza. Oggi's trattoria, Kai Sushi, Bella Notte and Burger Baron are all next door. If you must they just opened a new Mcdonalds down the street. We also have D'amatos Bakery, the best fresh baked bread for a great sandwich. If you plan to stay in for the night we have a great wine store across the street with select liquor and beer. There is also Green Grocer across the street for all your grocery needs.
For the coffee lovers: starbucks, dunkin donuts and a local shop called Sip are all within a block or two.

Transportation
The grand bus stop is directly in front of our place as well as cabs, Close to the expressway, 2 blue line subway stops, making it easy to get from/to the airport, EL lines, and other public transportation connections. Metra Station a half mile up the road, for north and south bound suburban trains so you can easily explore this amazing city.

*Kitchen availability and Bedding arrangements subject to change. Please inquire before booking.
*We also rent out the storefront of our building for events, or for a bed in shared space, see other posts to book!
*bathroom(s) shared with other guests if there are an
summary: Our place is your home away from home! Our neighborhood is great, conveniently located and we pride ourselves in being the best hosts possible by providing you with all the information you need to make your stay in Chicago great. See full description

access: Feel free to use the kitchen, fridge, stove, etc if needed and help yourself to the Keurig coffee maker or tea kettle, I usually have a wide selection of teas and coffees for your enjoyment!
description:
Your hideout in the City! Cozy, nice size apt. in vintage Chicago spot w/ comfortable amenities & a fun vibe. Private room & a perfect place to relax after enjoying the city! Minutes from Grant Park & downtown and all the city has to offer! 

•100% free street parking
•Close to Loop
•UIC, Columbia, Taylor Street
•Wicker Park
•planetarium, Shed Aquarium
•Walking distance to great restaurants & coffee shops!
•Brand New Designer mattress 
•Newly remodeled bedroom 
•new carpet, paint, linens, etc

Pilsen is one of the most historic and oldest neighborhoods in Chicago, very lively and colorful and full of culture and history! Lots to do in walking distance and near by! This is a vintage 3 unit brick building in the heart of Chicago!

Feel free to use the kitchen, fridge, stove, etc if needed and help yourself to the Keurig coffee maker or tea kettle, I usually have a wide selection of teas and coffees for your enjoyment!

We are happy to help make your stay comfortable and cater to your needs. We respect the need for quiet solitude but also are happy to show you the highlights of Pilsen and Chicago, if you need some direction.  FYI due to my busy schedule I'm not in the house most of the time, but Feel free to call or text me anytime with questions or if you need suggestions for anything in the city!

Pilsen is a an amazing lively neighborhood with an artistic flare! Cute shops and restaurants on 18th street (one block north) and super close to downtown Chicago. A few blocks from Thalia Hall (music venue). Easy bus or bike ride to McCormick place. Please check out my guidebook for restaurant, bar and amenity suggestions!!

Getting around

Easy access to downtown via public transportation.

Easy access to downtown via public transportation.

There’s a bus 2 blocks away, metra train 3 blocks away, L train within .6 blocks away, and a Short Lyft or Uber ride from all tourist attractions downtown and in the city. Also walking distance to spectacular restaurants and lounges!

Just heads up, we adopted a Frenchie this Christmas, he’s 11 mos old chubby black ball of awesomeness. He’s a well behaved dog, friendly, loving, quiet pup(doesn’t bark) but want to make sure you know ahead of time!

description:
Please note that pictures are of a similar Domio unit in Chicago.

Complete your Chicago experience by staying in this elegant home! Centrally located in the heart of Chicago, this stunning space was thoughtfully designed to capture local flair and make you feel at home. Whether traveling solo, with friends, or with family, see the best of art, architecture, and cuisine that Chicago has to offer and have an unforgettable experience staying at this Domio.

All Domios are designed with style and comfort in mind and this space is no different. This 2 bedroom and 2 bath home boasts a brand new living room, luxury furniture, and customized finishes. In addition to a fully-stocked kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, guests will be pleased to find hand-picked decor and artwork throughout the home. 

Bedroom 1:
Queen bed

Bedroom 2:
Queen bed

Common Area:
Sofa bed
Air mattress

Guests also have access to the building's fitness center.

We do our best to tailor each experience to our guests preferences. Want advice, suggestions, or a shoulder to lean on? We are always available at your disposal. Need a place to stay but don't feel like chatting? That's okay too, we won't be offended.

Chicago Registration: Pending

Please note that we do not allow bookings from residents of Chicago.

description:
Very cozy 1100sq ft loft-style garden apartment close to McCormick Place(1 mile), Field Museum, Soldier Field, Shedd Aquarium and 10 minutes from Downtown.

Access to public transportation (bus stop about 500ft away), Mariano’s Grocery Store, and Chicago Famous Chicken and Waffle restaurant.

Self check-in with smart lock

Very cozy 1 bedroom, large family room, dinning section, full kitchen, and a laundry room.

Guests have access to the front of the property and the entire space described here. Guests have no access to the back of the property.

While I respect your privacy, I am also available to answer questions.

Historic neighborhood.

Easy acess to public transportation: bus stop less than 500ft away, train station (Green Line) 2 blocks away.  3 major highways closed by(Lake Shore Drive, Dan Ryan, and the Stevenson) all less than half a mile away. Easy  Uber/Lyft pick-up and or drop-off.

summary:
Very cozy 1100sq ft loft-style garden apartment close to McCormick Place(1 mile), Field Museum, Soldier Field, Shedd Aquarium and 10 minutes from Downtown.

Access to public transportation (bus stop about 500ft away), Mariano’s Grocery Store, and Chicago Famous Chicken and Waffle restaurant.

Self check-in with smart lock
transit: Easy acess to public transportation: bus stop less than 500ft away, train station (Green Line) 2 blocks away.  3 major highways closed by(Lake Shore Drive, Dan Ryan, and the Stevenson) all less than half a mile away. Easy  Uber/Lyft pick-up and or drop-off.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules:  
All bookings require a security deposit of $500 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance.  

Kindly note that the special reduction in Cleaning Fees is only for the Winter Season (1 dec 2018)hence the regular Cleaning fees of USD 150 will be applicable for all arrivals on or after 01 March, 2019 on wards.  

For security purposes, we require all guests to provide an ID verification, license, or passport before check-in.   

Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds.   

Check-in time is any time after 4 P.M. Check-out time is any time before 11 a.m. If an earlier check-in or a later check-out time is desired, then you can send us a request. However, this is not guaranteed. 

We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine.   

Our locations do not allow pets.   No parties, gatherings or events of any kind are allowed in the unit. 

 If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $50 for every extra hour of cleaning required.  Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events. 

 Lost or unreturned keys will result in an additional $100 fee (per set). 

 If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full.   We may ask to hold in advance a damage/security deposit for last minute reservations or local stays.

If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately.   

If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance.   

When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.  

Shoes off, please.

description:
Treat yourself to a modern getaway in a Alto Suite on exciting Michigan Avenue! Enjoy the comforts of a plush hotel in the privacy of a light, airy apartment just minutes from The McCormick Place and The Wintrust Arena.
Neighborhood Overview:
This apartment is conveniently located within walking distance of the McCormick Place and a short drive to all tourist attractions including the Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium, and famous Chicago Bean. Get ready to experience the best of Chicago during your stay!

Designed with the traveler in mind, this 3 Bedroom Alto Suite (sleeps 8) caters to all your needs in a modern, spacious layout with artistic decor that gives this suite a sophisticated edge. Set against the beautiful Chicago skyline, the Braque Suite is a hub of culture in the clouds.

Alto suites offer guests a modern space with custom comforts that are a cut above the usual AirBnB experience. Each room is uniquely designed with its own stylish accents and convenient amenities to give you the perfect mixture of home and away. At the premium status level, the Alto suite provides you with a premiere experience in a premiere city.

At a Glance

* Custom furnishings 
* Alba Botanical bath and body products
* 55-inch 4K TV’s and sound bars
* Fast Internet 
* Amazon Dot
* Nespresso coffee maker w/ Nespresso pods
*In walking distance to the best bars and restaurants
*Concierge services available from 9am to 10pm (central)

Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.

This apartment is conveniently located within walking distance of the McCormick Place and a short drive to all tourist attractions including the Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium, and famous Chicago Bean. Get ready to experience the best of Chicago during your stay!

Paid parking @ USD 40$ per night,please contact us for more information.

access: Wifi, Hbo, laundry, kitchen
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING THANK YOU.
A garden apartment in a great location in the Avondale neighborhood.  The apartment is near the Blue Line 10 minutes walk, Walgreens, a movie theater, Target, neighborhood restaurants, and just north of Logan Square bars and restaurants. The place has low ceiling so if you are taller than 6'2"is not a good fit for you.

The building has 3 units and the apartment is located in the basement. The other two units are ocupied by nice people. The apartment has 1 bedroom with a queen bed, living room with a sofa bed,  1 bath room and a complete kitchen. The laundry room is share with the other people in the building.

Wifi, Hbo, laundry, kitchen

As long as the guest wants

Pretty nice area, safe, close to bars, restaurants and the loop. The bus runs every 15 minutes and can take you to the train station. Or you can walk to the train station which is 15 minutes walking

There is convenient transpostation, and from this apartment you can go anywhere, ohare, midway, loop,

Is a private apartment so you can come and goes as you please. Other people live in the buildibg so we would like to respect their privacy and quietness. I will give you the keys of the apartment  my self or i would leave it in a safe box.

description:
Renovated 2 bed/2 bath condo in Hyde Park Neighborhood.  Very sunny private room with attached private bath.

This is a two bedroom two bathroom condo in the Hyde Park neighborhood of Chicago.  This fully renovated condo is located on the third floor with no elevator.  The block is quiet and has plenty of free street parking available.

Bedroom
Private Bathroom
Kitchen/Living Room
Free street parking in front of house

Both my sister and I currently live in the condo so you may run into us from time to time. We keep to ourselves for the most part but if you have any questions about the condo/city/neighborhood we are happy to help.

This Hyde Park condo is located within walking distance of all that Hyde Park has to offer.  On 53rd street you can find restaurants, shopping, and the neighborhood Harper movie theater.  The University of Chicago and U of C Medical Center are only a 13 minute walk.  In this area you will also find the neighborhood ice rink and bowling alley. There is a Walgreens within 3 blocks. For a day at the beach or a walk along Lake Michigan's Lakefront path take a 20 min walk east. Other nearby points of interest include Promotory Point Park, Lakeshore Drive, and the Museum of Science and Industry.

There is a large amount of free parking in front of the house. 13 Minute walk to the University of Chicago. Several bus routes within walking distance (example bus route 4,3, and 15). Fifteen min walk to Metra Hyde Park Orange line station, it is a 20 min ride to Millennium Park from this stop.  Uber also services this area.
house_rules:
No smoking
No pets
Be considerate of our neighbors (volume control especially between 11pm-8am)
Please leave shoes at the entrance

Bright, clean colorful 1 bedroom apartment with great architectural details. Hardwood floors, new tile in bathroom. Wifi, Apple TV and utilities included.

Available 8/1-8/30 one bedroom apartment in Wicker Park with central air, dishwasher, washer/dryer in unit. Full kitchen with coffee maker, microwave, 6 quart Instant Pot, professional grade Vitamix blender, gas stove and toaster oven. Glassware, plateware and flatware included. There are plenty of pots, pans and cookbooks. 

Bedroom has a queen-sized, 6 month-old Stearns and Foster mattress that's super comfortable.

I will be out of state but will respond to to your email, text or phone call immediately

access: You will have access to the entire 1st floor apartment. The first floor balcony is exclusively yours too.
description:
Spacious, vintage apartment in the heart of the city. Wonderful library, walls of art, work space, outdoor lounging, comfortable bedrooms. From one traveler to another, you will be in a great location. Easy and direct public transportation to downtown. Walkable, hip neighborhood with some of Chicago's best restaurants, art galleries, music venues and unique shops.

This apartment is on the 1st floor of an hundred year old two flat. And although we are certain you will be charmed by the feel, decor and location, we want to make sure that you know there is nothing modern about this accommodation. We are currently, albeit slowly, restoring the apartment to it's original glory. Soon the floors will be re-sanded, more of the windows will open and furnishings will be upgraded. For now, we confidently call it clean, comfortable, eclectic and endearing. Please feel free to ask any questions. Thank you for considering our oldie but goodie home.

You will have access to the entire 1st floor apartment. The first floor balcony is exclusively yours too.

We respect the privacy of our guests but are available for anything that may come up. Feel free to ask for directions and recommendations. We live in the 2nd floor apartment so only a few steps away.

We kindly ask that our guests be respectful of our neighbors as this community is dear to us. Generally, it is pretty quiet after 11PM.

access: Big eat-in kitchen with sitting area and beautiful light throughout. Quiet and comfortable place for relaxing and visiting Chicago.
description:
A warm and welcoming apartment in a two-flat house, in one of Chicago's great neighborhoods. Easy to walk to grocery, restaurants, shopping and nightlife, and 5 minutes to the Blue Line station that gets you downtown fast, and 30 minutes to O'Hare Airport. Milwaukee Avenue, Division Street, North Avenue are all well known areas of Wicker Park that surround the house.

New Queen bed, Two comfortable couches and sitting areas, fully equipped kitchen.

Big eat-in kitchen with sitting area and beautiful light throughout. Quiet and comfortable place for relaxing and visiting Chicago.

I like to greet my guests and welcome you. Please send your travel information, so we can make arrangements.
In rare cases, we will leave the key for you. There is a house manual in the flat, with details about Wi-FI, lights and heating, neighborhood suggestions, grocery locations, and other good information.
The owner is nearby and can answer any other questions.

Wicker Park is one of Chicago's great neighborhoods, with restaurants, bars, music venues and lively street scene along Milwaukee, Damen and North avenue.

The recommended train stop is Damen on the CTA Blue Line. CTA blue line trains run from O'Hare Airport to downtown - Damen and Division stations serve Wicker Park.

Milwaukee Avenue, Division Street, North Avenue are all well known areas of Wicker Park that surround the house.
transit: The recommended train stop is Damen on the CTA Blue Line. CTA blue line trains run from O'Hare Airport to downtown - Damen and Division stations serve Wicker Park.

access: Entire unit and all the amenities of the building including the work out facility, outdoor pool, party room, media room and all common areas.
description:
Fully FURNISHED 1 BED west facing CONDO. Two blocks west of Michigan Ave. Full Amenities building with outdoor pool, fitness center, party room & theater room. Open kitchen, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances. Breakfast Bar. Hardwood floors. Flat screen TV in living room & bedroom. Newer Furniture throughout. King Bed. Comes with all linens, sheets & towels. Includes HDTV Cable w/DVR & WiFi Internet. Electric is add'l. $1-3/day avg. Covered Parking $250/mth = $8.33/day.

Beautiful private condominiums with 24 hour doorman.  Fully furnished with everything you'll need.  Just bring your suitcases.

Entire unit and all the amenities of the building including the work out facility, outdoor pool, party room, media room and all common areas.

Call/Text anytime for any of your needs.  I'm in the building most everyday.

30 E. Huron is right in the heart of the River North area cathedral district.  Two blocks west of the Magnificent Mag Mile of Michigan Ave.  Two blocks south of Chicago Avenue.  Three grocery stores and 20 restaurants in walking distance.

Red Line train two blocks away at State Street & Chicago Avenue.  Cabs and Uber cars right outside the entrance of building on Wabash Street.

The electric bill will be given to tenant after their stay for reimbursement.

access: Guests have full access to the apartment living room, the bathroom and kitchen. The kitchen is fully furnished with all new appliances (range, refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher) pots, pans, dishes, eating utensils, rice cooker and electric kettle.
description:
A private bedroom in a three bedroom apartment located in Chicago's Marshall Square/Pilsen/Douglas Park neighborhood.

The apartment was completely renovated recently and is located on the second floor of a three story century old vintage brick building, locally known as a three flat. It was redone in the style of a "soft loft" and has 10 foot ceilings, spiral duct work, newly refinished hardwood maple floors and an exposed brick wall in the kitchen. This bedroom (2C) is one of three in the apartment and has an extra long twin bed  an armoire and a secretary desk. The apartment is shared- at a maximum - with two others. Each guest has their own bedroom. Each bedroom door has a keyed lock. The bedrooms are small but the apartment is large, open and bright. The storage in the bedroom is not cluttered with other people's belongings. It's empty and entirely available for your use. 

The apartment is located less than a block from the California Pink Line elevated stop which is less than 20 minutes from the Loop. There is a Divvy bike share station at the El stop.  There are two grocery stores, a Walmart, a Planet Fitness, and many restaurants within a short walking distance from the building.

Guests have full access to the apartment living room, the bathroom and kitchen. The kitchen is fully furnished with all new appliances (range, refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher) pots, pans, dishes, eating utensils, rice cooker and electric kettle.

I am always available, either at the building or can be reached by text, email or phone.

Marshall Square, adjacent to the better known Pilsen area, was settled and built largely by Czechs in the later part of the 19th  and early 20th century. Buildings are almost exclusively brick with attractive facades and are separated by narrow "gangways". While not one of Chicago's trendier areas, transportation links into the Loop are excellent, with a train station at the end of the block and less than a 20 minute ride to the Loop. The neighborhood is predominately Mexican now, with many excellent and inexpensive restaurants. Laguinitas Brewery and Pub is just a few blocks away as is Cinespace Movie Studio, where several network and cable tv shows are filmed.

The apartment is located less than a block from the California Pink Line elevated stop which is 20 minutes from the Loop. There is a Divvy bike share station at the El stop and five zipcars within a few blocks. There are two grocery stores, a Walmart, a Planet Fitness, and many restaurants within a short walking distance from the building.

For medical students completing a clinical rotation: St. Anthony's Hospital is around the corner, Mt. Sinai Hospital is six blocks away, and the Illinois Medical District (Rush, University of Illinois, Stroger and Jesse Brown Hospitals) are just 4 stops away (8 minutes)   on the Pink line El .
house_rules: A quiet, respectful, professional environment must be maintained at all times. Absolutely no smoking or partying.
interaction: I am always available, either at the building or can be reached by text, email or phone.

description:
Here, you are close to all the amenities that Chicago and Lake Michigan have to offer, but you're hidden away from the hustle and bustle of the big city. So, go enjoy the great museums in the city, the active outdoor lifestyle, or shows and then come back to this comfortable retreat to relax, enjoy and recharge!

This unit is quaintly decorated, sunshine filled, overlooking street and quiet park in the ideal Evanston location - yet an easy walk to lake, L, Metra train and retail with a City Park right across the street! This is a condo quality unit with dishwasher, lots of closets, etc. in a boutique, professionally managed rental building. Huge 2 Bed /1 Bath with spacious floorplan that includes large Living Room & Dining Room.

This unit is an easy walk to the L, metra, retail, and just a short commute to Downtown Evanston!
house_rules: Quiet hours are from 10 pm- 8 am.

access: Full access to the kitchen, dining room, back yard deck, gazebo, (laundry room -additional charges may apply)
description:
Cozy bedroom C     Queen size bed with a very confortable matress. Flat screen TV U-verse service. Located south in the south end of the house on the first level. 1 full bathroom that may be shared with other guess. My guess are allowed to use the full kitchen, livingroom, back yard, deck, gazebo & grill. Accommodation for 2 guest per room(couples) (friends)(relatives) if you dont mind sleeping in the same bed. I provide breakfast items for your covinience.

Single family home, 3 levels 6 bedroom 3 bathroom. Cozy  back yard with a deck and gazebo where you can relax. Granite counter tops in the kitchen. 6 seating dining table. Hardwood floors, central air and heat. Security system. Internet service. Laundry.

Full access to the kitchen, dining room, back yard deck, gazebo, (laundry room -additional charges may apply)

We like socializing with our guest, they can text or email me. We live in the house so we can interaction with our guess . I am also a chef so you might be able to enjoy a meal .(EMAIL HIDDEN) (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

I have very good neighbors, mostly blue collar. it's fairly quiet, sboping mall and restaurantes are with in walking distance, Applebees, Taco bell, Popeyes, Burger King, McDonalds and many more restaurant's , Riis Park is in walking distance if your in to jogging public transportation near by. Uber is always a call away.

Very easy commuting. I'm located off of Grand ave which is one of Chicago's Main artery and goes directly to Down Town. Bus routes are block North or East, Highways. Easy to order an Uber.

My pets roam freely around the house on the main floor, my stair ways are blocked off with gates for privacy and to keep my pets away from certain areas of the house.  I maintain my place very clean. If you have Allergies this might not be the place to stay. When using the back yard I only ask you keep the gates locked at all times. Booking is for two guess per room additional fees apply for unexpected guests ($50.00). No smoking inside the house.  There is a designated are in the back deck if you do smoke. No parties. Laundry room may be used for an additional fee of( $25.00). We will provider laundry detergent and softener. I provide body wash, wash towels, shampoo, conditioner, lotion. Bottled Water is provided. For no reason food is allowed in the bedrooms or Snacks are ok. Free Parking is in the street. Breakfast items are also available for you to prepare your own meals .
