description:
Cozy, peaceful and clean living area.  2 bedrooms  in the lower level with 1 full bathroom & 2 bedroom on the first floor with access to a full bathroom. My guess are allowed to use the full kitchen and back yard. Enjoy a movie in the private living room area. My rooms accommodate up to 2 guest per room(couples) (friends)(relatives)

Huge peaceful, clean single family home, 3 levels 4 bedroom 2 bathrooms, cozy  back yard with a deck and gazebos  where you can relax. Granite counter tops in the kitchen. 6 seating dining table. Hardwood floor.

Full access to the kitchen, dining room, back yard deck, gazebo, laundry room.

I can be contacted by text

I have very good neighbors, it's fairly quiet, Brickyard  mall is in walking distance, Applebees, Taco bell, Popeyes, Burger King, McDonalds and many more restaurant's , Riis Park is in walking distance if your in to jogging public transportation near by. Uber is always a call away.

Very easy commuting. Bus routes a block North or East , Highway. Easy to order an Uber.

My pets roam freely around the house on the main floor, my stair ways are blocked off with gates for privacy and to keep my pets away from certain areas of the house.  I maintain my place very clean. If you have Allergies this might not be the place to stay. When using the back yard I only ask you keep the gates locked at all times. Booking is for two guess per room additional fees apply for unexpected guests $25.00. No smoking inside the house. No parties. Laundry room may be used for an additional fee of $25.00. We will provider laundry detergent and softener. I provide body wash, wash towels, shampoo,conditioner, lotion. Bottled Water is provided. For no reason food is allowed in the lower level or rooms. Snacks are ok. Parking is in the street.

description:
Welcome to our home that is located in a very convenient location. Our apartment is right in front of highway, it is very easy to get to anywhere you want. There is CTA bus #24, #29 and #31 nearby our place. Also, the redline station (sox-35th) is just about four blocks away that can take you to downtown within half hour. McCormick place is six minutes driving distance.

You will have a door code and your own room key.
We allow luggage drop off before check-in and after check-out.
Please always be free to contact us if you have any concern.

description:
140 sq feet rooms. Safe area. Close to all transportation. Bus 49 is one block away. 8 minutes walk to Pink line to go to UIC and downtown. 3 blocks away from Pete's Fresh Market.
There is no regular cleaning service, so please clean after yourself and help throw out trash timely. 
No consumables are provided, except for cleaning supplies. For short-term guest, toilet paper and hand soap can be provided.
Same day booking: if it's a tight turnover, the room might not be cleaned until the 2nd day.

Chicago in general might not be the safest place to be, this location included :-) In general, Western Ave is considered a dividing line. East of Western Ave is ok, especially around UIC Medical District area, it's a nice area with medical professionals and students, but west to Western is to be avoided. 2 miles down south comes West Pilsen, where is this house located. East of Western is good, although not as fancy and expensive as UIC area, but west of Western is not as bad as UIC area either. It's more residential and less divided with majority of Mexican people.

Parking Options:
1) garage parking spot is $75 a month, 
2) parking guest pass is $8 for 15 passes, 
3) free parking is available on nearby streets:
    - 9 spots at the end of 23rd Pl, west of Oakley Blvd; 
    - free spots available on 24th street, Levitt street and others
   - please pay attention to street cleaning noted on the signs.
house_rules:
- No drugs
- No disturbing noise
- No harassment to other guests and be appropriate in appearance since it's a fixed gender dwelling unit.

additional_house_rules:
Please do not disturb the tenants on the 1st and 2nd floor for any reason. This includes noise in the unit.

There is absolutely no smoking of any kind in the unit. We take this very seriously so Please follow that. If there is evident smoking, report from Neighbor or smoking residue in the home we will reserve the right to take your entire security deposit. 
 
Please remove your shoes.

All food in the kitchen and living room area only. Do not leave any open food out anywhere.

Quiet Hours: Between 10pm and 7am

DO NOT ENGAGE IN ILLEGAL ACTIVITIES ANYWHERE ON THE PROPERTY (drugs and internet included)

Please let the host know if anything gets broken or damaged immediately

Do not rearrange our furniture

Turn-off the air conditioning/heat, close windows, and lock the door when you leave the property.

For fire prevention and safety, please do not leave any electrical appliances switched on when they are not in use, or when you are leaving for the day. This includes air conditioners, fans, hair straighteners and portable device chargers.

Please try your best to keep the home tidy and clean. We work very hard to make this a very clean and comfortable environment, please help us keep it that way.  

Return all keys (if applicable). There will be a charge for any unreturned keys.  

There will be an additional charge of 75 dollars for late check out.  Scheduling cleaning  becomes very difficult when the check out rule is not adhered to. If you would like to request late check out please contact us and we will try to accommodate per our discretion.

We aim to make your stay as comfortable as it can possibly be! Our mission is to help our guests have a wonderful stay in Chicago. We would truly appreciate it if you can follow these house rules and confirm that this has been reviewed WITHIN 48 HOURS OF YOUR BOOKING. This is to ensure that if there is any reason the House Rules cannot be followed, you, our guest, will have the option of cancelling the booking penalty free as we have a Strict Cancellation policy. Thank you in advance and truly appreciate your cooperation!

description:
The Harper House is located in the beautiful neighborhood of Hyde Park on the south side of Chicago. We pride ourselves of creating a clean, well decorated, comfortable place to stay while visiting Chicago. This home is in very close proximity to the University of Chicago, many restaurants, bars, and local attractions, and only a 15-20 min ride to downtown Chicago. If you are looking for a family-friendly, fun, walkable place to stay during your trip to Chicago, The Harper House has it all!

Our space is cozy, modern, and brand new (gut renovated in 2019). Our location can't be beat, as you can walk to everything Hyde Park has to offer. The rest of Chicago is only a quick METRA (train) or ride share away!

Guests have access to the entire apartment.

I will be available during normal business hours during the day, and available for emergencies only after 5pm each day.

Hyde Park is an eclectic, historic neighborhood with a strong community feel. The University of Chicago campus is a short walk from the apartment. The neighborhood is very walkable! 

From Time Out magazine: "Back in 1893, Hyde Park played host to the World's Columbian Exposition. Today, it's home to one of the most prestigious colleges in the country, one of the best museums and a happening restaurant scene. The neighborhood's gorgeous architecture makes its rich history quite salient. Hyde Park is accessible by way of bus, Green Line, Metra or a quick cruise down Lake Shore Drive. Head to the beautiful South Side 'hood and enjoy all of the culture and entertainment that it has to offer."

Whole Foods and Trader Joe's are both very close walks from the apartment! Most of the restaurants in Hyde Park are casual and approachable. If you would like to venture outside of Hyde Park for nightlife and diverse dining options, the areas of Pilsen, West Loop, Downtown (the Loop), and River North are short rideshare-rides away.

Public Transportation (both bus and train) are located right around the corner on Lake Park Avenue. Ride share services are abundant in all of Chicago.

description:
Thanks for checking out  our place! 
A bright and comfortable apartment located on the north side of Chicago.
Convenient access to public transportation that can take you to downtown and popular attractions.

Please read entire listing and house rules for details; for any other questions don't hesitate to ask!:)

Located on a tree lined street; you will have full access to a bright, comfortable apartment for your getaway. A 2nd floor unit with original hardwood floors floors, sun lit living room with a comfortable couch for lounging, watching tv or a movie. There is a DVD player that can connect to Netflix, coffee table, writing desk and some books and games that we encourage you to use during your stay (but we ask that you leave it for future guests to enjoy too). 

A cozy eating area fit for 4 with 2 extra stools to enjoy a few meals.
The kitchen has a microwave, fridge, pots, pans, plates, silverware and other essentials for light cooking. 

The spacious 1st BR has a queen bed, big closet with hangers,side tables, work desk, lamps, white noise machine and an alarm clock.

While a slightly smaller 2nd BR has a full size bed, side tables, lamp, work desk, white noise machine, alarm clock and ceiling fan for warmer days/nights. 

The bathroom has everything you may need: towels, toiletries, SHOWER ONLY--jacuzzi tub does not work!(sorry)

Both living room and 1st bedroom has an AC unit.

We can be as involved as your want during your stay, or if you prefer to do your own thing, that's cool too!

We live close by and will be available for you; so please feel free to contact us. It's best to contact us via air BnB message or txt so and we will get back to you quickly.

Rogers park is on the far north side of Chicago. Walk to the lake,Loyola university, parks, bars, cafes, restaurants, grocery store,bank, and anything else you might need.
Nearby neighborhoods such as Edgewater, Andersonville, Evanston, Ravenswood, Wrigleyville also offer great places to eat, hang out, shop and relax.

A short 0.3 miles walk west is the Metra station & 0.4 miles east is the Morse L stop. 1/2 block (east & west) are bus stops-all take you to downtown and around the area. Chicago also has a bike share program called DIVVY and its only 3 1/2 blocks away, enjoy the bike path right on the lake up to northwestern and Evanston, or head on south alongside lakeshore drive as far as can go! Uber and Lyft are also a great and convenient way way to get around.

If you have a vehicle; street parking is always free on our street.

Before booking please keep in mind that this property is an apartment in the city with some common city apartment-living sounds; not a single family away from neighbors. With that said, if you are (very) sensitive to sound/noise; may we suggest booking a place in the suburbs instead:)

Please be sure you are willing and able to adhere to our house rules. 
We have prepared a guidebook to our favorite spots in and around the neighborhood as well as some information on how to get around and need to know places. 

Our aim is to be better hosts and look forward to feedbacks and suggestions you might have in ways we can improve.

We hope to be your host in Chicago and look forward to meeting you soon!!

Nearby neighborhoods such as Edgewater, Andersonville, Evanston, Ravenswood, Wrigleyville also offer great places to eat, hang out, shop and relax.
notes:
Before booking please keep in mind that this property is an apartment in the city with some common city apartment-living sounds; not a single family away from neighbors. With that said, if you are (very) sensitive to sound/noise; may we suggest booking a place in the suburbs instead:)

Please be sure you are willing and able to adhere to our house rules. 
We have prepared a guidebook to our favorite spots in and around the neighborhood as well as some information on how to get around and need to know places. 

Our aim is to be better hosts and look forward to feedbacks and suggestions you might have in ways we can improve.

We hope to be your host in Chicago and look forward to meeting you soon!!
space:
Located on a tree lined street; you will have full access to a bright, comfortable apartment for your getaway. A 2nd floor unit with original hardwood floors floors, sun lit living room with a comfortable couch for lounging, watching tv or a movie. There is a DVD player that can connect to Netflix, coffee table, writing desk and some books and games that we encourage you to use during your stay (but we ask that you leave it for future guests to enjoy too). 

A cozy eating area fit for 4 with 2 extra stools to enjoy a few meals.
The kitchen has a microwave, fridge, pots, pans, plates, silverware and other essentials for light cooking. 

The spacious 1st BR has a queen bed, big closet with hangers,side tables, work desk, lamps, white noise machine and an alarm clock.

While a slightly smaller 2nd BR has a full size bed, side tables, lamp, work desk, white noise machine, alarm clock and ceiling fan for warmer days/nights. 

The bathroom has everything you may need: towels, toiletries, SHOWER ONLY--jacuzzi tub does not work!(sorry)

Both living room and 1st bedroom has an AC unit.
summary:
Thanks for checking out  our place! 
A bright and comfortable apartment located on the north side of Chicago.
Convenient access to public transportation that can take you to downtown and popular attractions.

Please read entire listing and house rules for details; for any other questions don't hesitate to ask!:)
transit:
A short 0.3 miles walk west is the Metra station & 0.4 miles east is the Morse L stop. 1/2 block (east & west) are bus stops-all take you to downtown and around the area. Chicago also has a bike share program called DIVVY and its only 3 1/2 blocks away, enjoy the bike path right on the lake up to northwestern and Evanston, or head on south alongside lakeshore drive as far as can go! Uber and Lyft are also a great and convenient way way to get around.

If you have a vehicle; street parking is always free on our street.

description:
Show up and start living from day one in Chicago with this comfortable one-bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped The Loop home with stunning  views over the city. (#CHI170)

Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this one-bedroom apartment. Ideally located in Chicago, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living.  This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:
  
- Doorman
- Pet Friendly
- Roof Deck
- Media Room

- Elevator

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions.

Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

This furnished rental is situated in the most dynamic and convenient place to live in Chicago, The Loop. With its endless shopping, fine dining, stunning park, river and lake views, and entertainment opportunities, everything is possible at a moment’s notice. The area is a cultural getaway for professionals and students, who can combine work with pleasure. Discover landmark buildings like the Willis Tower and The Art Institute of Chicago. Millenium Park, near Lake Michigan, is always worth a visit. The Loop is within reach of accessible transportation, offering non-stop public transit, buses, and taxis. Union Station is approximately a 10 minute train ride.

This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more.

description:
You may never want to leave Chicago after staying here! This 3 bedroom/2 Bath apartment near South Loop. This space comes with modern amenities such as a roof top pool and fitness center. Here you’ll find all the comforts of home: full kitchen, custom artwork, and furnishings curated to reflect the beauty of the Windy City.

Bedroom 1:
Queen Bed

Bedroom 2:
Queen Bed

Bedroom 3:
2 Full Beds

There is also a sofa bed and air mattress for your additional comfort.

Staying at this Domio gives you access to the building amenities which include:
Fitness Center featuring HOIST equipment
Movie Theatre
Pool w/ Cabanas and Grills
Half Basketball Court
Sauna
Yoga Studio

The Domio is located about a 15 minute walk from the Museum Campus which has some of Chicago's most famous attractions such as The Field Museum and the Shedd Aquarium. Soldier Field is about 1 mile away. The Roosevelt L Station (Green, Orange, and Red Lines) is an 8 minute walk.

Chicago Registration Number: Pending

Safety is our top priority!  To maintain a safe community for our guests, neighbors, and team members, we do conduct a background screening check for all reservations prior to your stay.  This screening includes checking the National Criminal & OFAC Database for felonies and the National Sex Offender Registry.  If you have any questions about this process, please contact us.

additional_house_rules: All bookings require a security deposit of $500 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance.  Kindly note that the special reduction in Cleaning Fees is only for the Winter Season hence the regular Cleaning fees of USD 125 will be applicable for all arrivals on or after 01 March, 2019 on wards.  For security purposes, we require all guests to provide an ID verification, license, or passport before check-in.   Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds.   Check-in time is any time after 4 P.M. Check-out time is any time before 11 a.m. If an earlier check-in or a later check-out time is desired, then you can send us a request. However, this is not guaranteed. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine.   Our locations do not allow pets.   No parties, gatherings or events of any kind are allowed in the unit.   If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $50 for every extra hour of cleaning required.   Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events.   Lost or unreturned keys will result in an additional $100 fee (per set).  If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full.   We may ask to hold in advance a damage/security deposit for last minute reservations or local stays.  If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately.   If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance.   When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.  Shoes off, please.

description:
Watch a movie in style on the 55-inch 4K TV and sound bar within this sophisticated apartment. The modern, spacious layout with metropolitan decor includes every comfort, from the Nespresso coffee maker to the complimentary designer bath products.

Neighbourhood overview
This apartment is located within walking distance of McCormick Place Convention Center. It's also only a short drive to all tourist attractions, including the Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium, and Chicago Bean.

The color scheme was designed to make the most of the plentiful natural light.

Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.

This apartment is located within walking distance of McCormick Place Convention Center. It's also only a short drive to all tourist attractions, including the Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium, and Chicago Bean.

Paid parking @ USD 40$ per night,please contact us for more information.
house_rules: All bookings require a security deposit of $500 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance.  Kindly note that the special reduction in Cleaning Fees is only for the Winter Season hence the regular Cleaning fees of USD 125 will be applicable for all arrivals on or after 01 March, 2019 on wards.  For security purposes, we require all guests to provide an ID verification, license, or passport before check-in.   Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds.   Check-in time is any time after 4 P.M. Check-out time is any time before 11 a.m. If an earlier check-in or a later check-out time is desired, then you can send us a request. However, this is not guaranteed. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine.   Our locations do not allow pets.   No parties, gatherings or events of any kind are allowed in the unit.   If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $50 for every extra hour of cleaning required.   Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events.   Lost or unreturned keys will result in an additional $100 fee (per set).  If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full.   We may ask to hold in advance a damage/security deposit for last minute reservations or local stays.  If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately.   If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance.   When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.  Shoes off, please.

access: Guests can fully access the apartment with no interruptions. The doors are installed with keyless entry. We will show you how to work it. They can also access community garden, bocci ball court, patio and grill station.
description:
This Apt can be rented separately or together with Comfy River West Apt. https://abnb.me/aoJ0F64vDY 
Same building, one on the the second floor and one directly above on the 3rd floor. Together they will sleep 8 guest.
This beautiful 2BR, 1 BA has all new furniture, all new appliances, counter tops, vanity, mirrors. 
Free parking in a gated lot, communal patio/gardens and grill. Fully stocked kitchen, private washer & dryer. Both Apt are owned by the same family, owner resides in the building.

This unit is located on the 2nd floor- no elevator. This building is located in River West on the edge of River North. Complimentary parking spot is available in a private, gated lot right behind the building. This unit features all new furniture, all new appliances and kitchen counter tops, new bathroom vanity, counter tops, mirror and lighting. All new bedroom furniture with new pillow top mattresses, large closets, Thermopane windows, Smart TV and Netflix.

Guests can fully access the apartment with no interruptions. The doors are installed with keyless entry. We will show you how to work it. They can also access community garden, bocci ball court, patio and grill station.

We will greet you at check-in and give you the keypad code and show you your accommodations. After that we will be available to answer any questions you may have about our apartment or Chicago. The code will expire at the end of your stay.

This unit is 1 block away from many great Restaurants like La Scarola,  Emitt’s Pub, Piccolo Sogno, Iguana Café, and The Dawsons.  Also bars like Richards and The Clover. Many, many more Restaurants/bars within walking distance. 10 minuet walk to Fulton Market District and Randolph Street. 10 minuet walk to Merchandise Mart. Short 3-5 minutes walk to several coffee shops (such as Starbucks, and Peets). 3 min walk to grocery store. 
Perfect for tourists, family and business travelers.

We offer free parking in our gated lot behind our building.
The Blue Line Train-Grand Ave stop, is a 3 min walk from our building.
Bus stop is directly across the street.

The doors are installed with keyless entry. We will show you how to work it.

description:
Lakefront, Park, Skyline Triple Threat! Million Dollar Views/Affordable convenience! Bus at your door. Historic neighborhood! 10 minute lake shore drive to downtown. You'll feel like you're on a cruise ship with these high rise views. 5 minutes to University of Chicago. Perfect for business, medical, and couples. Spacious entire apartment with free penthouse workout area access. Long term guests welcome. Quiet building with night time security.

Quiet high rise building with free fitness room, business center, street parking, and in house laundry. Perfect for business/convention stays, University of Chicago, tourists, singles, and couples.

I'm available by phone, text, or email during your stay.

Location, Location, Location! Enjoy the culturally diverse Hyde Park/Jackson Park areas of Chicago within a 5-10 minute drive of downtown without the congestion.  Surrounded by peaceful gardens, parks, harbors, 2 golf courses, and of course the gem of Lake Michigan all at your doorstep.  Within walking distance of two of the cities' most prominent cultural institutions- The Museum of Science and Industry and the University of Chicago.  Short 7 minute drive to McCormick Place Convention Center, Wintrust Arena, and the Museum Campus.

CTA Public Transportation bus stop at your door.  4 blocks to commuter train.  Lakefront jogging and cycling trail steps away.

access: Private bedroom and shared bathroom. We provide all bedding, fluffy white towels, and Dr. Bronner's peppermint soap in the shower.
description:
Bridgeport Bridgeport Bridgeport. Please don't tell anyone about Bridgeport. We don't want to be "discovered." Bridgeport means quiet and zero ostentation. If you get up early you will see your neighbors doing Tai Chi in the park or tending to gardens in the back yard. A short Uber ride from the Loop. Five minutes to Thalia Hall. Two minutes from the heart of Chinatown and its world-class mix of restaurants. Great ramen is a ten-minute walk south and west, to Shinya on Halstead.
Bring Fido!

This is a third-floor walk-up in a seasoned building. High ceilings. Shared kitchen and bath. No extra charge for the quiet or the panoramic views of Typical Chicago Neighborhood. Ample free parking on the street, usually right outside the door. 
There are two locks on your door — one deadbolt with a key to take when you go out, the other a hotel-type lock that can only be opened or closed from inside the room.
There is a refrigerator in your room that will be stocked with bottled water, two bottles for each day of your stay. Stay hydrated.

Private bedroom and shared bathroom. We provide all bedding, fluffy white towels, and Dr. Bronner's peppermint soap in the shower.

Available by text or phone, or directly, if I am home.

Quiet quiet quiet.
About three miles south of The Loop, which translates to a 15-minute Uber ride costing substantially less than ten bucks.

Walking distance from the Orange Line if you’re flying into Midway. Walk to restaurants and bars (Berniece’s is on Halsted). A quick Uber ride to the Loop and Art Institute. Plenty of free parking on the street.

This building is too old to be ADA compliant. Sorry. If you can’t walk up two flights of stairs this ain’t da place for you.

additional_house_rules:
Please take shoes off at the front door due to the time it takes to have to mop and it’s impossible with back to back guests.

When facing the front of the house; the left sink is not to be used and will not drain properly. Only the right side nearest on the right of the faucet.

Please only empty garbage where there is a garbage bag and if you need additional garbage bags they are under the kitchen faucets.

Please keep the house in the same condition (if not better as when you arrive) highly appreciated.

All dishes should be at minimum rinsed but please hand wash them if possible.

Please throw all of the used towels that are dry into the basket by the second floor bathroom. If they are wet please place them on the second floor bathtub prior to checking out.

Please be careful if using the second floor balcony. We are not personally or business wise liable for a slip and fall.

Please do not hang out in the front of the property. (Backyard is acceptable)

The fourth bedroom is in basement in basement but is not furnished due to water seepage but it’s controlled. The fourth bed if needed will be doubled up in one of the top level bedrooms.

Please do not leave food out too long (primarily not overnight). 

Be careful not to use too much toilet papers when flushing. (Rather flush more than to get toilet stopped up)

Do not flush paper towels or cleaning wipes.

Please keep the house in the same condition as before you arrived. Floors and walls and everything should remain tidy.  cleaning fees are for only general maintenance of normal usage and fresh and clean linen

Have a good time and I hope you enjoy the house.

additional_house_rules:
Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund. 
1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to the designated location by the agreed upon check-out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out penalty. 
3.) Absolutely no smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property unless previously approved and pet fee paid.
6.)  Please remove your shoes while in the unit.

access: You will have complete and private access to my condo. 24HR self check in is available via electronic door locks.
description:
*SPECIAL* Dec-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Our place in Noble Square is in the best neighborhood of the city, plenty of bars & restaurants close by!  The Blue Line "L" subway is a 5 minute walk and has you Downtown in 10 minutes.  While close to it all, our street is quiet & residential with garage parking available, modern decor, & tons of amenities to make it feel like home! Keyless entry makes checking in, at any hour, super easy and convenient for my guests!

This newly remodeled 2 bedroom unit in a traditional 3 flat Chicago building has a comfortable living room with large desk space, modern kitchen, 2 bedrooms with 1 Queen sized bed and 1 Double, washer and dryer in unit, and a bathroom that has a stand up shower. We also have a twin air mattresses for use, a Graco Pack n Play, and high chair if you have little ones.

-AMAZING LOCATION!!! You can literally get everywhere you want to go in Chicago so easily from my place!  
- We are only 3 blocks from the 24HR Division Blue Line on the "L" and it's only 3 stops to downtown and a 40 minute ride direct to O'hare.  
- Sports fans can take the Ashland bus to quickly get up to Wrigley or the United Center.  It drops you only 2 blocks from the field and 2 blocks from the United Center for concerts, Bulls and Blackhawks games.  The Division bus takes you to the heart of Old Town and the Gold Coast and the Grand bus takes you to the heart of River North and Navy Pier.
- Uber and Lyft will take you just about anywhere in the city for ~ $10.
-High speed wireless internet is always available.
-40" TV with Roku device, FREE Netflix and CableTV
-Fresh towels and linens.
-Hair dryer, flat iron, body wash, lotion, face wash, shampoo and conditioner + all paper products like paper towels, toilet paper, tissue. I even have the bathroom stocked with emergency items like contact solution, tooth paste, Tylenol, Tums, tampons, nail polish remover etc!
-Ironing board and Iron
-Luggage racks and hangers
-I provide artisinal coffee from a local roaster and a variety of gourmet teas. 
-The full sized kitchen is fully stocked with cooking utensils and basic cooking supplies.
-FREE to use Graco Pack N Play, baby plates/cups/utensils and baby shampoo for the little ones
-1 garage parking spot will be available for rent on a first come first serve basis so I cannot guarantee its availability.  If the spot is taken, there is free street parking right on my street!

You will have complete and private access to my condo. 24HR self check in is available via electronic door locks.

For a feel of the youthful, creative energy on Chicago's northwest side, make your way to the eclectic cross-sections of West Town, Ukrainian Village and East Village. You'll pass colorful galleries and museums, independent theater companies, small-scale music venues and retail boutiques touting lines from local designers. Mixed in are historic churches, brick cottages, quaint coffee shops and a booming restaurant and bar scene.

Day and night, these communities offer a multitude of things to do, all with a low-key vibe and within an easy stroll. Whether you are looking for a brunch spot, antique furniture or vintage accessories — or you want to seek out traces of the area's humble immigrant history — wander block by block along the main arteries Division, Chicago and Grand Avenue.

-AMAZING LOCATION!!! You can literally get everywhere you want to go in Chicago so easily from my place!  
- We are only 3 blocks from the 24HR Division Blue Line on the "L" and it's only 3 stops to downtown and a 40 minute ride direct to O'hare.  
- Sports fans can take the Ashland bus to quickly get up to Wrigley or the United Center.  It drops you only 2 blocks from the field and 2 blocks from the United Center for concerts, Bulls and Blackhawks games.  The Division bus takes you to the heart of Old Town and the Gold Coast and the Grand bus takes you to the heart of River North and Navy Pier.
- Uber and Lyft will take you just about anywhere in the city for ~ $10.

- Sports fans can take the Ashland bus to quickly get up to Wrigley or the United Center.  It drops you only 2 blocks from the field and 2 blocks from the United Center for concerts, Bulls and Blackhawks games.  The Division bus takes you to the heart of Old Town and the Gold Coast and the Grand bus takes you to the heart of River North and Navy Pier.
- Uber and Lyft will take you just about anywhere in the city for ~ $10.
-High speed wireless internet is always available.
-40" TV with Roku device, FREE Netflix and CableTV
-Fresh towels and linens.
-Hair dryer, flat iron, body wash, lotion, face wash, shampoo and conditioner + all paper products like paper towels, toilet paper, tissue. I even have the bathroom stocked with emergency items like contact solution, tooth paste, Tylenol, Tums, tampons, nail polish remover etc!
-Ironing board and Iron
-Luggage racks and hangers
-I provide artisinal coffee from a local roaster and a variety of gourmet teas. 
-The full sized kitchen is fully stocked with cooking utensils and basic cooking supplies.
-FREE to use Graco Pack N Play, baby plates/cups/utensils and baby shampoo for the little ones
-1 garage parking spot will be available for rent on a first come first serve basis so I cannot guarantee its availability.  If the spot is taken, there is free street parking right on my street!
summary:
*SPECIAL* Dec-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Our place in Noble Square is in the best neighborhood of the city, plenty of bars & restaurants close by!  The Blue Line "L" subway is a 5 minute walk and has you Downtown in 10 minutes.  While close to it all, our street is quiet & residential with garage parking available, modern decor, & tons of amenities to make it feel like home! Keyless entry makes checking in, at any hour, super easy and convenient for my guests!

access:
The whole apartment is yours while here, in our apartment. You can use also the fitness center in the building and the pool.
At the building you will find laundry.
description:
Have a royal stay in this studio, steps from the popular River North neighborhood. Downtown parks, museums, and shops are less than two miles away. There is a Divvy Bikes station a 8 minutes walk and the most visited attractions of the city, ready to be visited on a ride - they are very close to the apartment: Magnificent Mile, Millennium Park, Navy Pier & Cloud Gate (15 minutes walk distance from the building). Let Chicago enchant you!

In this wonderful and complete studio, you will be a within walking distance to all that the city of Chicago has to offer. Located in the River North neighborhood, the building is close to the best of everything, including beaches!

The place is a studio apartment. There's a living room/sleeping space with a complete bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen that you are totally welcome to.

The apartment is complete with:
Microwave oven, refrigerator, stove, oven, toaster, coffee machine, electric kettle
Dishes, glasses, cutlery, pots, pans, pepper, salt, water & soda.
Hair dryer, shampoo, conditioner, body wash.
Queen size bed, sofa bed, closet, bed linens, pillows, blankets, extra large towels
Air conditioning & heating
Huge TV 
Netflix
Wi-Fi high-speed internet

Our apartment has everything you need to make your stay in Chicago as comfortable as possible.

We are not smokers, so the home does not smell of smoke. So, please, do not smoke here!

The whole apartment is yours while here, in our apartment. You can use also the fitness center in the building and the pool.
At the building you will find laundry.

We are available 24x7! Contact us in any case of urgency or doubts.

We use professional cleaners who will come through just before your arrival, so the place is kept to a high standard of cleanliness.
interaction: We are available 24x7! Contact us in any case of urgency or doubts.

description:
Clean, private room in the heart of Chicago with FREE PARKING & an EARLY check-in (12 p.m!). You will have your own door code and may arrive as late as you wish, EASY self check-in guaranteed.

I allow LUGGAGE DROP OFF! You can store your luggage in the closet before check-in and after check-out times, you can drop it off and pick it up as early and as late as you would like.

The neighborhood is QUIET & SAFE, even at night!

Restaurants and bars are right round the corner, both upscale and casual. This room is 6 minutes away by car or uber to Chicago's famous Willis (Sears) tower. Uber costs about $7. If you are arriving by car, I am providing free resident parking passes for anywhere in the area. (Yes, that means you can drive a few blocks and still park anywhere you want!)

The room will be ONLY yours for the time you'll stay in my Windy City. You will have a key to lock the door. 

> EARLY CHECK-IN! 12 PM!

> Free parking provided: park BEFORE your check-in and stay parked AFTER your check-out if you would like

> The back deck has a beautiful view of the Willis Tower

> Apartment is NEWLY renovated

> GREEN TEA & ALOE memory foam mattress

> 5 MINS to DOWNTOWN!

> Restaurants and bars are 5 MIN away walking distance 

> 5 MIN walk to PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION/METRO 

> 5 MIN walk to UIC (University of Illinois at Chicago)

> 15 MIN walk to Rush University 

> No security deposit

> Cancel up to 24 hours in advance to get a full refund

> Last minute reservations are welcome!

You will be given a door code to access the apartment and a key to lock your private room. You may arrive as late as you would like with my code entry. You may store your luggage in the closet BEFORE and AFTER check in so you don't have to haul your bags around the city. You will be able to view your check-in instructions under "House Manual" as soon as you confirm the booking. The door code will be sent to you 1 night prior to your arrival, or immediately if you have a last-minute reservation. I will also be providing a folder full of recommendations, places to eat and nightlife from the local, it will be on your bed upon arrival :)

100% of guests love my location- it is the best of both worlds: 5 minutes from the very center of downtown, yet quiet enough to not hear the noise at night. If you are still not convinced, please read my reviews.

"Racine" blue line is the closest blue line train (metro) station, only 5 minutes away (walking). 
-Downtown/Loop: TO - take blue line towards O'Hare and get off at "LaSalle, Jackson, or Monroe," depending on where you are going :) FROM - take blue line towards Forest Park and get off at "Racine" About 5 minutes to downtown.
-O'Hare Airport: TO - take blue line towards O'Hare. O'Hare is the final stop. FROM - take blue line towards Forest Park and get off at "Racine" About 40 minutes to O’Hare.
-Midway Airport: TO - take blue line towards O'Hare and transfer to orange line at "Clark/Lake," then take orange line to towards Midway airport. Midway is the final stop! FROM - take orange line towards Adams/Wabash; then, transfer to blue line at "Clark/Lake." Take blue line towards Forest Park and get off at "Racine" About 45 minutes to Midway.
-Union Station/Amtrak: Only 20 minutes away (walking), taxi or uber will take you to the apartment in less than 5 minutes for about $6 :)

additional_house_rules:
1. Prohibited: Video Shooting, bring people that is not in the reservation, Small gatherings, family reunions, birthdays parties or any kind of celebrations. 
2. No smoke inside the house or building (any kind) 
3. Respect other Airbnb guests, belongings, food and other rooms.
4. Be quiet in the house and in the building specially after 9pm. 
5. Checkout from your room is by 10am and our checkout is firm becase our team schedule. Checkout from your room after this time will end in extra 30$. Checkout after 11am will end in extra 60$. Checkout after 12pm will end in an open  file in airbnb plus 60$ fee (2 hours paid for management team) and your belongings would have to be removed since another guest will be checking in.
6. If you use the kitchen, microwave, oven, plates, pans, pots, glasses, cups, kitchen table, living room table, coffee maker, fridge, etc.. you have to leave it clean. Nobody should cook after 10pm or before 7am in order to avoid disturbing the resting time of other guests.
7. After use the shower / bathtub clean the hairs you left. Take your own amenities with you. Don’t leave it in the bathroom.
8. Booking for somebody else is not allowed unless agreed before booking.
9. If you damage or lost any key the fee is 45$. 
10. We will send you missing items if you want but it will be 40$ plus shipping.

Ps: keys and missing items fees are: 20$ hourly rate management property plus 20$ Uber (go and return) plus the key or the shipping) 

BREAKING ANY RULE OR DOING ANY ILLEGAL ACTIVITY WILL END UP IN A IMMEDIATE CANCELLATION OF YOUR RESERVATION AND YOU WILL HAVE TO LEAVE THE PLACE IMMEDIATELY. Our top one priority is our guests’ security and provide a quiet stay!

access: You can use the kitchen (please turn on the kitchen fan once you use it), oven, pan, pots, plates, coffee maker, etc! You can use living room, hair dryer, iron. You will have WiFi, clean towels (1 p/p) , sheets, comforter, Shampoo (2in1), hand’s soap, body’s soap, toilet paper.
description:
Welcome to 1 of “The 12 Coolest Neighborhood Around the World”(Forbs) This hipster,artistic,and multicultural neighborhood with a great night life is just 10-12min driving to Downtown Chicago (2.9mi), 8min driving to Chinatown(1.6mi), 29min driving to O’hare (18mi)and 18min driving to Midway Airport (8,9mi).Buses works fine and Uber to Downtown is around 5-10$.Wifi,coffee maker,microwave,iron, hair dryer,pretty much everything you might need. We have cameras ON in common areas and locks in rooms

You will have a comfortable Full Size Bed in a private room! We want you feel very safe so your room is going to have its own lock and key and there are cameras in common areas. 

This is a private room in a shared place with other Airbnb guests and because of that we expect to keep the house  very quiet, specially after 9pm.

There is few free parking on the street, plenty paid parking around the house. 

*I only accept payments through Airbnb platform*

You can use the kitchen (please turn on the kitchen fan once you use it), oven, pan, pots, plates, coffee maker, etc! You can use living room, hair dryer, iron. You will have WiFi, clean towels (1 p/p) , sheets, comforter, Shampoo (2in1), hand’s soap, body’s soap, toilet paper.

If you text Alejandra she will be there for you most of the time she is going to give you quick responses! If you are a tourist she will love to share some places you can’t miss!

This place is very close to Downtown Chicago, and it’s a great picturesque neighborhood with a lot of murals (for what is known), great restaurants, good night life. We have one block away my favorite Margarita’s place in Chicago! 

There are few free street parking around the neighborhood. 18 bus is just 1/2 block away. 18th Pink line is 15min walk. 60 bus is 8min walk. McCormick Place is 9min far by car/25min by public transportation. United Center is 10min far by car/30min by public transportation. Rush is 9min by car/21min by public transportation. Grant Park is 9min by car/28min by public transportation. The Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium and the Planetarium is 11 min far by car/27 min by public transportation. Uber are very cheap 5-10$ to those places specially if you choose the pool option!

This is a safe and night life neighborhood so you can walk around it but without forget it that you are in Chicago so don’t leave belongings at sight in your car. Parking is such a tough situation in Chicago although there are few streets where you can Free park around the house (Racine street, May street  but one street behind the airbnb building not in front of airbnb building, Cullerton street, 19th street, Carpenter Street, 18th south side ). Parking is usually easy before 5pm, after 5pm is hard to find a free spot but not imposible. Just make sure 1) you read all signs posted in the street/ trees or fences that says information about street cleaning , reparation, disabilities parking, permit parking, school days, etc 2) you are not over the crosswalk, near a hydrant, or wrong way.

The room is private but you will share common areas ( kitchen , living room, and the bathroom/s) with other Airbnb guests. Usually none of this get crowd because most of Airbnb guests are most of the time outside the house knowing the city, in concerts, interviews, etc, and they don’t spend much time in the house. A private apartment in the area usually cost over 120$ p/night plus taxes and fees which is in total almost 200$ p/night ! If you want save some money and being close to downtown, surrounding great public transportation and with free street parking this could be a great option for you! 

The room has one full size bed. If you want to add 3rd or 4th guest in the reservation I could add 1 extra air mattress with no extra fee if the reservation is set for 3 or 4. If the reservation is for 2 and you’d like to have an extra air mattress we charge $15p/night and we provide air mattress and linens for it. the room will become smaller for luggage becase you will have two beds on it. This is a good option if you want to save even more money otherwise you can book two rooms! 
As most houses in United States this is not made with concrete so you will hear people walking or outside sounds. It doesn’t bother most of the guest but if you are a very light sleeper maybe you should choose an entire place. or have an earphone or something to block the sound.

We have cameras ON in common areas, one is located outside the apartment in the entrance the other one is in the living room.

Is forbidden in this place: parties, small gatherings, to bring people who are not in the reservation, family reunions, birthdays celebration, video shooting,  being noisy, smoke and bring pets. 

We work based in all airbnb policies, terms and conditions including cancelation policy, so makes sure before you book to read carefully houses rules or cancelation policy.
house_rules:
1. Prohibited: Video Shooting, bring people that is not in the reservation, Small gatherings, family reunions, birthdays parties or any kind of celebrations. 
2. No smoke inside the house or building (any kind) 
3. Respect other Airbnb guests, belongings, food and other rooms.
4. Be quiet in the house and in the building specially after 9pm. 
5. Checkout from your room is by 10am and our checkout is firm becase our team schedule. Checkout from your room after this time will end in extra 30$. Checkout after 11am will end in extra 60$. Checkout after 12pm will end in an open  file in airbnb plus 60$ fee (2 hours paid for management team) and your belongings would have to be removed since another guest will be checking in.
6. If you use the kitchen, microwave, oven, plates, pans, pots, glasses, cups, kitchen table, living room table, coffee maker, fridge, etc.. you have to leave it clean. Nobody should cook after 10pm or before 7am in order to avoid disturbing the resting time of other guests.
7. After use the shower / bathtub clean the hairs you left. Take your own amenities with you. Don’t leave it in the bathroom.
8. Booking for somebody else is not allowed unless agreed before booking.
9. If you damage or lost any key the fee is 45$. 
10. We will send you missing items if you want but it will be 40$ plus shipping.

Ps: keys and missing items fees are: 20$ hourly rate management property plus 20$ Uber (go and return) plus the key or the shipping) 

BREAKING ANY RULE OR DOING ANY ILLEGAL ACTIVITY WILL END UP IN A IMMEDIATE CANCELLATION OF YOUR RESERVATION AND YOU WILL HAVE TO LEAVE THE PLACE IMMEDIATELY. Our top one priority is our guests’ security and provide a quiet stay!
interaction: If you text Alejandra she will be there for you most of the time she is going to give you quick responses! If you are a tourist she will love to share some places you can’t miss!

access: Kitchen is available to enjoy complimentary juice and bagels. Refrigerator can be used for your takeout. Light food preparation is okay.
description:
Beautiful 7 bed home with in-ground pool and hot tub overlooking pond. This bedroom is one of two located in a fully finished basement with media room and bar. Bathroom may be private or shared if other bedroom is booked. Queen size bed. Price listed is for one bedroom only. See my other listings to rent additional rooms. Pool may be available upon request. Hot tub may be available for additional fee. Over 21's only.  No parties allowed.  Guests cannot bring friends into the house.

Close to I80, Convention Center, Amphitheater & shopping. Walk to train station. Great restaurants & bars nearby.  In keeping with the true meaning of Bed & Breakfast, guests are welcome to relax in the home, however, we are not in favor of having them linger around the house the entire time.

Kitchen is available to enjoy complimentary juice and bagels. Refrigerator can be used for your takeout. Light food preparation is okay.

I am available to help should guests need anything or if they would like recommendations for local amenities. If I am not home, I will leave a contact number.

Tinley Park is a great area with lots of restaurants, bars and microbreweries nearby. Walking paths, aquatic center, playgrounds, parks, and public library all within walking distance. Close to Tinley Park Convention Center and Hollywood Casino Amphitheater. Plenty of shopping nearby.

Close to I-80. Walking distance to train station - Metra line to downtown Chicago.

description:
We look forward to welcoming you into our home.
You will have access to a private room with double bed and private bathroom situated on your own floor.
Freshly painted room with new sheets and towels.
No other guests will be here.
Free street parking outside.
Three blocks away from Andersonville shops and restaurants

Once you have arrived I will give you a set of keys, this will give you access to the back door.

Breakfast will not be provided, however there many yummy places to eat in Andersonville, only a couple of blocks away.

 If you would like to leave something in the fridge do please ask, I am more than happy to make some space for you.

I am a stay at home Mum, so I am normally in and out with the kids.  I will be around to welcome you and happy to answer any questions.  We will respect your privacy, however I will be around if you have any questions.

Check in time is between 3pm and 9pm.  I do need to know your approximate arrival time, so I can be sure to be at home to welcome you, and also take little one's bedtime into consideration.  If you do wish to drop your bags off earlier please contact me as I'm sure we can make this work.

Andersonville is the best neighborhood in Chicago hands down! I first visited Andersonville for brunch a couple of years after moving to Chicago and I vowed to move here, and here I am! 

Andersonville is one of the smaller neighborhoods, but what it lacks in size, it makes up for in charm, local businesses and delicious restaurants.  Brunch, antiques, bars, fine dining, sandwiches, art, yoga, Pilates, coffee shops, ...Andersonville has it all!

We live 3 blocks from the center of Andersonville. The red CTA train that takes you into the city is a 12-15 minute walk away, but there are buses nearby too.  
There is free parking on our road if you are coming by car.
house_rules: - We request that shoes are left at the door

description:
Lightning Fast Wifi, 14ft Windows, 22ft Ceilings, 73' tv, Top floor unit with an open floor plan and two lofted areas that overlooks the western sunsets. 2,200 Square Feet warehouse loft, 2 bedroom (+1 semi-private bedroom with 2 full size beds), 2 full bathrooms. 73' HD Surround Sound Movie Quality TV, 2 of the most unbelievably comfortable couches you've ever sat on and an Apple TV.
There is a Laundry Room with washer and dryer and full amenity modern kitchen.

The third bedroom is semi-private and only accessible through a staircase in the master bedroom. This space is LOFTED with low ceilings. It's phenomenal for kids and young adults, not so great for elderly or anyone older than 40.

Let me know if you need anything! I'd love to suggest restaurants or where to have a great time in Chicago.

The West Loop is the hottest and SAFEST areas in Chicago bar none.  You'll be within walking distance of the restaurant's everyone is talking about like "Girl and the Goat" and "Soho House" and close enough to nightlife without ever hearing it. The loft is only a 5-minute drive from the United Center where the Bulls, Blackhawks, and every major Artist who tours Chicago performs. Walk 2 minutes to the bus and the train and 10 minutes from shopping on Michigan Ave and Millennium Park.  Just off of Interstate 90 and 25 Min to either Midway or O'Hare International airport.  3 grocery stores including Whole Foods within a 10 min walk.

There is free overnight parking on Morgan St which is adjacent to the building. Divvy bikes are 3 min away right in front of the the Morgan St Train stop.

Guests are not allowed to use the roof deck

access: Guests use a street-facing private entrance. The front patio is available for guest use.
description:
You'll feel right at home in our fully private studio in Bridgeport, a quiet Chicago neighborhood with a rich history. Just 5 miles from downtown! Easily accessible from Midway and O'Hare, 1 mile from White Sox stadium (Guaranteed Rate Field), 15 minutes from the heart of the Loop, and convenient to McCormick Place, IIT, UIC, and Chinatown. You can easily walk to great coffee, diverse restaurants, art galleries, and more, while getting a taste of an authentic working-class Chicago neighborhood.

Our garden-level studio features a private entrance, private bathroom, lots of natural light, a full-size murphy wall bed with Tuft & Needle mattress, futon (which converts to a second full-size bed), desk and task chair, fridge, microwave, coffee/tea. Unwind with fast WiFi, a smart TV, board games, and more.

Guests use a street-facing private entrance. The front patio is available for guest use.

We live upstairs. The guest studio is totally private, and we will give you space. But if you need anything, don't hesitate to ask!

Bridgeport is a historic working-class neighborhood which is experiencing a rapid transformation into an arts and cultural hub. Originally settled by European immigrants, many of whom built the Illinois and Michigan Canal, the neighborhood is now among the most ethnically and culturally diverse in Chicago. You will find an eclectic mix of boutique coffee shops, diners, classic dive bars, hipster breweries, and art studios.

Free street parking (plentiful during the day, more sparse after the end of the workday). One block from the #8 Halsted bus, just a few bus stops from the Halsted Orange Line stop (and the #62 and #44 buses), and 3 blocks from the #35 35th Street bus. Easily accessible from Midway (Orange Line / #8 bus) or O'Hare (Blue Line / Orange Line / #8 bus).

**Note on Seasonal Temperature**
The guest space is the bottom floor of the building, and as such it is the most difficult part of the house to heat. During the cold months of the year, we do not recommend this space for guests who need extra-warm temperatures in order to feel comfortable.

Free street parking! On crowded days you may have to park a block or two away.

Our space is one room + one bathroom. Both the bed and the sofa bed/futon are in the same room - there are no private bedrooms. Accordingly, the space is best suited to a solo traveler or couple, or friends who don't mind sleeping in the same room. Children are welcome to stay with parents - if a floor-level bed is preferable for safety, we can provide a twin-size air mattress.  (Parents, please note that there is no bathtub, only a stall shower).

You’ll be staying on the bottom level of our family home. We have small children. Sound isolation is decent, but you will hear our footsteps, furniture, and indistinct voices, generally between 7:00am and 8:00pm.
Our laundry room is adjacent to the guest studio. You may hear us doing laundry during the day.
There is a small business located in the building, and you may hear clients coming and going during weekday afternoons.
You may also hear the faint sounds of a piano through the air vent in the afternoon.
If you are looking for a totally quiet stay, our space may not be a good fit.

Quiet hours: 10:00pm - 8:00am.

Absolutely no drugs, smoking, or vaping.

Please do not burn incense or scented candles in the suite.

Feel free to have a few friends over! Please, no parties.

The entrance to the unit has a low doorway - you may need to duck!

There are two short flights of stairs on the way into the unit.

access: Guests have access to antenna TV with Apple TV including access to Netflix and Hulu, full small kitchenette - partially equipped.  washer and dryer.  All utilities included.
description:
Rehabbed basement space.  Furniture includes all basic essentials.  Comfortable new mattress, TV - antenna plus Apple TV, WiFi, and washer and dryer.  Air conditioning.

This is an ultra cute basement space with private entrance.

Guests have access to antenna TV with Apple TV including access to Netflix and Hulu, full small kitchenette - partially equipped.  washer and dryer.  All utilities included.

I am living in Chicago on first floor.  I'm hear to answer questions and solve problems.  However, 2nd floor can answer your questions and help where they can.  I am always a text away and can be the problem solver.

We are close to the intersections of Western Ave. and Peterson Ave.  I'm 2 miles from the Lake Michigan (Lake Shore Drive), 5 miles from HWY 94, and just south of Evanston.  I'm walking distance from Devon Ave, a feast for the senses.

Public transportation is nearby but not the most efficient.  CTA buses run on Peterson and Western.  Brown Line is 2 miles south on Western.  Blue line is 2 miles east on Peterson.  There is also an express bus on Peterson that takes you downtown via Lake Shore Drive. Permit street parking

The laundry, located in the kitchen area is shared by other tenants.  There is a door separating the kitchen/laundry from the rest of the area.  We always text each other and make arrangements with you when we need to use the laundry.

Hi! The place is literally just around the corner from Wrigley Field & the Metro on a quiet, tree-lined street. I have free parking passes, if needed. Walking distance from the stadium, lake, and plenty of bars/restaurants/public transit.

I am usually available in person throughout your stay. If not, I'm easily reachable by phone.

additional_house_rules:
- House Rules: Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.  

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.

access: You'll have full access to the entire loft, private bathroom, plus the building's laundry / ironing room.
description:
A renovated and funky loft in a building dating to the 1880s in Old Town is exactly where you want to stay during your trip to Chicago - the location is ideal for seeing everything you've got on your list: across the street from Second City, Steppenwolf, and Lincoln Park, and about 20 minutes' train ride from the Loop or Wrigley Field.

The Twin-sized bed is up a narrow set of stairs.

You'll have full access to the entire loft, private bathroom, plus the building's laundry / ironing room.

An incredibly popular neighborhood destination, largely because of its proximity to the lake and downtown, Old Town keeps up a lively pace day and night. Victorian-era buildings, brick alleyways and narrow, tree-lined streets are charming backdrops to a busy main strip that runs along Wells Street between North Avenue and Division Street.

My place is a few minutes' walk away from the Sedgwick Brown/Purple line train station, and equally convenient to the North Ave and LaSalle buses - it's almost more convenient to not have a car here! If you do bring your car, however, there are several garages nearby with overnight parking.
house_rules:
- House Rules: Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.  

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.

description:
3 bed / 2.5 bath town home in Lincoln Park! Great for families! Recently remodeled kitchen. Oversized living room with fireplace, dry bar w/ wine fridge and dining area flows into the great back yard. 2 large bedrooms on second floor with full bath and laundry. Entire third floor is a luxurious master suite complete with a fireplace and 5-piece spa bath. Top floor features a den that opens into a wrap around roof deck w/ skyline and neighborhood views.  A block from great shopping, and dining!

Perfect Lincoln Park location

Very close to train.  Great location for walking.

description:
Nice single family house in a great Chicago west suburb, Oak Park. This master bedrm has a private washrm (mirror, sink & toilet) and with common areas including living rm, dining rm, kitchen, and laundry rm. Accommodates business travelers with office amenities ( e.g., Wifi, printer, copier) & washer+dryer. 

Quiet & upscale suburbs. Close to public trans & I-290 exprwy. 15 min to downtown via train & 15 min by car (normal traffic). Close to Loyola Med Ctr and Hines VA & Rush Hsptls.

Cereal, waffles and coffee are provided by the host for the ARRIVAL day/night of the guests. 

The closest grocery stores are Fair Share Finer Foods, Amer Grocery Store and Carnival Grocery. Nearby coffee shops include Circle K, Buzz Cafe and The Happy Apple Pie Shop. Nearby restaurants include Pete's Red Hot's, Happiness Chinese and Bodhi Thai Bistro.

description:
Fall in love with the Windy City from the comfort of this 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom vacation rental home in the heart of Chicago. Complete with a 4-person sauna, pool table, and accommodations for up to 14, the 3,000-square-foot home offers the epitome of luxurious city living. Whether you spend your days shopping the Magnificent Mile, eating in the South Loop, or in meetings downtown, you'll look forward to ending each day on the rooftop deck watching the sunset with your friends.

*NOTE: Your safety matters. This property features 2 exterior security cameras, above the front door and back door, all facing outward. They do not look into interior spaces*

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed | Bedroom 4: Queen Bed | Additional Sleeping: 3 Queen Air Mattresses 

After a day at 31st Street Beach, find refuge from the sun in the cozy living room. As you and your friends lounge on the plush couches and watch the Bears game on the 55-inch flat-screen cable TV, you'll be just steps from the fully equipped kitchen. 

Complete with stainless steel appliances and a large granite island, the high-end kitchen has everything you'll need to cook like Chicago native and Iron Chef Stephanie Izard. 
Dining table for 6 

Looking to elevate your meal? Ditch the indoor dining table for 6 and feast on the rooftop deck. Boasting a large dining table and gas grill, the rooftop is perfect for family barbecues in the sun!. 

Once the Midwestern sun has set, retire to the master bedroom and watch the 30-inch flat-screen cable TV from the comfort of the queen bed. In the morning, take a relaxing soak in the jacuzzi tub or rinse off in the large walk-in shower before starting your day. 

When the Chicago cold is deterring you from exploring, spend the day in the finished basement. Complete with a 4-person sauna, pool table, and flat-screen cable TV, the basement is sure to be a frequented gathering space for your travel group.

Evolve Vacation Rental wants your vacation experience to be everything you hoped for and exactly what you needed. To make it easy, we help you find a property you love, offer world-class support seven days a week, and make sure our properties are safe, clean, and ready for your stay. Even better, each home has a Guest Contact available 24/7 for anything that’s on your mind. It’s a fresh new approach to vacation rental. Try Evolve today!

Located just a short walk from trains and buses, this home offers easy transportation to the city's most popular attractions. 

Whether you choose to drive or take a 20-minute bus ride downtown, you're sure to be floored by the majesty of the city. Home to the 'Magnificent Mile,' Chicago's premier commercial district, beautiful architecture, and more, this bustling city feels like the heart and soul of Chicago. 

Be sure to check out some of the city's other popular attractions like Navy Pier, McCormick Place, and of course Guaranteed Rate Field, home of the Chicago White Sox, during your Illinois getaway. 

When the summer sun is shining, head 6 miles down the road to the 31st Street Beach and take a dip in Lake Michigan. Although this beach isn't well known, the crystal clear waters and family-friendly ambiance make the 31st Street Beach one of the city's best-kept secrets. 

Chicago's diverse population helps bolster the city's booming culinary scene. If you're looking for some authentic international fare eat your way through Chinatown, Little Italy, and Greektown, all of which sit within 15 minutes of the property. Grab a Chicago-style hot dog at Portillo’s or some delicious deep dish pizza at Gino’s East.

Prefer critically-acclaimed eateries to mom and pop shops? Head to the Loop and eat at 5-star restaurants like Chef Stephanie Izard's Girl & the Goat or enjoy some tapas at Sociale Chicago.

Key Residence Features:
- Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen, 3 flat-screen cable TVs, a pool table, 4-person sauna, furnished rooftop deck, gas grill, a dining table for 6, stainless steel appliances, expansive kitchen island, jacuzzi tub, walk-in shower with bench, free WiFi, open street parking, and more! 
- A 40-foot yacht is available for rent during the summer ( please reach out to Evolve for additional information)
- Unbeatable Chicago Location - Steps from trains and buses, 20 minutes from downtown, within 20 minutes of Navy Pier, McCormick Place, and Guaranteed Rate Field, 6 miles from the 31st Street Beach, within 15 minutes of Chinatown, Little Italy, and Greektown, and 4 miles from the Loop 
- Closest Commercial Airport - O'Hare International Airport (~19.4 miles away)

access: The entire apartment.
description:
Spend time in Chicago living in a classic Chicago greystone building with all the modern upgrades.  You'll feel the history walking through the neighborhood (Southport Corridor section of Lake View) and in this beautiful apartment.  Over the past few years, we've remodeled the kitchen and both bathrooms.  The floors were recently refinished and it has fresh paint throughout.  Large eat-in kitchen, formal dining room, and a large outdoor space.  2 parking spots are in included for our guests.

Two full bathrooms, three bedrooms with queen beds, and sun-filled living area with 9-foot ceilings.  In-unit laundry.  Large back yard (twice the usual Chicago yard) and walking distance to just about everything (public transit, bars, restaurants, arts/entertainment, Wrigley Field, and more).  .

The entire apartment.

We're nestled on a quiet residential block but walk 2 blocks in any direction and you're in a bustling location full of all kinds of arts/entertainment/dining/etc.  15 minutes to downtown on the train.

Several train and bus lines nearby, but much within walking distance..  2 parking spaces included on the property for guests.

description:
Enjoy your own private basement in a beautiful and fully remodeled home located close to downtown and airport. Within walking distance to blue line and minutes from the expressway.

Cable, wifi, TV in bedroom and living room, coffee maker, sink, frig, two fireplaces, super convenient to downtown and airport.

I can be available 24 hours a day to guests.

Irving Park is a safe and convenient location close to restaurants, shopping, the blue line, Wrigley Field,  downtown and the toll free expressway. There are several really good sports bars and restaurants nearby.

Close to Wrigley, Ravenswood, Logan, Portage Park, Downtown, Lincoln and Lakeview.

description:
This is a private room in a shared 4BR apartment (all 4 rooms are available on Airbnb). Restaurants, shops, bars, and public transit are all within walking distance. Downtown is a 10-minute train ride away via the nearby Fullerton Red/Brown/Purple Line 'L' train station.

Trove guests have exclusive FREE access to The Metropolitan, a members-only club located on the 66th and 67th floors of the Willis Tower. Check "Exclusive Trove Perks" in the listing description for details.

Thanks so much for your interest in staying with us! We ask that you read through our entire listing to make sure that we're the right hosts for you. This is a private room in a shared 4BR apartment (all 4 rooms are available on Airbnb). 

THIS TROVE HAS

✔ Queen-size bed
✔ Turkish cotton bath and hand towels
✔ 55" HDTV w/ Netflix (no cable TV)
✔ Keurig coffee maker
✔ Body wash and shampoo
✔ Iron and ironing board
✔ Hair dryer
✔ Keyless Entry

--and more!

EXCLUSIVE TROVE PERKS

During your stay as a Trove guest, you receive a free membership to The Metropolitan, a members-only club located on the 66th and 67th floors of the Willis Tower.  Included with your membership:

✔ Upscale co-working space, dining, and bars
✔ Stunning views of Chicago and Lake Michigan
✔ Discounted express tickets to the Willis Tower Skydeck

Metropolitan Club Hours:

Monday–Friday: 7am – 10pm
Saturday: 5pm – 10pm
Sunday: Closed

HAVE A QUESTION?

Check out the “Other Things to Note” section of this listing for the answers to our most frequently asked questions.

In addition to your room, you'll have shared access to the kitchen, living room, dining room, bathrooms, and washer/dryer.

We’re located on the north side of Chicago in Lincoln Park, one of Chicago’s trendiest and safest neighborhoods. Our neighborhood is a wonderful mix of bustling streets packed with local restaurants and shops, as well as quiet tree-lined streets full of historic buildings. We’re also minutes away from many of Chicago’s most popular spots.

Because of our central location, we recommend leaving your car at home. Any point of interest in Chicago can easily be reached by walking, public transit, or Uber.

→ The Fullerton Red/Brown/Purple Line 'L' train station is a 10-minute walk away.
→ O'Hare is 55 minutes away via public transit and 30-45 minutes away via Uber.
→ Midway is 60 minutes away via public transit and 35-50minutes away via Uber.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

1. “How do I get to ‘x’ from the apartment?/How far is the apartment from ‘x’?”

Directions from our apartment to any point in the city are available via web search. We're around the corner from the Wrightwood 659 art gallery. Search for “Wrightwood 659 Gallery Chicago” in Maps, click the “Directions” button, then enter your point of interest.

2. When is check-in/check-out?

Check-in is 3 p.m. or later but you're welcome to stop by anytime after 11:30 a.m. to drop off your bags in the living room.

Check-out is at 11 a.m. Our cleaning staff will need access to the apartment at 11 a.m., but you’re welcome to leave your bags in the living room and pick them up by 2:30 p.m. at the latest.

3. “Can a third person stay in the room with me?”

We allow a maximum of two guests per room. We have additional rooms available if you need accommodations for more than two people. Send us a message for more info.

4. Will I have my own private bathroom?

The apartment has two shared bathrooms.

We’re also minutes away from many of Chicago’s most popular spots.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $500 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.
